SA01vakobhau:4: tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmyabhidharmakośam // VAkK_1.1 // [001/08]
SA01vakobhau:6: śāstraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya śāsturmāhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāramārabhate ya iti / [001/09-001/10]
SA01vakobhau:14: tacca bhagavato buddhasya pratipakṣalābhenātyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra jñeye punaranutpattidharmatvāddhatam / [001/12]
SA01vakobhau:23: tatha hyeṣāṃ buddhadharmeṣvativiprakṛṣṭadeśakāleṣu artheṣu cānantaprabhedeṣu bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānam / [001/15-001/16]
SA01vakobhau:25: ityātmahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstutya punastameva bhagavantaṃ parahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstauti saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāreti / [001/17]
SA01vakobhau:29_1: iti ya evamātmaparahitapratipattisaṃpadā yuktastasmai namaskṛtyeti śirasā praṇipatya / [001/20]
SA01vakobhau:37: tasmai namaskṛtya kiṃ kariṣyāmī tyāha śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi / [002/01]
SA01vakobhau:59: yāpi ca śrutacintābhāvanāmayī sāsravā prajñā upapattipratilambhikā ca sānucarā / [002/09-002/10]
SA01vakobhau:61: yacca śāstramasyāḥ prāptyarthamanāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ tadapi tatsaṃbhārabhāvādabhidharma ityucyate / [002/10]
SA01vakobhau:65: tadayaṃ paramārthadharmaṃ vā nirvāṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyabhimukho dharma ityabhidharmaḥ / [002/12]
SA01vakobhau:73: sa hi śāstrasaṃjñako 'bhidharma etasminnarthato yathāpradhānamantarbhūta ityetacchāstraṃ tasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati / [002/16]
SA01vakobhau:80: kimarthaṃ punarabhidharmopadeśaḥ kena cāyaṃ prathamata upadiṣṭo yaṭa ācāryo 'bhidharmakośaṃ vaktumādriyata iti // [002/19]
SA01vakobhau:84: dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /

SA01vakobhau:97: katame punaste dharmā yeṣāṃ pravicayārthamabhidharmopadeśa ityāha [003/06]
SA01vakobhau:113: kāmaṃ nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyante na tinuśerate tatreti na tayoḥ sāsravatvaprasañgaḥ / [003/13-003/14]
SA01vakobhau:115: yathā 'tra nānuśerate tat paścādanuśayanirdeśa eva jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ / [003/14]
SA01vakobhau:145: duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā prajñāviśeṣastena prāpyo nirodhaḥ / [004/02]
SA01vakobhau:151: kiṃ punareka eva sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:160: anyathā hi duḥkhadarśanaheyakleśanirodhasākṣātk karaṇāt sarvakleśanirodhasākṣātkriyā prasajyeta / [004/08-004/09]
SA01vakobhau:166: nāsya kaścit sabhāgaheturasti nāsau kasyacidityayamasya vākyasyārtho na tu nāsya kaśicat sabhāgo 'stīti / [004/11]
SA01vakobhau:172: anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādasyātyantaṃ vighnabhūto visaṃyogād yo 'nyo nirodhaḥ so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ / [004/14]
SA01vakobhau:178: yathaikarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanaso yāni rūpāṇi śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cātyayante tadālambanaiḥ pañcabhirvijñānakāyairna śakyaṃ punarutpattum / [004/16-004/17]

SA01vakobhau:322: tadyathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātaṃ abhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā cchāyā ātapaḥ ālokaḥ andhakāramiti / [006/13-006/14]
SA01vakobhau:337: asti rūpāyatanaṃ varṇato vidyate na saṃsthānataḥ [006/17-006/18]

SA01vakobhau:399: catvāri mahābhūtāni ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ gurutvaṃ laghutvaṃ śītaṃ jighatsā pipāsā ceti / [007/10]
SA01vakobhau:416: sukhā saṅghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṃ tapaḥ sukhaṃ” // iti / [007/15]

SA01vakobhau:427: yadetadbahuvidhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ tatra kadācidekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati / [007/19]

SA01vakobhau:495: te punahete dhātavaḥ kasmin karmaṇi saṃsidhāḥ kiṃsvabhāvāścetyāha [008/17]

SA01vakobhau:519: ato ya īraṇāsvabhāvo dharmaḥ sa vāyuriti karṃaṇā 'sya svabhāvo 'bhivyaktaḥ / [008/26]

SA01vakobhau:588: na tvevaṃ cakṣurādīnyāśritya varttante cakṣurvijñānādīni kevalaṃ tūtpattinimiktamātraṃ tāni teṣāṃ bhavantīti / [009/25-009/26]
SA01vakobhau:590: idaṃ tāvadavaibhāṣikīyaṃ vṛkṣamāśritya cchāyā varttate maṇiṃ cāśritya prabheti / [009/26-010/01]

SA01vakobhau:653: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “nāhamekadharmamapi anabhijñāyāparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti / [010/26]

SA01vakobhau:691: vedanā dayaḥ skandhāstrayo “vijñaptirasaṃskṛtāni ca dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuśca vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo manodhātuśceti // [011/19]

SA01vakobhau:720: arhatastarhi caramaṃ cittam na mano bhaviṣyati / [012/02]

SA01vakobhau:757: yastvanyenānyasya saṃgraha ucyate yathā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ parṣadāṃ sa hi kādācitkatvāt sāṃketiko veditavyaḥ / [012/17]

SA01vakobhau:997: etā eva vijñānasthitayaḥ tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānamiti kṣetrabijasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukramaḥ / [015/18-015/19]

SA01vakobhau:1062: yathā gamyeta pratyekameṣāṃ daśānāmāyatanatvaṃ viṣayaviṣayitvena vyavasthānaṃ na samastānāmiti / [016/19-016/20]

SA01vakobhau:1093: yeṣāṃ vāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ teṣāṃ tāni rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītāni / [017/09]
SA01vakobhau:1123: ye 'pyanye skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ sūtrāntareṣūktāste 'pyeṣveva yathokteṣu skandhādiṣu pratiopādyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathāvihitamasmiṃacchāstre saṃpradharya / [017/26-018/02]
SA01vakobhau:1125: tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ / [018/02-017/02]
SA01vakobhau:1149: ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam / [018/11-018/12]
SA01vakobhau:1151: tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ/ [018/12]
SA01vakobhau:1174: aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare / [018/20]
SA01vakobhau:1187: tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti / [018/26]
SA01vakobhau:1189: ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ / [019/01]
SA01vakobhau:1202: ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ / [019/06-019/07]
SA01vakobhau:1204: pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ / [019/07]
SA01vakobhau:1210: yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā /
SA01vakobhau:1215: yathoktaṃ prajñaptā“vasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale / [019/10]
SA01vakobhau:1246: yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ / [019/17]
SA01vakobhau:1250: kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate / [019/18]
SA01vakobhau:1254: nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ [019/19-019/20]
SA01vakobhau:1258: ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ [019/21]
SA01vakobhau:1260: prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ / [019/22]
SA01vakobhau:1267: ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti / [019/24]
SA01vakobhau:1348: tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam / [021/02]
SA01vakobhau:1356: ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti / [021/04]
SA01vakobhau:1365: yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam / [021/07]
SA01vakobhau:1402: yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ / [021/16-021/17]
SA01vakobhau:1408: sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau / [021/18]
SA01vakobhau:1410: ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena / [021/19]
SA01vakobhau:1417: rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti // [021/23]
SA01vakobhau:1430: kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ / [022/03]
SA01vakobhau:1442: tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ / [022/08]

SA01vakobhau:1470: daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt // [022/18]
SA01vakobhau:1472: yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante / [022/19]
SA01vakobhau:1493: tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī // VAkK_1.33 // [022/25]
SA01vakobhau:1500: mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ / [022/27]
SA01vakobhau:1506: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt / [023/04-021/04]
SA01vakobhau:1512: śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham / [023/07]
SA01vakobhau:1519: ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham / [023/10]
SA01vakobhau:1536: anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca / [023/16]
SA01vakobhau:1567: tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre / [024/02]
SA01vakobhau:1571: na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa / [024/03-024/05]
SA01vakobhau:1573: uktaṃ ca sūtre “cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ [024/05-024/06]
SA01vakobhau:1575: rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham / [024/06-024/07]
SA01vakobhau:1577: śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham / [024/07]
SA01vakobhau:1581: spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighami“ti / [024/09]
SA01vakobhau:1583: spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam / [024/09-024/10]
SA01vakobhau:1585: yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ “yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatami“ti [024/10-024/11]
SA01vakobhau:1593: na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum / [024/13-024/14]
SA01vakobhau:1595: “saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita';
SA01vakobhau:1606: paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati // [024/20-024/21]
SA01vakobhau:1608: aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate / [024/22]
SA01vakobhau:1610: chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam / [024/23]
SA01vakobhau:1628: yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam / [025/01]
SA01vakobhau:1638: kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca [025/04-025/05]
SA01vakobhau:1642: kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ / [025/07]
SA01vakobhau:1648: adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca / [025/10]
SA01vakobhau:1664: bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ / [025/13-025/14]
SA01vakobhau:1684: yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ “pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti / [025/21]
SA01vakobhau:1688: karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:1691: karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti / [025/24-025/25]
SA01vakobhau:1693: evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti / [025/25]
SA01vakobhau:1710: te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api / [026/05]
SA01vakobhau:1721: te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante / [026/09-026/10]
SA01vakobhau:1736: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca // VAkK_1.38 // [026/15]
SA01vakobhau:1761: tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan / [026/23-026/24]
SA01vakobhau:1767: etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti / [027/01]
SA01vakobhau:1777: ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ / [027/05-027/06]
SA01vakobhau:1791: “cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham” iti / [027/11]
SA01vakobhau:1797: evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti / [027/13]
SA01vakobhau:1801: yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante / [027/14-027/15]
SA01vakobhau:1807: yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta / [027/17]
SA01vakobhau:1818: yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate / [027/22-027/23]
SA01vakobhau:1820: na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā / [027/23-027/24]
SA01vakobhau:1822: tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate “sarvadharmā anātmāna” iti / [027/14-027/25]
SA01vakobhau:1826: sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti / [027/26]
SA01vakobhau:1837: uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti / [028/02-028/03]
SA01vakobhau:1839: tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ / [028/03-028/04]
SA01vakobhau:1845: yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi / [028/05-028/06]
SA01vakobhau:1849: tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca / [028/07]
SA01vakobhau:1854: rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni / [028/08]
SA01vakobhau:1858: yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi / [028/09-028/10]
SA01vakobhau:1870: rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam / [028/12]
SA01vakobhau:1874: asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu / [028/13-028/14]
SA01vakobhau:1876: natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām / [028/14]
SA01vakobhau:1886: gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ / [028/18]
SA01vakobhau:1890: asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi / [028/20]
SA01vakobhau:1904: ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ / [028/25]
SA01vakobhau:1906: kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1924: nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma / [029/03-029/04]
SA01vakobhau:1946: tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam // [029/13]
SA01vakobhau:1948: aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ / [029/14]
SA01vakobhau:1956: pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1975: ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ / [030/02]
SA01vakobhau:1989: savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti / [030/06-030/07]
SA01vakobhau:1991: evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu / [030/08]
SA01vakobhau:2000: dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ // VAkK_1.42 // [030/12]
SA01vakobhau:2002: yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate / [030/12-030/13]
SA01vakobhau:2004: yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet / [030/13-030/14]
SA01vakobhau:2006: naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati / [030/14]
SA01vakobhau:2010: yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate / [030/16-030/17]
SA01vakobhau:2012: kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet / [030/17]
SA01vakobhau:2022: yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam / [030/20-030/21]
SA01vakobhau:2024: yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate / [030/21]
SA01vakobhau:2040: yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ “cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāni“ti / [030/25]
SA01vakobhau:2044: uktaṃ ca sūtre “cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya” ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:2051: yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ / [031/01-031/02]
SA01vakobhau:2053: yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti / [031/02-031/03]
SA01vakobhau:2055: tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi / [031/03]
SA01vakobhau:2059: “yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriye“ti vaktavyam / [031/04]
SA01vakobhau:2080: tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam / [031/09-031/10]
SA01vakobhau:2093: tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate / [031/14]
SA01vakobhau:2101: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvedi“ti / [031/16-031/17]
SA01vakobhau:2105: cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti / [031/19]
SA01vakobhau:2107: tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām / [031/20]
SA01vakobhau:2115: tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati / [031/23-031/24]
SA01vakobhau:2117: ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati / [031/24]
SA01vakobhau:2121: na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi / [031/26-031/27]
SA01vakobhau:2123: yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ / [032/01]
SA01vakobhau:2127: tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:2130: sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta / [032/03]
SA01vakobhau:2134: yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca / [032/04-032/05]
SA01vakobhau:2140: kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā / [032/06-032/07]
SA01vakobhau:2142: yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ / [032/7-03207]
SA01vakobhau:2177: ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale / [032/16-032/17]
SA01vakobhau:2183: kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti / [032/18-032/19]
SA01vakobhau:2191: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām / [032/21-032/22]
SA01vakobhau:2193: kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāha“kāraṇaṃ prati / [032/22-032/23]
SA01vakobhau:2199: kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ / [033/01-033/02]
SA01vakobhau:2209: anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta / [033/04-033/05]
SA01vakobhau:2215: ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante / [033/06-033/07]
SA01vakobhau:2217: yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ / [033/07]
SA01vakobhau:2227: yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti / [033/13]
SA01vakobhau:2234: kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa / [033/15]
SA01vakobhau:2265: tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ / [033/24-033/25]
SA01vakobhau:2283: ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi / [034/05]
SA01vakobhau:2297: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ / [034/10]
SA01vakobhau:2299: atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ / [034/11]
SA01vakobhau:2320: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ / [034/19]
SA01vakobhau:2326: cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ / [034/22]
SA01vakobhau:2328: tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ / [034/23-034/24]
SA01vakobhau:2330: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam / [034/24]
SA01vakobhau:2345: tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ / [034/29-034/30]
SA01vakobhau:2349: atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi / [035/02]
SA01vakobhau:2354: kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati / [035/04-035/05]
SA01vakobhau:2356: tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni / [035/06-035/07]
SA01vakobhau:2358: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam / [035/07-035/06]
SA01vakobhau:2360: prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam / [035/08-035/10]
SA01vakobhau:2362: dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam / [035/10-035/11]
SA01vakobhau:2364: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam / [035/11-035/12]
SA01vakobhau:2366: prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ / [035/12-035/13]
SA01vakobhau:2368: dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam / [035/13-035/14]
SA01vakobhau:2370: kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam / [035/14-035/15]
SA01vakobhau:2376: dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam / [035/17]
SA01vakobhau:2386: tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam / [035/21-035/22]
SA01vakobhau:2388: yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati / [035/23]
SA01vakobhau:2392: na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate / [035/25]
SA01vakobhau:2398: asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ // VAkK_1.46 // [036/02]
SA01vakobhau:2400: asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca / [036/03]
SA01vakobhau:2407: “na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotramūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2408: vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdastu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //“iti [036/07]
SA01vakobhau:2420: kāyaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ ca svabhūmikānyeva nityaṃ bhavanti / [036/12-036/13]
SA01vakobhau:2428: kadācit kāyamanovijñānadharmaiḥ samānabhūmikaṃ mano bhavati kadācidūrdhvādhobhūmikam / [036/17-036/19]
SA01vakobhau:2430: pañcabhūmike 'pi hi kāye sarvabhūmikāni mana ādīni bhavanti samāpattyupapattikāle yathāyogamiti vistareṇa samāpattinirdeśe kośasthāna etadākhyāyiṣyate / [036/19-036/20]
SA01vakobhau:2434: alpaṃ ca prayojanaṃ mahāṃśca śrama iti samāpta ānuṣaṅgikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ / [036/21]
SA01vakobhau:2438: aṣṭādaśānāṃ cdātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kaḥ kena vijñeyaḥ / [036/22]
SA01vakobhau:2446: evamete pratyekaṃ dvābhyāṃ vijñānābhyāṃ vijñeyā bhavanti / [036/26-036/27]
SA01vakobhau:2448: śeṣāstrayodaśa dhātavaḥ pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāmaviṣayatvādekena manovijñānena vijñeyā ityākhyātaṃ bhavati / [037/01]
SA01vakobhau:2450: eṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ madhye kati nityāḥ katyanityāḥ / [037/01-037/02]
SA01vakobhau:2452: na kaśct sakalo 'sti nityo dhāturapi tu [037/03]
SA01vakobhau:2460: dharmārdhamindriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ // VAkK_1.48 // [037/07]
SA01vakobhau:2464_0: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2464_1: strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2464_2: daurmanasyendraiyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smādhīndriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2470: tatra dharmārdhaṃ jīvitendriyādīnyekādaśendriyāṇi trayāṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmadhātupradeśatvāt / [037/13-037/14]
SA01vakobhau:2474: sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyaṃ stripuruṣendriye kāyadhātupradeś iti paścād vakṣyati / [037/15-037/16]
SA01vakobhau:2476: śeṣāḥ pañca dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca nendriyamiti siddham // [037/17]
SA01vakobhau:2482: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhau:2483: teṣāṃ ca yo nirhodha evaṃvādīu mahāśramaṇaḥ // [037/22]
SA01vakobhau:2536: tathā hi tadviprayuktavikalpānāṃ ṣaṇḍha paṇḍakobhayavyañjanānāmasaṃvarānantāryakuāśalamulasamucchedā na bhavanti saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti / [038/19]
SA01vakobhau:2542: tatra punrbhavasaṃbandhe yathoktaṃ “gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataracittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ ve“ti / [038/22]
SA01vakobhau:2544: vaśibhāvānuvarttane yathoktaṃ “cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata” iti vistaraḥ / [038/22-038/23]
SA01vakobhau:2546: yat punaḥ sukhādīndriyapañcakaṃ yāni cāṣṭau śraddhādīni teṣāṃ [038/24]
SA01vakobhau:2602: kaścidasau kāyendriyabhāga upastha pradeśo yaḥ strīpuruṣendriyākhyāṃ paratilabhate / [039/15-039/16]
SA01vakobhau:2614: jīvitaṃ vedanāḥ pañca śraddhādyāścendriyaṃ matāḥ // VAkK_2.3 // [039/20]
SA01vakobhau:2618: tathāhi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete duḥkhāyāṃ pratigho 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyetyuktaṃ sūtre / [039/21-039/22]
SA01vakobhau:2659: saṃbhāro vyavadānaṃ ca yāvatā tāvadindriyam // VAkK_2.5 // [040/14]
SA01vakobhau:2664: tasya strīpuruṣavikalpaḥ strīpuruṣendraiyābhyāṃ sthitirjīvitendriyeṇa saṃkleśo vedanā bhiḥ / [040/16]
SA01vakobhau:2690: ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prabhavaḥ sthitirājñendriyam upabhoga ājñātāvīndriyeṇetyata etāvantyevendriyāṇi / [040/24]
SA01vakobhau:2698: tadeva hi tadanyathā 'nyatra cotpannamādānaṃ viharaṇaṃ cocyate / [040/27]
SA01vakobhau:2706: upasthasyāpi nendriyatvamānande strīpuruṣendriyakṛtaṃ hi tat saukhyamiti / [041/01-041/03]
SA01vakobhau:2710: sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya svasyāṃ kariyāyāmityayukataṃ vāgādīnāmindriyatvam // [041/05]
SA01vakobhau:2733: dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam // VAkK_2.7 // [041/14]
SA01vakobhau:2735: tṛtīye tu dhyāne saiva śātā vedanā caitasī sukhendriyam / [041/14-041/15]
SA01vakobhau:2743: tṛtīyāddhyānādanyatra kāmadhātau prathame dvitīye ca dhyāne sā caiatasikī śātā vedanā saumanasyendriyam / [041/18-041/19]
SA01vakobhau:2745: tṛtīye tu dhyāne prītivītarāgatvāt sukhendriyameva sā na saumanasyendriyam / [041/19]
SA01vakobhau:2764: caitasikaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhaṃ prāyeṇa vikalpanādutpadyate na tu kāyikam / [042/02-041/03]
SA01vakobhau:2770: upekṣā tu svarasenāvikalpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī ce tyekamindriyam kriyate / [042/04-042/05]
SA01vakobhau:2776: upekṣāyāṃ tveṣa vikalpo nāstyata upekṣaṇaṃ pratyavikalpanādabhedaḥ / [042/07]
SA01vakobhau:2784: darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyamiti / [042/10]
SA01vakobhau:2799: “duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyamiti” tathābhūtasyenriyamājñātāvīnriyam / [042/15-042/16]
SA01vakobhau:2801: svabhāvanirdeśāṃ kṛtvā prakārabhedo vaktavya kati sāsravāṇi katyanāsravāṇi inriyāṇityevamādi / [042/16-042/17]
SA01vakobhau:2819: manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ śraddhādīni ca pañca etāni navendriyāṇi sāsravāṇyanāsravāṇyapi / [042/25]
SA01vakobhau:2823: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa srvaṃ na santi tamahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmī“ti / [042/27]
SA01vakobhau:2835: uktaṃ ca sūtre “santi ca sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhāstīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apī” tyapravarttita eva dharmacakre / [043/04]
SA01vakobhau:2839: punaścoktaṃ “yāvacchāhameṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samudayaṃ cāstagamaṃ ca svādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ nādhyajñāsiṣaṃ na tāvadahamasmātsadevakāllokādi“ti vistaraḥ / [043/07]
SA01vakobhau:2848: atha yadarhan bhikṣurāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati tajjīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipākaḥ / [043/11]
SA01vakobhau:2852_0: arhan bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśitvaṃ prāptaḥ saṃghāya va pudgalāya vā pātraḥ vā cīvaraṃ
SA01vakobhau:2852_1: vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ vā dattvā tat praṇidhāya prantakoṭikam
SA01vakobhau:2854: sa tasmāt vyutthāya cittamutpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate yanme bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavatviti / [043/15]
SA01vakobhau:2866: tathaīva dānaṃ dattvā praṇidhāya prantakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate/ [043/19]
SA01vakobhau:2868: yanme āyurvipākaṃ tat bhogavipākaṃ bhavatviti tasya tathā bhavati / [043/20]
SA01vakobhau:2872: tasminneva āśraye rūpāvacarāṇi mahābhūtāni dhyānabalena saṃmudhakarotyāyuṣo 'nukūlāni vaihodhikāni ca / [043/21-043/22]
SA01vakobhau:2878: samādhiprabhāva eva sa teṣāṃ tadṛśo yena pūrvakarmajaṃ ca sthitikālāvedhamindriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvrttayantyapūrvaṃ ca samādhijamāvedhamākṣipanti / [043/24]
SA01vakobhau:2892: alpaṃ ca parahitaṃ jīvite paśyanti rogābhibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam /
SA01vakobhau:2899: athaitadāyuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthāpanārthamutsarjanaṃ vā kva kasya vā veditavyam / [044/05]
SA01vakobhau:2919: yaistu kālāntaraṃ jīvati te jīvitasaṃskārā iti / [044/11-044/12]
SA01vakobhau:2937: yaccāpi tat pratijñātam “evaṃbhāvitairahaṃ caturbhirṛddhi pādairākāṅkṣankalpamapi tiṣṭheyaṃ kalpāvaśeṣamapī“ti / [044/18]
SA01vakobhau:2970: jīvitendriyaṃ cakṣurādīni dvādaśa hitvā śeṣāṇyavipāka iti siddham / [045/04-045/05]
SA01vakobhau:2972: yadi dauarmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka iti sūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate “trīṇi kāryāṇi / [045/05-045/06]
SA01vakobhau:2974: saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma upekṣā vedanīyaṃ karme“ti saṃprayogavedanīyatāmadhikṛtyoktam / [045/06-045/07]
SA01vakobhau:2980: saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye api tarhi karmaṇī evaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ / [045/08]
SA01vakobhau:2984: saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ vipāke 'pi na doṣaḥ / [045/09]
SA01vakobhau:2988: kā punratra yuktirdaurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti / [045/10]
SA01vakobhau:2990: daurmanasyaṃ hi parikalpaviśeṣairutpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca / [045/10-045/11]
SA01vakobhau:2996: yadi tarhi daumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syādānantaryakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ daurmanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt / [045/13]
SA01vakobhau:3000: yadi saumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syāt puṇyakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ saumanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt / [045/14]
SA01vakobhau:3009: sati tu saṃbhave saumanasyasyāsti vipākāvakāśī na dauarmanasyasya / [045/16-045/17]
SA01vakobhau:3011: sarvathā 'samudācārāditi nāstyevaṃ daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [045/17-045/18]
SA01vakobhau:3013: tatra jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya vipāko durgatāvakuśalasya / [045/18]
SA01vakobhau:3051: tatra manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣā akuāśalāḥ kuśalāḥ sāsravāśca savipākāḥ / [046/04]
SA01vakobhau:3101: tatra maithunadharmavairāgyādaśobhākaratvācca rūpadhātau strīpuruṣendriye na staḥ / [046/24]
SA01vakobhau:3113: anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo yaḥ kāmachātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavati / [046/27-046/28]
SA01vakobhau:3119: ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca // VAkK_2.12 // [047/02]
SA01vakobhau:3203: sūtre 'pyuktaṃ “ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyā” iti / [048/09]
SA01vakobhau:3205: tatra rūpadhātau ṣaḍḍindriyāṇi vipākaḥ parathamato labhyante / [048/09-048/10]
SA01vakobhau:3214: tasmin ekameva jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ prathamato labhyate nānyat / [048/14]
SA01vakobhau:3228: sarve hyupapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ca / [048/20]
SA01vakobhau:3246: eṣa ca nyāyaḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe veditavyaḥ / [048/26]
SA01vakobhau:3248: yadā tu kuśale cetasi sthito mriyate tadā [049/01]
SA01vakobhau:3252: kuśale cetasi mriyamāṇaḥ sarvatra yathoktamindriyāṇi nirodhayati / [049/02-049/03]
SA01vakobhau:3258: evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau nirodhayati rūpeṣu trayodaśāeti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam / [049/05]
SA01vakobhau:3287: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvadyadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / [049/17]
SA01vakobhau:3295: atha bhūyovītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiryeneva srota āpattiphalasya / [049/19-049/20]
SA01vakobhau:3297: anāgāmiphalaṃ yadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / [049/21]
SA01vakobhau:3313: yadāpyayamānupūrviko navame vimūktimārge tīkṣṇenriyatvā ddhyānaṃ praviśāti laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpyaṣṭābhirindriyairanāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti / [049/26]
SA01vakobhau:3317: bhavatyānantaryamārge tūpekṣendriyameva nityamubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptiḥ / [049/27-049/28]
SA01vakobhau:3319: atha lokottareṇa praviśāti tasya navabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / [049/28]
SA01vakobhau:3331: asti saṃbhavo yadekaḥ pudgalaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyīpekṣābhirarhattvaṃ prāpnuyādata ekādaśabhirityuktam / [050/05-050/06]
SA01vakobhau:3337: nahyasau parihīṇaḥ kadācitsukhendriyeṇa prāpnnoti na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate / [050/07-050/08]
SA01vakobhau:3342: katamenendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ katibhiḥ avaśyaṃ samanvāgato bhavati / [050/10]
SA01vakobhau:3348: ya eṣāmupekṣādīnāmanyatamena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ tribhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyebhireva / [050/13]
SA01vakobhau:3386: yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca / [050/25]
SA01vakobhau:3388: yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca / [051/01]
SA01vakobhau:3412: yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca / [051/13]
SA01vakobhau:3438: atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ / [051/24]
SA01vakobhau:3449: vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā /
SA01vakobhau:3471: atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ / [052/10]
SA01vakobhau:3496: kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti / [052/20]
SA01vakobhau:3502: rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca / [052/22]
SA01vakobhau:3509: sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte /
SA01vakobhau:3512: sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ/ [052/25-053/01]
SA01vakobhau:3514: aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni / [053/01-053/02]
SA01vakobhau:3516: sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā / [053/02]
SA01vakobhau:3528: aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi / [053/06-053/07]
SA01vakobhau:3532: saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante / [053/08-053/09]
SA01vakobhau:3536: kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā / [053/10-053/11]
SA01vakobhau:3538: yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ / [053/11]
SA01vakobhau:3546: pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare / [053/13-053/14]
SA01vakobhau:3552: bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare / [053/15]
SA01vakobhau:3562: rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante / [053/19]
SA01vakobhau:3564: kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:3567: yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti / [053/20-053/21]
SA01vakobhau:3579: caturdravyako hi vaktavyo yāvatā bhūtānyapi spraṣṭavyāyatanam / [053/24-053/25]
SA01vakobhau:3581: kiñcidatra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśrayabhūtaṃ kiñcidatrāyatanaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśritabhūtam / [053/25-053/26]
SA01vakobhau:3583: evamapi bhūyāṃsi bhūtadravyāṇi bhavantyupādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt / [054/01]
SA01vakobhau:3603: yatkiṃ cidutpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā viprayuktā vā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhamutpadyate / [054/09]
SA01vakobhau:3607: prāptyā saha satvākhyamevotpadyate nānyaditi vikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ / [054/11]
SA01vakobhau:3614: pañca prakārāścaittā mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ akuśalamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāśca / [054/14]
SA01vakobhau:3618: yo hi yasya gativiśayaḥ sa tasya bhūmirityucyate / [054/15-054/16
SA01vakobhau:3620: tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti / [054/16]
SA01vakobhau:3624: vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3627: ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3650: sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu / [054/25-055/02]
SA01vakobhau:3652: rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ / [055/02-055/03]
SA01vakobhau:3654: kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti / [055/03]
SA01vakobhau:3659: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā // VAkK_2.25 // [055/06]
SA01vakobhau:3661: ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:3679: sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā / [055/10-055/11]
SA01vakobhau:3694: tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā / [055/14-055/15]
SA01vakobhau:3700: naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete / [055/17-055/18]
SA01vakobhau:3727: prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate / [055/25]
SA01vakobhau:3736: kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti / [056/03]
SA01vakobhau:3738: ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti / [056/04]
SA01vakobhau:3767: “āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce” ti / [056/14]
SA01vakobhau:3779: ata evocyate “ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta” iti / [056/19]
SA01vakobhau:3782: prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca / [056/19-056/20]
SA01vakobhau:3794: styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ / [056/23-056/24]
SA01vakobhau:3796: evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam / [056/24-056/25]
SA01vakobhau:3800: kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ / [056/26]
SA01vakobhau:3808: ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra // [057/01]
SA01vakobhau:3812: akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete / [057/03]
SA01vakobhau:3819: parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt / [057/07]
SA01vakobhau:3827: tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti / [057/10]
SA01vakobhau:3844: daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca / [057/16]
SA01vakobhau:3850: yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti / [057/18]
SA01vakobhau:3855: iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ / [057/19-057/21]
SA01vakobhau:3857: tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti / [057/21-057/22]
SA01vakobhau:3859: loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti / [057/22]
SA01vakobhau:3870: na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
SA01vakobhau:3883: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca / [058/06-058/07]
SA01vakobhau:3885: āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ / [058/07-058/08]
SA01vakobhau:3894: tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā / [058/11]
SA01vakobhau:3898: yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti / [058/13-058/14]
SA01vakobhau:3902: krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti / [058/15]
SA01vakobhau:3908: samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ / [058/16-058/17]
SA01vakobhau:3918: daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca / [058/20-058/21]
SA01vakobhau:3933: middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat // VAkK_2.30 // [058/27]
SA01vakobhau:3941: ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ [059/03]
SA01vakobhau:3945: ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam / [059/05]
SA01vakobhau:3950: ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva [059/07]
SA01vakobhau:3959: dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca / [059/11]
SA01vakobhau:3966: sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ “kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante” iti / [059/13-059/14]
SA01vakobhau:3970: “ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmi“ti / [059/15]
SA01vakobhau:3974: idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate / [059/16-059/17]
SA01vakobhau:3980: guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ // [059/21]
SA01vakobhau:3989: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam / [059/24]
SA01vakobhau:3993: abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate / [059/25]
SA01vakobhau:4004: evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ / [060/01-060/03]
SA01vakobhau:4006: na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam / [060/03-060/04]
SA01vakobhau:4012: pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ / [060/05]
SA01vakobhau:4038: pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu / [060/13]
SA01vakobhau:4061: nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete / [060/21]
SA01vakobhau:4063: dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:4066: tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ / [060/22]
SA01vakobhau:4083_1: evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ / [061/01-061/03]
SA01vakobhau:4085: evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau / [061/03-061/04]
SA01vakobhau:4097: tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ / [061/07-061/08]
SA01vakobhau:4099: yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti / [061/08-061/09]
SA01vakobhau:4112: naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare / [061/12]
SA01vakobhau:4121: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ // VAkK_2.33 // [061/17]
SA01vakobhau:4123: yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ / [061/17-061/18]
SA01vakobhau:4131: uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante / [061/21]
SA01vakobhau:4155: ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt / [062/05-062/06]
SA01vakobhau:4170: yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti / [062/10]
SA01vakobhau:4175: āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca // VAkK_2.35 // [062/13]
SA01vakobhau:4179: ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante / [062/15]
SA01vakobhau:4185: dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ / [062/18]
SA01vakobhau:4204: ata eva hi cottamabhidharme “anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ / [062/25]
SA01vakobhau:4210: pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ / [063/01-063/02]
SA01vakobhau:4216: yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ / [063/03]
SA01vakobhau:4223: sūtre hyustaṃ “sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa” iti vistaraḥ / [063/06]
SA01vakobhau:4225: tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /
SA01vakobhau:4229: “rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata” iti vistaraḥ / [063/08]
SA01vakobhau:4232: tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti / [063/09]
SA01vakobhau:4237: ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat / [063/11]
SA01vakobhau:4245: ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt / [063/13]
SA01vakobhau:4251: sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt / [063/15]
SA01vakobhau:4253: yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ / [063/15-063/16]
SA01vakobhau:4262: asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam / [063/18-063/19]
SA01vakobhau:4266: etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti / [063/20]
SA01vakobhau:4271: āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati / [063/22-063/23]
SA01vakobhau:4279: yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate / [063/25-063/26]
SA01vakobhau:4281: kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti / [063/26-063/27]
SA01vakobhau:4283: tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ / [063/27-064/01]
SA01vakobhau:4287: na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ / [064/02-064/03]
SA01vakobhau:4291: tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam / [064/05]
SA01vakobhau:4295: yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā / [064/06]
SA01vakobhau:4309: yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum / [064/10-064/11]
SA01vakobhau:4311: evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ / [064/11]
SA01vakobhau:4342: tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca / [064/24]
SA01vakobhau:4353: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca / [065/03-065/04]
SA01vakobhau:4361: tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī / [065/06-065/07]
SA01vakobhau:4371: teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya / [065/10-065/11]
SA01vakobhau:4390: dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā / [065/18-065/19]
SA01vakobhau:4392: teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ / [065/19-065/20]
SA01vakobhau:4403: yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti / [065/26]
SA01vakobhau:4453: anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt / [066/14-066/15]
SA01vakobhau:4486: yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca / [066/24]
SA01vakobhau:4505: tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca / [067/02-067/03]
SA01vakobhau:4507: prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā / [067/03-067/04]
SA01vakobhau:4509: evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante / [067/04-067/05]
SA01vakobhau:4511: tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti / [067/05-067/06]
SA01vakobhau:4513: tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti / [067/06-067/10]
SA01vakobhau:4515_2: ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ
SA01vakobhau:4521: itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ // [067/13]
SA01vakobhau:4528: sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā / [067/16]
SA01vakobhau:4535: bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā / [067/18-067/20]
SA01vakobhau:4537: punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca / [067/20-067/21]
SA01vakobhau:4541: syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti / [067/22]
SA01vakobhau:4553: yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena / [067/26]
SA01vakobhau:4557: naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ / [068/02]
SA01vakobhau:4561: śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate / [068/04-068/05]
SA01vakobhau:4571: sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā / [068/07-068/08]
SA01vakobhau:4573: astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / [068/08-068/09]
SA01vakobhau:4575: ustaṃ hi bhagavatā “sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmi“ti / [068/09]
SA01vakobhau:4580: ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat / [068/10-068/11]
SA01vakobhau:4590: asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante / [681/7-06817]
SA01vakobhau:4604: bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat / [068/22]
SA01vakobhau:4609: “prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt cyutirbhavatī“ti sūtre pāthaḥ / [068/24-068/25]
SA01vakobhau:4611: te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra / [068/25-068/26]
SA01vakobhau:4613: pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti / [068/26-068/27]
SA01vakobhau:4615: yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati / [068/27]
SA01vakobhau:4619: atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī / [068/28-068/29]
SA01vakobhau:4661: yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti / [069/13-069/14]
SA01vakobhau:4687: labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna tyajati / [069/23]
SA01vakobhau:4725: aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate / [070/13-070/14]
SA01vakobhau:4727: yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ / [070/14]
SA01vakobhau:4733: nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ / [070/17]
SA01vakobhau:4751: kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma / [070/24]
SA01vakobhau:4757: kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati / [070/27-071/01]
SA01vakobhau:4759: sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ / [071/01]
SA01vakobhau:4763: evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati / [071/02-071/03]
SA01vakobhau:4769: nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4776: satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt / [071/09]
SA01vakobhau:4790: kathaṃ tarhi “na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya” iti / [071/14-071/15]
SA01vakobhau:4800: ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete / [071/18-071/19]
SA01vakobhau:4802: ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate / [071/19-071/20]
SA01vakobhau:4806_0: syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ
SA01vakobhau:4806_1: nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava” iti / [071/22]
SA01vakobhau:4823_0: so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti caitat sthānamiti
SA01vakobhau:4823_1: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi
SA01vakobhau:4823_2: maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin
SA01vakobhau:4825: sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātī“ti / [072/06-072/07]
SA01vakobhau:4827: atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā / [072/07]
SA01vakobhau:4869: kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate / [072/20-072/21]
SA01vakobhau:4875: kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate / [072/22]
SA01vakobhau:4877: cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt / [072/22-072/23]
SA01vakobhau:4879: evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt / [072/23-072/24]
SA01vakobhau:4881: anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ / [072/24-072/25]
SA01vakobhau:4883: bhadantavasumitrastvāha paripṛcchāyāṃ “yasyācittikā nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiri“ti / [072/26] ti /
SA01vakobhau:4890: sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā / [072/28]
SA01vakobhau:4897: satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti / [073/02]
SA01vakobhau:4901: avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat / [073/04]
SA01vakobhau:4909: samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ / [073/06]
SA01vakobhau:4911: kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ / [073/07]
SA01vakobhau:4918: samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati / [073/09]
SA01vakobhau:4922: yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate / [073/11]
SA01vakobhau:4928: cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti / [073/13]
SA01vakobhau:4939: etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti / [073/18]
SA01vakobhau:4948: tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ / [073/22-073/23]
SA01vakobhau:4952: evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate / [073/24]
SA01vakobhau:4962: ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya / [073/27-073/28]
SA01vakobhau:4968: na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti / [074/02]
SA01vakobhau:4982: yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate / [074/06-074/07]
SA01vakobhau:4986: yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti / [074/08-074/09]
SA01vakobhau:4988: tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca / [074/09-074/10]
SA01vakobhau:5015: kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam / [074/17]
SA01vakobhau:5025: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam / [074/20-074/21]
SA01vakobhau:5027: samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vaktavyam” / [074/21]
SA01vakobhau:5033: yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam / [074/23-074/24]
SA01vakobhau:5045: ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca / [074/27-074/28]
SA01vakobhau:5047: teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā/ [074/28]
SA01vakobhau:5058: atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā / [075/07-075/08]
SA01vakobhau:5062: anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti / [075/09-075/10]
SA01vakobhau:5064: nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti / [075/10]
SA01vakobhau:5080: ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ / [075/14-074/15]
SA01vakobhau:5082: eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate / [075/15-075/16]
SA01vakobhau:5086: yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt / [075/16-075/17]
SA01vakobhau:5088: santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti / [075/17-075/18]
SA01vakobhau:5098: yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate / [075/21]
SA01vakobhau:5102: tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati / [075/22-075/23]
SA01vakobhau:5113: jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti / [075/25-076/01]
SA01vakobhau:5115: ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham / [076/01-076/02]
SA01vakobhau:5121: tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ / [076/03-076/04]
SA01vakobhau:5123: tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi / [076/04-076/05]
SA01vakobhau:5131: anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre / [076/07]
SA01vakobhau:5135: eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti / [076/09]
SA01vakobhau:5161: jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate / [076/18]
SA01vakobhau:5169: tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni / [076/20-076/21]
SA01vakobhau:5171: tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim / [076/21-076/22]
SA01vakobhau:5179: nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante / [076/24]
SA01vakobhau:5184: nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti / [076/26-076/27]
SA01vakobhau:5186: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapī” ti / [076/27]
SA01vakobhau:5193: avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante / [076/29-077/02]
SA01vakobhau:5195: tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha “triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni” / [077/02]
SA01vakobhau:5204: punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta / [077/05-077/06]
SA01vakobhau:5206: maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi / [077/06-077/07]
SA01vakobhau:5214: evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ “viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantī“ti / [077/10]
SA01vakobhau:5224: “kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:5225: na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā //“ [077/17]
SA01vakobhau:5235: yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam “ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ / [077/20]
SA01vakobhau:5244: pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi dravyāntarakalpanayā / [077/22]
SA01vakobhau:5262: nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante / [077/27-077/29]
SA01vakobhau:5264: antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti / [077/29]
SA01vakobhau:5270: ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ / [078/02-078/04]
SA01vakobhau:5272_0: samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā “saṃskṛtaṃ nāma
SA01vakobhau:5272_1: yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ
SA01vakobhau:5274: kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate / [078/05-078/08]
SA01vakobhau:5276_0: kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnā-lāṅgūla-kakuda-śapha-viṣāṇādīni
SA01vakobhau:5276_1: ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni / [078/08-078/09]
SA01vakobhau:5278: yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat / [078/09]
SA01vakobhau:5282: naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate / [078/10-078/11]
SA01vakobhau:5284: gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ / [078/11-078/12]
SA01vakobhau:5286: tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante / [078/12]
SA01vakobhau:5292: eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt / [078/14]
SA01vakobhau:5295: anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti / [078/14-078/16]
SA01vakobhau:5297: yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā / [078/16]
SA01vakobhau:5301: kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet / [078/17-078/18]
SA01vakobhau:5303: satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam / [078/18-078/20]
SA01vakobhau:5305: uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam / [078/20-078/21]
SA01vakobhau:5307: sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ / [078/21-078/22]
SA01vakobhau:5309: yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti / [078/22-078/24]
SA01vakobhau:5311: kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate / [078/24]
SA01vakobhau:5313: athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti / [078/25-078/26]
SA01vakobhau:5315: evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti / [078/26]
SA01vakobhau:5329: śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum / [078/29-079/01]
SA01vakobhau:5336: yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām / [079/02-078/04]
SA01vakobhau:5338: nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam / [079/04-079/05]
SA01vakobhau:5340: sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat / [079/05-079/06]
SA01vakobhau:5342: sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ / [079/06]
SA01vakobhau:5346: jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā /
SA01vakobhau:5356: yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo “vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatī“ti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā / [079/12-079/15]
SA01vakobhau:5358_0: tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā
SA01vakobhau:5360: tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati / [079/17]
SA01vakobhau:5362: apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:5371: sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ / [079/21]
SA01vakobhau:5377: jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti / [079/23-079/24]
SA01vakobhau:5381: tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhi-siddhyartham / [079/24-079/26]
SA01vakobhau:5395: tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti / [080/02-080/03]
SA01vakobhau:5401: yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate / [080/05]
SA01vakobhau:5406: yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam / [080/06-080/08]
SA01vakobhau:5408: yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ / [080/08]
SA01vakobhau:5410: siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [080/09-080/10]
SA01vakobhau:5412: nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante / [080/10-080/11]
SA01vakobhau:5427: vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā “anityā vata saṃskārā” ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante / [080/16-080/17]
SA01vakobhau:5433: na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ / [080/19]
SA01vakobhau:5446: padakāyaḥ tadyathā “sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami” tyevamādi / [080/23-080/24]
SA01vakobhau:5448: vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi / [080/24-080/25]
SA01vakobhau:5450: nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti / [080/25]
SA01vakobhau:5455: ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante / [080/26]
SA01vakobhau:5459: vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk / [080/28]
SA01vakobhau:5468: yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti / [081/05-081/06]
SA01vakobhau:5470: taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā / [081/06]
SA01vakobhau:5472: idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti / [081/06-081/07]
SA01vakobhau:5478: ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati / [081/09]
SA01vakobhau:5482: ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati / [081/11]
SA01vakobhau:5486: na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet / [081/12-081/13]
SA01vakobhau:5490: evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta / [081/14-081/15]
SA01vakobhau:5492: athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti / [081/15-081/16]
SA01vakobhau:5494: atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt / [081/16]
SA01vakobhau:5496: eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ / [081/16-081/18]
SA01vakobhau:5498: vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate / [081/18-081/19]
SA01vakobhau:5502: evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād / [081/19-081/21]
SA01vakobhau:5504: apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam / [081/21-081/22]
SA01vakobhau:5510: atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate / [081/25]
SA01vakobhau:5518: santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [081/28]
SA01vakobhau:5522: atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam / [082/02]
SA01vakobhau:5529: ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare / [082/05]
SA01vakobhau:5532: yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate / [082/05-082/06]
SA01vakobhau:5536: yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca / [082/08]
SA01vakobhau:5564: yaktūktaṃ “janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā” iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ / [082/21-082/22]
SA01vakobhau:5571: kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti / [082/24]
SA01vakobhau:5577: saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati / [082/27]
SA01vakobhau:5581_0: nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti jñānameṣāṃ
SA01vakobhau:5581_1: vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ
SA01vakobhau:5587: tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti / [083/04-083/06]
SA01vakobhau:5589: yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau / [083/06-083/07]
SA01vakobhau:5591: asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ / [083/07-083/08]
SA01vakobhau:5593: asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ / [083/08-083/09]
SA01vakobhau:5595: yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti / [083/10-083/11]
SA01vakobhau:5597: yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti / [083/11-083/12]
SA01vakobhau:5601: yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti / [083/13]
SA01vakobhau:5609: tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam / [083/16]
SA01vakobhau:5618: mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /
SA01vakobhau:5628: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam / [083/23-083/24]
SA01vakobhau:5630: vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam // [083/25]
SA01vakobhau:5634: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca / [083/27]
SA01vakobhau:5675: satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ / [084/13]
SA01vakobhau:5679: ye tarhi “tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi” tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ / [084/15]
SA01vakobhau:5688_0: anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ
SA01vakobhau:5688_1: ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt / [084/19-084/20]
SA01vakobhau:5694: kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti / [084/22]
SA01vakobhau:5698: saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti / [084/24]
SA01vakobhau:5704: yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti / [084/26-085/01]
SA01vakobhau:5706: sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ / [085/01]
SA01vakobhau:5710: atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ / [085/03-085/04]
SA01vakobhau:5716: kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā / [085/06-085/07]
SA01vakobhau:5718: eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ / [085/08]
SA01vakobhau:5724: sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām / [085/12]
SA01vakobhau:5733: bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam / [085/15-085/16]
SA01vakobhau:5735: ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate “atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati” riti / [085/17]
SA01vakobhau:5743: svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ / [085/19-085/20]
SA01vakobhau:5755: te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām / [085/24]
SA01vakobhau:5769: pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ / [086/02]
SA01vakobhau:5775: idapi śāstraṃ “yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ / [086/04]
SA01vakobhau:5781: yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ “na kadācinna heturi“ti / [086/06-086/08]
SA01vakobhau:5783: tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati / [086/08-086/10]
SA01vakobhau:5785: ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi / [086/10]
SA01vakobhau:5789: yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam / [086/11]
SA01vakobhau:5793: evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta / [086/12-086/13]
SA01vakobhau:5797_0: yattarhīdamuktam “anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā
SA01vakobhau:5797_1: yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu
SA01vakobhau:5799: anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti / [086/16-086/18]
SA01vakobhau:5801: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā” iti / [086/18]
SA01vakobhau:5809: nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam / [086/20-086/21]
SA01vakobhau:5815: kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt / [086/22]
SA01vakobhau:5835: vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt / [086/27]
SA01vakobhau:5849: yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ / [087/05]
SA01vakobhau:5855: anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ / [087/07]
SA01vakobhau:5859: āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt / [087/08-087/09]
SA01vakobhau:5869: tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya / [087/12-087/13]
SA01vakobhau:5883: kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā / [087/17]
SA01vakobhau:5891: kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:5903: ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām / [087/26-087/27]
SA01vakobhau:5915: teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ / [088/01-088/02]
SA01vakobhau:5917: upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ / [088/02]
SA01vakobhau:5925: te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam / [088/05]
SA01vakobhau:5931: tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti / [088/07-088/08]
SA01vakobhau:5933: ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām/ [088/08-088/09]
SA01vakobhau:5935: sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ / [088/09-088/10]
SA01vakobhau:5939: syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ / [088/11-088/12]
SA01vakobhau:5941: syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ / [088/12]
SA01vakobhau:5945: tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi / [088/14]
SA01vakobhau:5958: evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām / [088/18]
SA01vakobhau:5964: samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ / [088/20-088/22]
SA01vakobhau:5966: samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ / [088/22]
SA01vakobhau:5981: ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ / [088/27]
SA01vakobhau:5989: svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ / [089/04]
SA01vakobhau:5995: nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante / [089/06-089/07]
SA01vakobhau:5999: sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ / [089/08-089/09]
SA01vakobhau:6003: kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti / [089/09-089/10]
SA01vakobhau:6009_0: duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ
SA01vakobhau:6009_1: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatya“miti / [089/13]
SA01vakobhau:6011: idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “syāddharmo 'kuśalo 'kuśalahetuka eva / [089/14-089/15]
SA01vakobhau:6013: syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotī“ti / [089/15]
SA01vakobhau:6043: kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ / [089/24]
SA01vakobhau:6047: yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ “vīpākajaṃ cakṣuri“ti etanna prāpnoti / [089/25-089/26]
SA01vakobhau:6049: atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ “karmaṇo vipāka” ityetanna prāpnoti / [089/26]
SA01vakobhau:6079: dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ / [090/08-090/09]
SA01vakobhau:6089: asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam / [090/12]
SA01vakobhau:6091: yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane / [090/12-090/13]
SA01vakobhau:6093: evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni / [090/13-090/14]
SA01vakobhau:6101: asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate / [090/16-090/17]
SA01vakobhau:6113: na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti / [090/20-090/21]
SA01vakobhau:6117: na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya / [090/22]
SA01vakobhau:6123: ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate / [090/25]
SA01vakobhau:6146: evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ / [091/04]
SA01vakobhau:6157: yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat / [091/08]
SA01vakobhau:6159: kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam / [091/09]
SA01vakobhau:6191: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam bhaviṣyati“ [091/18]
SA01vakobhau:6202: ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti / [091/21-091/23]
SA01vakobhau:6204: nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ / [091/23-091/24]
SA01vakobhau:6206: ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtre na tvanāvaraṇaheturiti na sūtre sidhyatyasaṃskṛtasya hetubhāvaḥ / [091/24]
SA01vakobhau:6210: sūtrāṇi ca bahūnyantarhitānīti kathametannirdhāryate nokta iti / [091/26]
SA01vakobhau:6215: tadānīṃ “pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamo yo visaṃyoga” ityuktamidānīṃ isaṃyogaḥkathamaḥ / [092/01]
SA01vakobhau:6225: etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram / [092/03-092/04]
SA01vakobhau:6248: yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti / [092/12]
SA01vakobhau:6250: so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau / [092/12-092/13]
SA01vakobhau:6252: ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare / [092/13-092/14]
SA01vakobhau:6260: na vai sa pratisaṃkhyāpūrvako nahi poūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyā paścādanutpannānāmanutpādaḥ / [092/16]
SA01vakobhau:6266: vinā tu pratisaṃkhyayā ye dharmā utpatsyante tadutpannāyāṃ pratisaṃkhyāyāṃ punarnopapadyanta iti / [092/18-092/19]
SA01vakobhau:6270: yadi narhi anutpāda eva nirvāṇamidaṃ sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “pañcemānīndriyāṇi āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulīkṛtānyatītānāgatapratyūtpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvarttanta” iti / [092/21-092/22]
SA01vakobhau:6276: kiṃ tu tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt duḥkhasya prahāṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā “yo rūpe cchandarāgastaṃ prajahīta / [092/24-092/25]
SA01vakobhau:6278: cchandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vastadrūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pārijñātaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānami“ti / [092/25]
SA01vakobhau:6285_0: athavā 'yamabhiprāyo bhavedatītaḥ kleśaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ pratyutpannaḥ kleśa aihajanmiko
SA01vakobhau:6287: tenā ca kleśadvayenāsyāṃ santatau bījabhāva āhito 'nāgatasyotpattaye / [093/01]
SA01vakobhau:6293: anāgatasya punarduḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījābhāvāt atyantamanutpādaḥ prahāṇam / [093/03-093/04]
SA01vakobhau:6297: nahi niruddhe nirodhābhimukhe ca yatnaḥ sārthako bhavatīti / [093/04-093/06]
SA01vakobhau:6300: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā “ye keciddharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā 'saṃskṛtā vā virāgasteṣāmagra ākhyāyate” iti kathamasatāmasannagro bhavitumarhati / [093/06-093/07]
SA01vakobhau:6306: tadyathā asti śabdasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva ityucyate / [093/08]
SA01vakobhau:6312: abhāvo 'pi ca kaścit praśasyatamo bhavati yaḥ sakalasyopadravasyātyantamabhāva ityanyeṣāṃ so 'gra iti praśaṃsāṃ labdhumarhati / [093/10]
SA01vakobhau:6322: ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyaṃ syāt / [093/14-093/15]
SA01vakobhau:6324: ustaṃ yathāryasatyaṃ dvitīyasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭamuddṛṣṭaṃ ceti tṛtīyaṃ bhavati / [093/15-093/16]
