SA01vakobhau:6336: devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate / [093/19]
SA01vakobhau:6341: nahi tasya rūpavedanādivat svabhāva upalabhyate nacāpi cakṣurādivatkarma / [093/20-093/21]
SA01vakobhau:6343: amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate / [093/21-093/22]
SA01vakobhau:6345: nahi tasya tena sārdhaṃ kaścitsaṃbandho hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt / [093/22]
SA01vakobhau:6349: bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa tasyeti vyavadiśyate / [093/24]
SA01vakobhau:6363: “yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati sandhiranutpādo 'prādurbhāvaḥ / [094/01-094/02]
SA01vakobhau:6365: etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa” miti / [094/02-094/03]
SA01vakobhau:6372: nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt / [094/05-094/06]
SA01vakobhau:6374: atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ / [094/06-094/07]
SA01vakobhau:6376: ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati / [094/08]
SA01vakobhau:6380: yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti / [094/09-094/10]
SA01vakobhau:6394: svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ “yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastune“ti / [094/12]
SA01vakobhau:6402: yathoktaṃ “yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminni“ti / [094/14-094/15]
SA01vakobhau:6413: tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti /
SA01vakobhau:6416: athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ / [094/19]
SA01vakobhau:6430: etadeva aṅgībhāvo 'pi cāsti kāraṇahetostadyathā “pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣudaśānāmāyatanānāṃ bhājanaloke ca karmaṇām / [094/24-094/25]
SA01vakobhau:6456: yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati / [095/07]
SA01vakobhau:6463: kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam / [095/10]
SA01vakobhau:6478: tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ / [095/16]
SA01vakobhau:6499: yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate / [095/22-095/23]
SA01vakobhau:6501: yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ / [095/23-095/24]
SA01vakobhau:6503: yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ / [095/24-095/25]
SA01vakobhau:6505: atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate / [095/25]
SA01vakobhau:6523: tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi / [096/05-096/06]
SA01vakobhau:6539: athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā / [096/12]
SA01vakobhau:6546: sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate / [096/15]
SA01vakobhau:6563: nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ / [096/21]
SA01vakobhau:6565: phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ / [096/21-096/22]
SA01vakobhau:6567: asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ / [096/22-096/23]
SA01vakobhau:6569: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti / [096/23-096/24]
SA01vakobhau:6571: dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate / [096/24]
SA01vakobhau:6575: syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu / [096/25]
SA01vakobhau:6581: kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate / [096/28]
SA01vakobhau:6601: kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /
SA01vakobhau:6604: prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti / [097/06]
SA01vakobhau:6619: yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ / [097/11]
SA01vakobhau:6639: tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ / [097/17-097/18]
SA01vakobhau:6648: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ // VAkK_2.60 // [097/22]
SA01vakobhau:6650: kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante / [097/22-097/23]
SA01vakobhau:6652: vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva / [097/23-097/24]
SA01vakobhau:6654: śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante / [097/24-097/25]
SA01vakobhau:6656: prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante / [097/26]
SA01vakobhau:6662: atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha / [097/29]
SA01vakobhau:6666: prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ / [098/01]
SA01vakobhau:6698: ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ / [098/12-098/13]
SA01vakobhau:6700: tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ / [098/14-098/15]
SA01vakobhau:6702: avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ / [098/15]
SA01vakobhau:6711: tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti / [098/17-098/18]
SA01vakobhau:6725: sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam / [098/23]
SA01vakobhau:6729: tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eve“ti vistaraḥ / [098/24-098/26]
SA01vakobhau:6731: yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti / [098/26]
SA01vakobhau:6743: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti / [099/02]
SA01vakobhau:6747: atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ / [099/04]
SA01vakobhau:6751: tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti / [099/05]
SA01vakobhau:6755: yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti / [099/07-099/08]
SA01vakobhau:6757: evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt / [099/08]
SA01vakobhau:6761: phalacihnabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ santatau cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣo 'sti yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti / [099/10-099/11]
SA01vakobhau:6763: naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī / [099/11]
SA01vakobhau:6769: atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ / [099/14]
SA01vakobhau:6771: evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti / [099/15]
SA01vakobhau:6781: nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti / [099/18-099/19]
SA01vakobhau:6787: kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate / [099/21-099/22]
SA01vakobhau:6793: prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ / [099/23-099/24]
SA01vakobhau:6795: dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ / [099/24-099/25]
SA01vakobhau:6797: tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā / [099/25-099/26]
SA01vakobhau:6799: caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca / [099/26-099/27]
SA01vakobhau:6805: ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye / [100/01-100/02]
SA01vakobhau:6824: yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya nālambanam/ [100/07]
SA01vakobhau:6830: ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ / [100/09]
SA01vakobhau:6843: ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ / [100/13-100/14]
SA01vakobhau:6849: na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti / [100/15-100/16]
SA01vakobhau:6863: athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti / [100/19-100/20]
SA01vakobhau:6905: tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ / [101/09-101/10]
SA01vakobhau:6909: ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca / [101/10-101/11]
SA01vakobhau:6920: sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ / [101/15]
SA01vakobhau:6932: anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva / [101/20-101/21]
SA01vakobhau:6934: āha tu “pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti / [101/21]
SA01vakobhau:6939: nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti / [101/23]
SA01vakobhau:6945: yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt / [101/26]
SA01vakobhau:6949: sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi / [101/27]
SA01vakobhau:6955: kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt / [102/02-102/04]
SA01vakobhau:6968: yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin / [102/08-102/09]
SA01vakobhau:6970: yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya / [102/09]
SA01vakobhau:6978: ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt / [102/13]
SA01vakobhau:6980: sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat / [102/14]
SA01vakobhau:6994: svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti / [102/17-102/18]
SA01vakobhau:6996: akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti / [102/19]
SA01vakobhau:6998: gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ “dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta” iti / [102/20]
SA01vakobhau:7041: bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ / [103/09-103/10]
SA01vakobhau:7043: abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti / [103/10]
SA01vakobhau:7075: kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante / [103/21]
SA01vakobhau:7094: tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate / [103/26-103/27]
SA01vakobhau:7106: śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate / [104/04]
SA01vakobhau:7139: rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante / [104/17-104/18]
SA01vakobhau:7145: rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate / [104/20-104/21]
SA01vakobhau:7191: ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [105/13]
SA01vakobhau:7195: ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam / [105/16]
SA01vakobhau:7228: prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā // VAkK_2.71 // [106/04]
SA01vakobhau:7230: triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:7271: svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [106/20-106/21]
SA01vakobhau:7279: svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [106/23]
SA01vakobhau:7292: svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe / [106/27-106/28]
SA01vakobhau:7294: te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat / [106/28]
SA01vakobhau:7310: kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca / [107/05]
SA01vakobhau:7314: kāmāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ svebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatreryāpathikavipākajābhyāmārūpyāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [107/07]
SA01vakobhau:7318: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam/ [107/08-107/09]
SA01vakobhau:7328: kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt / [107/12-107/13]
SA01vakobhau:7332: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam / [107/14-107/15]
SA01vakobhau:7346: rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca / [107/18]
SA01vakobhau:7360: svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe / [107/22]
SA01vakobhau:7387: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam / [108/02-108/03]
SA01vakobhau:7421: trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati “aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatī“ti / [108/16]
SA01vakobhau:7426: aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti / [108/18]
SA01vakobhau:7432: syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād / [108/21]
SA01vakobhau:7442: nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati / [108/25-108/26]
SA01vakobhau:7444: tadyathā “sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇa“miti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati / [108/26]
SA01vakobhau:7448: anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam / [108/27-108/28]
SA01vakobhau:7473: yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ / [109/05]
SA01vakobhau:7475: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ [109/06]
SA01vakobhau:7477: kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ / [109/06-109/07]
SA01vakobhau:7481: akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca / [109/09]
SA01vakobhau:7499: rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ / [109/18]
SA01vakobhau:7511: yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya / [109/23]
SA01vakobhau:7515: “kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7516: ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu //“ [109/26]
SA01vakobhau:7518: tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam / [109/26-110/02]
SA01vakobhau:7557: ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena / [111/09]
SA01vakobhau:7566: saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti / [111/12]
SA01vakobhau:7572: ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni / [111/14-111/15]
SA01vakobhau:7574: kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam / [111/15]
SA01vakobhau:7596: caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ / [111/25-111/26]
SA01vakobhau:7600: brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti / [112/01]
SA01vakobhau:7606: atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ / [112/03]
SA01vakobhau:7618: yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti / [112/07-112/08]
SA01vakobhau:7622: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate / [112/11]
SA01vakobhau:7624: nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ // VAkK_3.3 // [112/12]
SA01vakobhau:7628: rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ / [112/14]
SA01vakobhau:7636: tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa / [112/15-112/16]
SA01vakobhau:7640: yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate / [112/17]
SA01vakobhau:7644: rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /
SA01vakobhau:7653: tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ / [112/21-112/23]
SA01vakobhau:7655: api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ / [112/23]
SA01vakobhau:7662: kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca / [112/26]
SA01vakobhau:7673: kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti / [113/01]
SA01vakobhau:7680: “na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7681: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam” //
SA01vakobhau:7687: “na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /
SA01vakobhau:7692: te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7693: śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi”// [113/11-113/12]
SA01vakobhau:7695: kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ / [113/12]
SA01vakobhau:7742: pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat / [113/25]
SA01vakobhau:7746: tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā “īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām / [113/27-113/28]
SA01vakobhau:7748: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca / [113/28-113/29]
SA01vakobhau:7750: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmi“ti / [113/29]
SA01vakobhau:7763: yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam / [114/04-114/05]
SA01vakobhau:7777: kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante / [114/10]
SA01vakobhau:7791: prajñyaptipūktam “catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ / [114/15]
SA01vakobhau:7798: catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśce“ti / [114/18-114/19]
SA01vakobhau:7804: “sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava” iti / [114/20-114/21]
SA01vakobhau:7806: atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ / [114/21]
SA01vakobhau:7815: teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate / [114/26-224/26]
SA01vakobhau:7817: nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati / [114/26-114/27]
SA01vakobhau:7825: pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva / [115/02-115/03]
SA01vakobhau:7855: yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt / [115/10-115/11]
SA01vakobhau:7857: yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ “nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī“ti / [115/11-115/12]
SA01vakobhau:7859: nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti / [115/12-115/13]
SA01vakobhau:7863: gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham / [115/14-115/15]
SA01vakobhau:7865: avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ / [115/15]
SA01vakobhau:7879: sūtre uktaḥ “rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ / [115/22]
SA01vakobhau:7896: rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ / [115/27]
SA01vakobhau:7900: te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti / [115/28-115/29]
SA01vakobhau:7904: anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ / [115/31-116/02]
SA01vakobhau:7906: yadidamuktaṃ sūtre “teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmi“ti / [116/02]
SA01vakobhau:7908: asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti / [116/02-116/03]
SA01vakobhau:7914: tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ / [116/05]
SA01vakobhau:7920: kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma “imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantami“ti / [116/08-116/09]
SA01vakobhau:7922: tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva / [116/09-116/10]
SA01vakobhau:7924: rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ / [116/10]
SA01vakobhau:7930: anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran / [116/12-116/13]
SA01vakobhau:7936: te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti / [116/15-116/16]
SA01vakobhau:7938: sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti / [116/16-116/17]
SA01vakobhau:7940: yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti / [116/17]
SA01vakobhau:7948: śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate / [116/19-116/20]
SA01vakobhau:7952: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante / [116/22]
SA01vakobhau:7956: tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti / [116/24-116/25]
SA01vakobhau:7958: mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ / [116/25]
SA01vakobhau:7962: ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi / [116/27-116/28]
SA01vakobhau:7964: rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ / [116/28]
SA01vakobhau:7972: tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ / [117/02-117/03]
SA01vakobhau:7974: dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ / [117/03-117/04]
SA01vakobhau:7991: atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ / [117/08]
SA01vakobhau:7993: kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate [117/08-117/09]
SA01vakobhau:8006: caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti / [117/14]
SA01vakobhau:8023: anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra [117/21]
SA01vakobhau:8028: rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti / [117/23]
SA01vakobhau:8043: na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti / [117/28-117/29]
SA01vakobhau:8045: kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti / [117/29]
SA01vakobhau:8053: yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ / [118/03]
SA01vakobhau:8055: natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [118/03-118/04]
SA01vakobhau:8057: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti / [118/04-118/05]
SA01vakobhau:8059: yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhami“ti / [118/05]
SA01vakobhau:8065: evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ / [118/07-118/08]
SA01vakobhau:8067: pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti / [118/08]
SA01vakobhau:8075: api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ / [118/11-118/13]
SA01vakobhau:8077: vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa / [118/13-118/14]
SA01vakobhau:8079: ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ / [118/15-118/16]
SA01vakobhau:8081: atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta / [118/16]
SA01vakobhau:8083: naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta / [118/17]
SA01vakobhau:8093: dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ / [118/20-118/21]
SA01vakobhau:8122: ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante / [119/01-119/02]
SA01vakobhau:8129: atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha [119/04]
SA01vakobhau:8135: aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni / [119/07]
SA01vakobhau:8159: “pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān / [119/16]
SA01vakobhau:8161: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me //“ [119/17]
SA01vakobhau:8166: atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate / [119/18-119/19]
SA01vakobhau:8170_1: cānyeṣāṃ bahumānādarāvarjanārthaṃ manuṣyabhūtā api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham / [119/21-119/23]
SA01vakobhau:8172_0: itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ
SA01vakobhau:8172_1: piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke
SA01vakobhau:8176_0: śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ
SA01vakobhau:8176_1: ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate
SA01vakobhau:8178: ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ / [119/27]
SA01vakobhau:8182: yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre “upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthami“ti / [120/02]
SA01vakobhau:8186: bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti / [120/04]
SA01vakobhau:8191: sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti / [120/06]
SA01vakobhau:8197: maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate / [120/09]
SA01vakobhau:8224: santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya / [120/19-120/920]
SA01vakobhau:8228: vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya / [120/21]
SA01vakobhau:8242: tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca / [120/26-120/27]
SA01vakobhau:8244: na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt / [120/27-120/30]
SA01vakobhau:8246_1: 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti
SA01vakobhau:8250: upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ / [121/02]
SA01vakobhau:8256: anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam / [121/04-121/05]
SA01vakobhau:8262: sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati // [121/06]
SA01vakobhau:8264: acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ / [121/06-121/07]
SA01vakobhau:8276: santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca / [121/12]
SA01vakobhau:8282: bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate / [121/14-121/16]
SA01vakobhau:8284: nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ / [121/16]
SA01vakobhau:8286: na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti / [121/16-121/17]
SA01vakobhau:8288: yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate / [121/17-121/18]
SA01vakobhau:8299: narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti / [121/21]
SA01vakobhau:8308: mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca / [121/24]
SA01vakobhau:8323: kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā / [121/28-122/01]
SA01vakobhau:8325: yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā” iti / [122/02]
SA01vakobhau:8341: upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /
SA01vakobhau:8353: tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ / [122/12]
SA01vakobhau:8359: nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā // [122/14]
SA01vakobhau:8363: āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī / [122/16-122/17]
SA01vakobhau:8365: sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā / [122/17]
SA01vakobhau:8369: prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti / [122/18]
SA01vakobhau:8375: upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante / [122/21]
SA01vakobhau:8384: saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ // [122/25]
SA01vakobhau:8391: kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca / [123/01-123/02]
SA01vakobhau:8393: yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ / [123/02-123/03]
SA01vakobhau:8395: yattarhi sūtra uttam “atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita” iti / [123/03]
SA01vakobhau:8403: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante / [123/06]
SA01vakobhau:8405: ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti / [123/07-123/08]
SA01vakobhau:8407: idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate “pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata” iti / [123/08]
SA01vakobhau:8418: na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati / [123/10-123/11]
SA01vakobhau:8429: vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave” ti // [123/15]
SA01vakobhau:8449: ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati / [123/23-123/25]
SA01vakobhau:8451: evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet / [123/25-123/26]
SA01vakobhau:8453: pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ / [123/26]
SA01vakobhau:8457: sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat / [123/27-123/28]
SA01vakobhau:8461: pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca / [124/01-124/02]
SA01vakobhau:8463: ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ / [124/03]
SA01vakobhau:8465: yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt / [124/03-124/04]
SA01vakobhau:8472: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ” // [124/07]
SA01vakobhau:8474: naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa / [124/07-124/08]
SA01vakobhau:8476: ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti / [124/08]
SA01vakobhau:8487: kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti / [124/12]
SA01vakobhau:8491: yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi / [124/13-124/14]
SA01vakobhau:8497: bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā / [124/15]
SA01vakobhau:8513: tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ / [124/21]
SA01vakobhau:8515: caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate / [124/22]
SA01vakobhau:8523: yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti / [125/01]
SA01vakobhau:8555: tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate / [125/12]
SA01vakobhau:8557: yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā / [125/13]
SA01vakobhau:8582: yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:8587: yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta / [126/01-126/02]
SA01vakobhau:8589: kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam / [126/02]
SA01vakobhau:8597: te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti / [126/05-126/07]
SA01vakobhau:8599: athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra / [126/07-126/08]
SA01vakobhau:8601: tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām / [126/08-126/09]
SA01vakobhau:8603: ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā “acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka” iti / [126/09]
SA01vakobhau:8607: yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante / [126/10]
SA01vakobhau:8613: sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti / [126/12]
SA01vakobhau:8615: niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati / [126/12-126/13]
SA01vakobhau:8619: athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare / [126/14-126/15]
SA01vakobhau:8621: tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām / [126/15-126/17]
SA01vakobhau:8623_0: gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa
SA01vakobhau:8623_1: gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti / [126/17-126/18]
SA01vakobhau:8625: na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat / [126/19]
SA01vakobhau:8631: sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate / [126/21-126/22]
SA01vakobhau:8633: tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari / [126/22-126/23]
SA01vakobhau:8637: evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau “gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti / [126/24-126/25]
SA01vakobhau:8639: sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate / [126/25-126/26]
SA01vakobhau:8645: sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī / [127/01]
SA01vakobhau:8647: athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati / [127/01-127/02]
SA01vakobhau:8651: athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti” / [127/03]
SA01vakobhau:8660: anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati / [127/06-127/07]
SA01vakobhau:8664: evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati “mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasye“ti / [127/08-127/09]
SA01vakobhau:8666: tathā “dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta” iti / [127/09]
SA01vakobhau:8673: evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate / [127/11]
SA01vakobhau:8681: saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam / [127/15]
SA01vakobhau:8689: sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam / [127/17-127/18]
SA01vakobhau:8693: punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati / [127/19-127/20]
SA01vakobhau:8695: yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ / [127/20-127/21]
SA01vakobhau:8697: tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat / [127/22]
SA01vakobhau:8732: kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi / [128/10]
SA01vakobhau:8740: aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:8746: tadyathā “saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotī“ti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke / [128/16]
SA01vakobhau:8750: kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan / [128/18-128/19]
SA01vakobhau:8752: alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete / [128/19]
SA01vakobhau:8756: śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti / [128/21-128/22]
SA01vakobhau:8760: maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā 'bhirohāmi kūṭāgāraṃ vā paryaṅka veti / [128/23]
SA01vakobhau:8766: saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti / [128/25-128/26]
SA01vakobhau:8779: sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati / [128/30]
SA01vakobhau:8793: ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam / [129/04]
SA01vakobhau:8799: yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti / [129/06]
SA01vakobhau:8805: kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate / [129/09]
SA01vakobhau:8809: evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt / [129/11-129/12]
SA01vakobhau:8811: tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ ”/ [129/12]
SA01vakobhau:8819: evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti / [129/16]
SA01vakobhau:8825: kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ / [129/18-129/19]
SA01vakobhau:8827: kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti / [129/19-129/20]
SA01vakobhau:8829: tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ / [129/20-129/21]
SA01vakobhau:8831: tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti / [129/21]
SA01vakobhau:8839: nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt / [129/24-129/25]
SA01vakobhau:8841: ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati / [129/25]
SA01vakobhau:8855_0: tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā
SA01vakobhau:8855_1: vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti / [130/08-130/09]
SA01vakobhau:8857: sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate / [130/09-130/15]
SA01vakobhau:8859_0: yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva
SA01vakobhau:8859_1: vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena
SA01vakobhau:8859_2: supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya
SA01vakobhau:8861: sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate / [130/16-130/20]
SA01vakobhau:8863_0: atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ
SA01vakobhau:8863_1: taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti
SA01vakobhau:8863_2: stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti / [130/20-130/21]
SA01vakobhau:8865: tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti / [130/21-130/22]
SA01vakobhau:8867: saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti / [130/23]
SA01vakobhau:8871: etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam / [130/25-130/26]
SA01vakobhau:8873: ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt / [130/27-130/28]
SA01vakobhau:8875: dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ / [130/28-131/01]
SA01vakobhau:8888: tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca / [131/06-131/07]
SA01vakobhau:8906: parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate / [131/14]
SA01vakobhau:8910: tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ / [131/15-131/16]
SA01vakobhau:8914: yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ / [131/18]
SA01vakobhau:8932: pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ / [131/26]
SA01vakobhau:8936: mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam / [132/01]
SA01vakobhau:8942: saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate / [132/04-132/05]
SA01vakobhau:8948: utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ / [132/09]
SA01vakobhau:8954: sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate / [132/11]
SA01vakobhau:8966: upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ // VAkK_3.23 // [132/17-132/18]
SA01vakobhau:8968: yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate / [132/18]
SA01vakobhau:8972: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ / [132/20]
SA01vakobhau:8974: sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya bhavaḥ / [132/21]
SA01vakobhau:8976: tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:9016: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti / [133/08]
SA01vakobhau:9031: yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma / [133/13]
SA01vakobhau:9037: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā “pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ / [133/16]
SA01vakobhau:9043: tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ / [133/18]
SA01vakobhau:9051: tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvaṃ ko nvahamabhūvaṃ kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamiti / [133/22]
SA01vakobhau:9053: aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ / [133/23]
SA01vakobhau:9055: madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti / [133/24-133/26]
SA01vakobhau:9057_0: etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda
SA01vakobhau:9057_1: upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca / [133/26-134/02]
SA01vakobhau:9059: tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ “yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti / [134/02]
SA01vakobhau:9061: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanī“ti vistaraḥ / [134/03]
SA01vakobhau:9065: tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ / [134/05]
SA01vakobhau:9092: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau / [134/15-134/16]
SA01vakobhau:9103: madhyenaiva hi pūrvāntāparāntayorapi hetuphalavistaraḥ śakyo 'numānumiti noktaḥ / [134/20]
SA01vakobhau:9107: yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān / [134/22-134/23]
SA01vakobhau:9114: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9124: vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam / [135/02-135/03]
SA01vakobhau:9128: yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati / [135/04-135/05]
SA01vakobhau:9130: vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam / [135/05-135/06]
SA01vakobhau:9132: “evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatī“ti vacanāt / [135/06]
SA01vakobhau:9146: satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti / [135/11-135/12]
SA01vakobhau:9148: yadi tarhyantarbhāvenaiva hetuphalabhāvo vijñāyate tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tarhi tatrāntarbhāvā daṅgantaratvaṃ śakyamakarttum / [135/12]
SA01vakobhau:9156: “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja” iti / [135/14]
SA01vakobhau:9162: ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam / [135/17-135/18]
SA01vakobhau:9175: nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ / [135/21-135/22]
SA01vakobhau:9177: naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā / [135/22]
SA01vakobhau:9181: yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti / [135/23-135/24]
SA01vakobhau:9192: pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt / [135/27]
SA01vakobhau:9198: uktaṃ bhagavatā “pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ / [136/03]
SA01vakobhau:9202: ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti / [136/04]
SA01vakobhau:9212: te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati /
SA01vakobhau:9215: tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ / [136/08]
SA01vakobhau:9228: yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca / [136/13-136/14]
SA01vakobhau:9230: sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti / [136/14]
SA01vakobhau:9242: kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ / [136/17]
SA01vakobhau:9250: yattāvaduktamā “vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī” tyetadutsūtram / [136/19]
SA01vakobhau:9257: yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ / [136/21]
SA01vakobhau:9259: na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati / [136/21-136/22]
SA01vakobhau:9271: yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate / [136/25-136/26]
SA01vakobhau:9273: na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ / [136/26-137/01]
SA01vakobhau:9275: evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ / [137/01-137/02]
SA01vakobhau:9277: nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ / [137/02]
SA01vakobhau:9281: yadva “punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum / [137/04]
SA01vakobhau:9285: yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum / [137/06-137/07]
SA01vakobhau:9287: satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ / [137/07]
SA01vakobhau:9292: tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti / [137/08]
SA01vakobhau:9296: yadapyuktaṃ “heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika” iti / [137/10]
SA01vakobhau:9302: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda” iti / [137/12]
SA01vakobhau:9304: dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ / [137/13]
SA01vakobhau:9306: ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:9311: yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate / [137/15-137/16]
SA01vakobhau:9327: yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam / [137/21-137/22]
SA01vakobhau:9329: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti / [137/22-137/23]
SA01vakobhau:9336: na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate / [137/24-137/25]
SA01vakobhau:9338: utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta / [137/25-137/26]
SA01vakobhau:9346: upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti / [138/03]
SA01vakobhau:9355: ekasya hi kartturdvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhirbhavati / [138/05]
SA01vakobhau:9359: nacāsau pūrvamutpādāt kaścidasti yaḥ pūrvaṃ pratītyottarakālamutpadyate / [138/06-138/07]
SA01vakobhau:9366: saha cet ktvā na siddho 'tra pūrvakālavidhānata” iti // [138/10]
SA01vakobhau:9371: kimavastho dharmaḥ utpadyate varttamāna utāho 'nāgate iti / [138/11]
SA01vakobhau:9380: athānāgata utpadyate kathamasataḥ kartṛtvaṃ siddhatyakartṛkā vā kriyeti / [138/13-138/14]
SA01vakobhau:9382: ato yadavastha utpadyate tadavastha eva pratyeti / [138/14]
SA01vakobhau:9389: aniṣpannaṃ cedaṃ yaduta śābdikīyaṃ kartṛkriyāvyavasthānaṃ bhavatītyeṣa karttā bhūtirityeṣā kriyā / [138/16-138/17]
SA01vakobhau:9391: na cātra bhaviturarthāt bhūtimanyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmaḥ / [138/17]
SA01vakobhau:9396: asmin satyasya bhāvaḥ asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti / [138/19]
SA01vakobhau:9402: sahakāle 'pi ca ktvā 'sti dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam /
SA01vakobhau:9403: āsyaṃ vyādāya śete ca paścāccetkiṃ na saṃvṛte //“ [138/24]
SA01vakobhau:9412: tāṃ tāṃ kāraṇa sāmagrīṃ prati ityānāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti / [138/27]
SA01vakobhau:9416: iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamiti“ti / [138/28-139/01]
SA01vakobhau:9418: kimarthaṃ punarbhagavān paryāyadvayamāha “asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādādidamutpadyate” iti / [139/01-139/02]
SA01vakobhau:9422: yathā 'nyatrāha “avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārā” iti / [139/03]
SA01vakobhau:9426: asminnaṅge satīdaṃ bhavati asya punaraṅgasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti / [139/04]
SA01vakobhau:9430: pūrvānte sati madhyānto bhavati madhyāntasyotpādādaparānta utpadyata iti / [139/05-139/06]
SA01vakobhau:9434: kadāciddhi samanantaramavidyāyāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti kadācit pāraṃparyeṇeti / [139/07]
SA01vakobhau:9438: nāsati heto bhāvo bhavati na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikātkiñcidutpadyata iti / [139/08-139/09]
SA01vakobhau:9440: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti / [139/09]
SA01vakobhau:9444: santi tarhi kecidya ātmani satyāśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ bhāvaṃ parikalpayanti avidyādīnāṃ cotpādāttadutpattim / [139/11-139/12]
SA01vakobhau:9446: atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin / [139/12-139/13]
SA01vakobhau:9448: yadutā “vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati“ti / [139/14]
SA01vakobhau:9461: utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam / [139/18-139/19]
SA01vakobhau:9463: punarāha “asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī“ti “kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatī“ti / [139/19-139/20]
SA01vakobhau:9465: syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam / [139/20-139/21]
SA01vakobhau:9471: pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti / [139/22-139/23]
SA01vakobhau:9475: itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya / [139/24]
SA01vakobhau:9479: kathaṃ puna “rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmi“ti / [139/25]
SA01vakobhau:9483_1: ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ
SA01vakobhau:9489: evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe “vijñānaṃ katamat / [140/04]
SA01vakobhau:9493: vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam / [140/06]
SA01vakobhau:9520: yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ / [140/13-140/14]
SA01vakobhau:9537: yathokta “mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā” iti / [140/18-140/19]
SA01vakobhau:9554: jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre / [140/23]
SA01vakobhau:9562: sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ / [140/26]
SA01vakobhau:9578: yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ / [141/03]
SA01vakobhau:9608: sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate / [141/11-141/12]
SA01vakobhau:9610: yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati / [141/12]
SA01vakobhau:9617: avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata / [141/14-141/15]
SA01vakobhau:9625: “rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatī“tyuktam sūtre / [141/18]
SA01vakobhau:9627: na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti / [141/18-141/19]
SA01vakobhau:9629: yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā / [141/19]
SA01vakobhau:9633: kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati / [141/20-141/21]
SA01vakobhau:9641: uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate / [141/22-141/23]
SA01vakobhau:9650: yo 'pi manyate “sarvakleśā avidye“ti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ / [141/25-142/01]
SA01vakobhau:9652: sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta / [142/01-142/02]
SA01vakobhau:9654: anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet / [142/02-142/03]
SA01vakobhau:9666: yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām / [142/06-142/07]
SA01vakobhau:9670: tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi / [142/07-142/08]
SA01vakobhau:9680_0: yā 'sau sūtra uktā “so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ
SA01vakobhau:9680_1: sarvāsāṃ mayatānāṃ sarveṣāmahaṅkāramamakārāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayānāṃ prahāṇāt parijñānānniśchāyo nivṛta” iti / [142/12]
SA01vakobhau:9685: yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum /
SA01vakobhau:9701: yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi / [142/19]
SA01vakobhau:9704: teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt / [142/19-142/20]
SA01vakobhau:9706: iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare // [142/21]
SA01vakobhau:9731: sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti / [143/06]
SA01vakobhau:9735: keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti “iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ” iti / [143/08-143/09]
SA01vakobhau:9737: kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti “ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ / [143/10]
SA01vakobhau:9750: tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ / [143/13]
SA01vakobhau:9758: na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt / [143/16-143/17]
SA01vakobhau:9760: yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam / [143/17]
SA01vakobhau:9762: tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti / [143/18-143/19]
SA01vakobhau:9764: na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam / [143/19-143/20]
SA01vakobhau:9766: ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke / [143/20-143/21]
SA01vakobhau:9768: ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti “iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa” iti / [143/21]
SA01vakobhau:9774: saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti / [143/23]
SA01vakobhau:9794: yathoktaṃ “cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātī“ti / [144/04]
SA01vakobhau:9803: tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ / [144/07]
SA01vakobhau:9816: anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt / [144/13]
SA01vakobhau:9835: athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam /
SA01vakobhau:9839: sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti [144/21-144/22]
SA01vakobhau:9847: tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ [144/24]
SA01vakobhau:9863: atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam / [145/04-145/05]
SA01vakobhau:9876: yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti / [145/08]
SA01vakobhau:9885: “cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa” iti vacanāt / [145/11-145/12]
SA01vakobhau:9889: yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ / [145/13-153/14]
SA01vakobhau:9891: tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi / [145/14-145/15]
SA01vakobhau:9893: anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt / [145/15-145/16]
SA01vakobhau:9899: tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam / [145/18-145/19]
SA01vakobhau:9901: pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ // [145/19]
SA01vakobhau:9903: yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [145/20]
SA01vakobhau:9908: so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti / [145/21-145/22]
SA01vakobhau:9910: evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ / [145/22]
SA01vakobhau:9914: pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti / [145/24]
SA01vakobhau:9921: kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti / [145/26-146/01]
SA01vakobhau:9925: tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ / [146/02]
SA01vakobhau:9938: na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti / [146/06]
SA01vakobhau:9943: savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ
SA01vakobhau:9950: tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ / [146/09-146/10]
SA01vakobhau:9962: yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ “cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetane“ti / [146/14-146/15]
SA01vakobhau:9964: sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam / [146/15-146/16]
SA01vakobhau:9966: samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā “maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī” tyajñāpakametat / [146/16-146/18]
SA01vakobhau:9968: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā” ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam / [146/18]
SA01vakobhau:9972: tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ “yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātī“ti / [146/20-146/21]
SA01vakobhau:9974: tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti / [146/21]
SA01vakobhau:9978: yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ “trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ” iti / [146/22-146/23]
SA01vakobhau:9980: tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti / [146/23-146/24]
SA01vakobhau:9982: tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā / [146/24]
SA01vakobhau:9991: saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate / [146/27-146/28]
SA01vakobhau:10038: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ / [147/13]
SA01vakobhau:10051: itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ / [147/18-147/19]
SA01vakobhau:10053: yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ / [147/20]
SA01vakobhau:10061: athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ / [147/24]
SA01vakobhau:10067: āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10145: yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ / [149/09]
SA01vakobhau:10169_0: kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ
SA01vakobhau:10169_2: kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā vitarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ
SA01vakobhau:10186: nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam / [150/02-150/03]
SA01vakobhau:10188: ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ / [150/03]
SA01vakobhau:10195: anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti / [150/05-150/07]
SA01vakobhau:10197: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti / [150/07-150/08]
SA01vakobhau:10199: nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti / [150/08-150/09]
SA01vakobhau:10230: sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam / [150/20]
SA01vakobhau:10238: tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām / [150/23-151/01]
SA01vakobhau:10240: yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ / [151/01-151/02]
SA01vakobhau:10242: yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ / [151/02-151/03]
SA01vakobhau:10244: yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti / [151/03-151/06]
SA01vakobhau:10246_0: yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ
SA01vakobhau:10246_1: karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ tāvat kleśo bījādivadveditavyaḥ / [151/07]
SA01vakobhau:10255: santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante / [151/10-151/11]
SA01vakobhau:10257: yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni / [151/12]
SA01vakobhau:10261: pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu / [151/14]
SA01vakobhau:10265: yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt / [151/15-151/16]
SA01vakobhau:10267: na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati / [151/16]
SA01vakobhau:10284: nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ / [151/23-151/24]
SA01vakobhau:10288: yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate / [151/25]
SA01vakobhau:10306: kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati / [152/05-152/06]
SA01vakobhau:10314: eko dharmo bhagavatā svayamabhijñāyābhisaṃbadhyākhyāto “yaduta sarvasttvā āhārasthitikā” iti sūtrapadam / [152/10]
SA01vakobhau:10355: yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ / [152/22]
SA01vakobhau:10365: āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate / [152/25-152/26]
SA01vakobhau:10367: rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti / [152/26]
SA01vakobhau:10371: yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam / [153/02-153/03]
SA01vakobhau:10379: cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante / [153/06]
SA01vakobhau:10387: api tu sūtra uktaṃ “catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye“ti / [153/09]
SA01vakobhau:10391: bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /
SA01vakobhau:10411: “tathāsti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanam” iti sūtra catuḥkoṭikāt / [153/18]
SA01vakobhau:10422: atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya / [153/21-153/22]
SA01vakobhau:10429: bhagavatā “atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya” iti / [153/24]
SA01vakobhau:10433: evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau / [153/26-153/27]
SA01vakobhau:10435: tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti / [153/27-154/02]
SA01vakobhau:10437: punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti / [154/02-154/04]
SA01vakobhau:10439: saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre 'vataranti / [154/04-154/05]
SA01vakobhau:10441: tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti / [154/05]
SA01vakobhau:10449: yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti / [154/07-154/08]
SA01vakobhau:10457: nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ / [154/10]
SA01vakobhau:10472: manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam / [154/16]
SA01vakobhau:10476: pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt / [154/17]
SA01vakobhau:10480: yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ / [154/18-154/19]
SA01vakobhau:10484: prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ / [154/20]
SA01vakobhau:10488: tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ / [154/21-154/22]
SA01vakobhau:10494: syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ / [154/24]
SA01vakobhau:10498: yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva / [154/25]
SA01vakobhau:10502: dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [154/26]
SA01vakobhau:10512: yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca “kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ / [155/01-155/03]
SA01vakobhau:10514: yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam /“ [155/03]
SA01vakobhau:10520: so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti / [155/04-155/05]
SA01vakobhau:10524: uktaṃ bhagavatā “yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam / [155/07]
SA01vakobhau:10536: syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti / [155/10]
SA01vakobhau:10540: tadetanna varṇayanti “bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya” iti / [155/11-155/12]
SA01vakobhau:10542: ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [155/12-155/13]
SA01vakobhau:10544: natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā / [155/13-155/14]
SA01vakobhau:10548: bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate / [155/14-155/15]
SA01vakobhau:10550: sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti / [155/15-155/16]
SA01vakobhau:10556: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva / [155/17-155/18]
SA01vakobhau:10560: ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ / [155/20]
SA01vakobhau:10563: katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha [155/21]
SA01vakobhau:10571: ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra / [155/24-155/25]
SA01vakobhau:10597: yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā / [156/09-156/10]
SA01vakobhau:10615: atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate / [156/16-156/17]
SA01vakobhau:10630: teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate / [156/22]
SA01vakobhau:10637: kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti / [156/24-156/25]
SA01vakobhau:10649_1: chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante / [157/03-157/04]
SA01vakobhau:10662: kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti / [157/07-157/09]
SA01vakobhau:10664_0: vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ
SA01vakobhau:10664_1: kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ / [157/09]
SA01vakobhau:10670: vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate / [157/11-157/12]
SA01vakobhau:10672: so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā / [157/12-157/13]
SA01vakobhau:10684: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktva“miti sūtram / [157/17]
SA01vakobhau:10693: ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti / [157/20]
SA01vakobhau:10699: na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ / [157/22]
SA01vakobhau:10720: karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ / [158/04]
SA01vakobhau:10738: yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke / [158/10]
SA01vakobhau:10751: sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ / [158/16-158/17]
SA01vakobhau:10760: samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām / [158/21-158/22]
SA01vakobhau:10794: suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu / [159/13-159/14]
SA01vakobhau:10796: yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate / [159/14-159/15]
SA01vakobhau:10800: tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti / [159/17]
SA01vakobhau:10806: tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti / [159/19-159/20]
SA01vakobhau:10808: evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti / [159/20-159/21]
SA01vakobhau:10810: na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ / [159/21]
SA01vakobhau:10818: sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta / [159/23-159/24]
SA01vakobhau:10827: tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ / [159/25-159/26]
SA01vakobhau:10829: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante / [159/26-159/27]
SA01vakobhau:10839: kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ / [160/04]
SA01vakobhau:10843: iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ / [160/06]
SA01vakobhau:10849: tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ / [160/10]
SA01vakobhau:10853: yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ / [160/12]
SA01vakobhau:10857: eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya / [160/14-160/15]
SA01vakobhau:10859: taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate / [160/16]
SA01vakobhau:10877: pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca / [161/01]
SA01vakobhau:10881: yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi / [161/03-161/04]
SA01vakobhau:10894: taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya / [161/08]
SA01vakobhau:10908: tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti // [161/15]
SA01vakobhau:10910: nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ / [161/16]
SA01vakobhau:10919: itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10934: itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena / [162/02]
SA01vakobhau:10950: sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre / [162/08]
SA01vakobhau:10954: yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni / [162/10]
SA01vakobhau:10975: ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ / [162/20]
SA01vakobhau:10981: tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca / [162/23-162/24]
SA01vakobhau:10989: tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ / [162/26-162/27]
SA01vakobhau:10997: asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati / [163/03-163/04]
SA01vakobhau:11001: anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti / [163/05-163/06]
SA01vakobhau:11015: pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca / [163/10]
SA01vakobhau:11042: yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam / [163/24-163/25]
SA01vakobhau:11044: kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti / [163/25-164/01]
SA01vakobhau:11046: kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat / [164/01-164/02]
SA01vakobhau:11048: asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti / [164/02-164/03]
SA01vakobhau:11052: teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ / [164/04-164/05]
SA01vakobhau:11058_0: caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ
SA01vakobhau:11058_1: puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante
SA01vakobhau:11064: ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante / [164/11]
SA01vakobhau:11073: kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti / [164/14]
SA01vakobhau:11083: duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā” iti // [164/18-164/19]
SA01vakobhau:11085: ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti / [164/19]
SA01vakobhau:11090: teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ / [164/21]
SA01vakobhau:11103: tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca / [165/01-165/02]
SA01vakobhau:11121: teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt / [165/07-165/08]
SA01vakobhau:11127: teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti / [165/09]
SA01vakobhau:11131: tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ / [165/11]
SA01vakobhau:11161: sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca / [165/21-165/22]
SA01vakobhau:11169: kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti / [165/24]
SA01vakobhau:11177: yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ / [165/27]
SA01vakobhau:11186: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ / [166/03]
SA01vakobhau:11209: jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ / [166/13]
SA01vakobhau:11216: yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti / [166/16-166/17]
SA01vakobhau:11218: tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ / [166/17-166/18]
SA01vakobhau:11220: vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ / [166/18-166/19]
SA01vakobhau:11240: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ // VAkK_3.63 // [167/02]
SA01vakobhau:11242: prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā / [167/03]
SA01vakobhau:11250: prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti / [167/06-167/07]
SA01vakobhau:11256: caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca / [167/08-167/09]
SA01vakobhau:11289: tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti / [167/20]
SA01vakobhau:11294: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu // VAkK_3.66 // [167/23-167/24]
SA01vakobhau:11296: sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam / [167/24-167/25]
SA01vakobhau:11300: tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī / [168/01]
SA01vakobhau:11304: śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam / [168/04]
SA01vakobhau:11312: tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ / [168/08]
SA01vakobhau:11319: eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti / [168/12]
SA01vakobhau:11331: tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam / [168/17]
SA01vakobhau:11341: tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt pratibadhyamāno'pi divyairmṛdumārutairgandhāntaraṃ saṃtanoti / [168/20-168/21]
SA01vakobhau:11343: mandataratamasamārambhāttu saṃtāna āśveva samucchidyate yato na tathā viprakṛṣṭamadhvānaṃ prasarpati / [168/21-168/22]
SA01vakobhau:11345: kiṃ punaḥ svabhūtāśrita evamapuṣpagandhasaṃtāno vartate utāho vāyuradhivāsito jāyate / [168/22]
SA01vakobhau:11353: satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātameti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravātī“ti / [169/01]
SA01vakobhau:11358: na ca tasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ mahīsāsakāstu pathanti “yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojanāni prativātamiti / [169/03-169/04]
SA01vakobhau:11360: sudharmā nāma devasabhā dakṣiṇapaścime digbhāge yasyāṃ niṣadya devāḥ kṛtyākṛtyaṃ samarthayanti / [169/04]
SA01vakobhau:11368: te punaryāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca brahmakāyikādayaśca pūrvoktāḥ ṣoḍaśasthānāntaragatāḥ / [169/08]
SA01vakobhau:11370: ityete dvāviṃśatidevanikāyāḥ samāsena yeṣāṃ bhājanaṃ prajñāyate / [169/09]
SA01vakobhau:11374: teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devanikāyāḥ kāmān paribhuñjate na śeṣāḥ / [169/10-169/11]
SA01vakobhau:11390: pāṇisaṃprāptyā tuṣitānāṃ hasitena nirmāṇaratīnāṃ prekṣitena paranirmitavaśavartinām / [169/16-169/17]
SA01vakobhau:11398: yasya devasya devyā vā utsaṅge devakumāro devakanyā vā jāyate sa tayoḥ putro bhavati sā ca duhitā / [169/19-169/20]
SA01vakobhau:11411: rūpāvacarā devāḥ saṃpūrṇakāyāḥ vastreṇa saṃvītā upapadyante / [170/01-170/02]
SA01vakobhau:11421: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti / [170/05]
SA01vakobhau:11426: santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti / [170/06-170/07]
SA01vakobhau:11430: santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti / [170/08]
