SA01vakobhau:11434: tā etā yathot pannaparibhogitvāt yathecchātmanirmitaparibhogitvādyathecchātmapara nirmitaparibhogitvācca tisraḥ kāmopapattaya ityucyante / [170/10]
SA01vakobhau:11440: triṣu dhyāneṣu yā nava bhūmayaḥ tāstisraḥ sukhopapattayaḥ / [170/12-170/14]
SA01vakobhau:11442: te hi devā vivekajena samādhijena ca prītisukhena ca niṣprītikena ca sukhena sukhaṃ viharanto dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhanti / [170/14]
SA01vakobhau:11455: jambūdvīpāt prabhṛti yaduttaraṃ sthānaṃ tasmādyāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvat punastasmādūrdhvaṃ sthānāntaram / [170/20-170/21]
SA01vakobhau:11457: tadyathā caturthī pariṣaṇḍā caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ mūlasthānamitaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi / [170/21-170/22]
SA01vakobhau:11459: tasmādyāvadadhojambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tridaśānāṃ sthānam tasmādapi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ yāmānāṃ sthānam / [170/23]
SA01vakobhau:11463: evaṃ vistareṇa sarvamanukramya sudarśanebhyo yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃmakaniṣṭhānāṃ sthānam / [170/25]
SA01vakobhau:11472: kiṃ punaradharasthānopapannā urdhvāni vimānāni gatvā paśyanti [171/01]
SA01vakobhau:11479: parāśrayeṇa vā yadvṛddhimatā nīyeran devena vā tatratyena / [171/03]
SA01vakobhau:11489: kiṃ tarhi nirmitenādharabhūmikena tadicchayā paśyedihatyamiveti nikāyāntarīyāḥ / [171/07]
SA01vakobhau:11508: atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā / [171/13-171/14]
SA01vakobhau:11513_1: candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
SA01vakobhau:11517: teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ / [171/20]
SA01vakobhau:11521: teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ / [171/21-171/22]
SA01vakobhau:11530: kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti / [171/26]
SA01vakobhau:11541: pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam / [172/04]
SA01vakobhau:11549: tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām / [172/09]
SA01vakobhau:11553: rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram / [172/11]
SA01vakobhau:11559: triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane / [172/14-172/15]
SA01vakobhau:11569: anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam / [172/18-172/19]
SA01vakobhau:11571: tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram / [172/20]
SA01vakobhau:11588: jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ / [173/03]
SA01vakobhau:11603: taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate / [173/10-173/11]
SA01vakobhau:11608: yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam / [173/14]
SA01vakobhau:11612: tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam / [173/17]
SA01vakobhau:11625: mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam / [173/21-173/22]
SA01vakobhau:11627: tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam / [173/22]
SA01vakobhau:11633: puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt / [173/25]
SA01vakobhau:11644: evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam / [174/06]
SA01vakobhau:11656: evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam / [174/11-174/12]
SA01vakobhau:11658: katamo'tra kalpo veditavyaḥ kimantarakalpo'tha saṃvartakalpo'tha vivarttakalpo'tha mahākalpaḥ / [174/13]
SA01vakobhau:11668_0: yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpānvivarta
SA01vakobhau:11668_1: āste yacca viṃśatimantarakalpānsaṃvartate ime ṣaṣṭirantarakalpā mahābrahmaṇo'dhyardhaḥ kalpaḥ uktaḥ / [174/17-174/18]
SA01vakobhau:11670: evaṃ ca kṛtvā mahākalpasyārdhaṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpān kalpīkṛtya teṣāmāyuḥ pramāṇamuktam / [174/19]
SA01vakobhau:11680: yāvat ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāmāyuruktaṃ tena tulyā ahorātrāḥ ṣaṭṣu narakeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ / [174/24-174/25]
SA01vakobhau:11682: saṃjīve kālasūtre saṃghāte raurave mahāraurave tāpane ca / [174/26]
SA01vakobhau:11686: tairidānīṃ svairahorātraisteṣāṃ yathā ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāmāyustathaiva yathākramaṃ veditavyam / [174/28]
SA01vakobhau:11690: yaddhi cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tatsaṃjīvane mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivaṃ / [174/29-175/01]
SA01vakobhau:11692: tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa tatratyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ / [175/01-175/02]
SA01vakobhau:11694: yattrāyastriṃśānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tat kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivam / [175/02-175/03]
SA01vakobhau:11698: evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tattulyenāhorātreṇa tāpane ṣoḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam / [175/05]
SA01vakobhau:11714: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “aṣṭāvime bhikṣavo nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā dharaṇidharā” iti vistaraḥ / [175/14]
SA01vakobhau:11727: upamānamātreṇa teṣvāyurākhyātaṃ bhagavatā “tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syādviṃśatikhārīko māgadhakastilavāhaḥ pūrṇastilānāṃ cūḍikāvaddhaḥ / [175/20-175/22]
SA01vakobhau:11729: tataḥ kaścideva varṣaśatasyātyayādekaṃ tilamapanayate kṣiprataraṃ bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīko māgadhastilavāho'nenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet / [175/22]
SA01vakobhau:11733: yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatirvudā evameko nirarvudo vistareṇa yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatiḥ padyā evameko mahāpadma” iti / [175/25]
SA01vakobhau:11746: tuṣitastharsyakajātibaddhasya bodhisattvasya caramabhavikasattvasya jinādiṣṭasya jinabhutasya śraddhādharmānusāriṇo bodhisattvacakravarttimātrośca tadgarbhayorityevamādinām / [176/06-176/07]
SA01vakobhau:11748: yojanapramaṇena sthānāni śarīrāṇi cotkāni varṣapramāṇenāyuruktaṃ tayośca pramāṇaṃ noktamiti vaktavyaṃ nānā ca sarveṣāṃ vavasthānamatastasyāpi paryanto vaktavyaḥ / [176/08]
SA01vakobhau:11758: kālasya paryantaḥ kṣaṇo nāmnaḥ paryanto'kṣaraṃ tadyathā gauriti / [176/12]
SA01vakobhau:11762: samagreṣu pratyayeṣu yāvatā dharmasyātmalābhaḥ gacchanvā dharmo yāvatā paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantaraṃ gacchati / [176/13-176/14]
SA01vakobhau:11778: tāni sapta gorajaḥ tāni sapta vātāyanacchidrarajaḥ / [176/20]

SA01vakobhau:12453: tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti [187/21]
SA01vakobhau:12457: tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti / [187/23]
SA01vakobhau:12459: ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca / [187/24]
SA01vakobhau:12469: antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ / [188/02-188/03]
SA01vakobhau:12471: teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ vadhakacittaṃ ca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati / [188/03-188/05]
SA01vakobhau:12473: tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati / [188/05]
SA01vakobhau:12477: punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti / [188/06-188/07]
SA01vakobhau:12481: punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ / [188/08]
SA01vakobhau:12486: ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate / [188/09-188/10]
SA01vakobhau:12490: te ca manuṣyā jighatsādaurbalyaparītāḥ sametya kālaṃ kurvanti samudreṣu cānāgatajanatā'nugrahārthaṃ bījānyavasthāpayanti / [188/11]
SA01vakobhau:12497: teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti / [188/14]
SA01vakobhau:12502_0: te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate
SA01vakobhau:12502_1: śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya
SA01vakobhau:12506: yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti / [188/20]
SA01vakobhau:12508: atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavanti [188/21]
SA01vakobhau:12510: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam // VAkK_3.99 // [188/22]
SA01vakobhau:12515: durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ / [188/23-188/24]
SA01vakobhau:12519: vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca / [188/25]
SA01vakobhau:12527: ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī / [189/02-189/03]
SA01vakobhau:12529: saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī / [189/04]
SA01vakobhau:12540: nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam / [189/07]
SA01vakobhau:12544: “vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta” iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti / [189/08-189/09]
SA01vakobhau:12568: citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam / [189/14-189/15]
SA01vakobhau:12570: samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti / [189/15]
SA01vakobhau:12578: anyo vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭo'nyaśca tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti / [189/17-189/18]
SA01vakobhau:12580: ta eva hi te yathāsaṃniviṣṭāstāṃ tāṃ saṃjñāṃ labhnte / [189/18]
SA01vakobhau:12587: ko hi tadā sataḥ paṭasyopalabdhau pratibandhaḥ / [189/19-189/20]
SA01vakobhau:12594: anekā śrayasaṃyogāpekṣaṇe daśāmātrasaṃyoge paṭopalabdhiḥ syānna vā kadācit / [189/21-189/22]
SA01vakobhau:12604: citrarūpāditve vijātīyārambho'pi syāt acitre ca pārśvāntare paṭasyādarśanaṃ citradarśanaṃ vā / [189/26]
SA01vakobhau:12610: paramāṇvatīndriyatve'pi samastānāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ yathā teṣāṃ kāryārambhakatvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ ca taimirikāṇāṃ ca vikīrṇakeśopalabdhiḥ / [190/02]
SA01vakobhau:12614: rūpādiṣveva ca paramāṇusaṃjñāniveśā ttadvināśe siddhaḥ paramāṇuvināśaḥ / [190/03-190/04]
SA01vakobhau:12616: dravyaṃ hi paramāṇuranyacca rūpādibhyo dravyamiti na teṣaṃ vināśe tadvināśaḥ siddhyati / [190/04-190/05]
SA01vakobhau:12618: ayuktamasyānyatvaṃ yāvatā na nirdhāryate kenacit imāni pṛthivyaptejāṃsi ima eṣāṃ rūpādaya iti / [190/06-190/07]
SA01vakobhau:12620: cakṣuḥsparśanagrāhyāṇi ca prajñāyante dagdheṣu corṇākarpāsakusumbhakuṅkumādiṣu tadbuddhyabhāvādrūpādibhedeṣveva tadbuddhiḥ / [190/07-190/08]
SA01vakobhau:12626: ko vā bālapralāpeṣvādaraḥ iti tiṣṭhatu tāvadevāpratiṣedhaḥ / [190/10]
SA01vakobhau:12630: dhyānatrayaṃ dvitīyādi śīrṣa tāsām yathākramam // VAkK_3.100 // [190/12]
SA01vakobhau:12633: tejaḥsaṃvartanyā dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ śīrṣaṃ bhavatyadho dahyate / [190/13]
SA01vakobhau:12651: ata evatasmin kṛtsnakāyakrauryāpagamāt duḥkhendriyasya nirodha uktaḥ sūtre / [190/21]
SA01vakobhau:12656: iti yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhuta ādhyātmiko'pakṣālastasyām dhyānopapattau tathābhūto bāhya iti / [190/22-190/23]
SA01vakobhau:12660: pṛthivyeva hi bhājanākhyā tasyāṃ tejojalavāyubhirvirodho na pṛthhivyeti / [190/24]
SA01vakobhau:12668: ato'tra bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti nāstyatra saṃvartanī / [190/27]
SA01vakobhau:12672: nahi taiḥ śakyamārupyān praveṣṭuṃ nāpyanyatra gantumiti / [191/01-191/02]
SA01vakobhau:12676: na nityaṃ saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayāt // VAkK_3.101 // [191/04]
SA01vakobhau:12703: etena krameṇāpsaṃvartanīnāṃ gate saptake punaḥ tejaḥsaṃvartanīnāṃ saptako bhavati / [191/14]
SA01vakobhau:12710: yathiva hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ samāpattiviśeṣādātmabhāvānāṃ sthitiviśeṣastathā bhājanānāmapāmiti tā etā bhavanti ṣaṭpañcāśattejaḥ saṃvartanyaḥ saptāpsaṃvarttanyaḥ ekā vāyusaṃvarttanī / [191/17-191/18]
SA01vakobhau:12712: evaṃ ca prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ sunītaṃ bhavati “catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ devānāmāyuḥpramāṇami“ti / [191/19-191/20]
SA01vakobhau:12715: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇa” // iti / [191/21]
SA01vakobhau:12725: atha yadetatsattvabhājanalokasya bahudhā vaicitryamukta tat kena kṛtam / [192/03-192/04]
SA01vakobhau:12734: yadi karmajaṃ kasmātsattvānāṃ karmabhiḥ kuṅkumacandanādayo ramyatarā jāyante na teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi / [192/07-192/08]
SA01vakobhau:12736: karmāṇyeva tānyevañjātīyāti vyābhiśrakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ yadāśrayāśca vraṇabhūtā jāyante bhogāśca ramyāstatpratīkārabhūtāḥ / [192/08-192/09]
SA01vakobhau:12744: sūtra uktaṃ “dve karmaṇī cetanā karma cetayitvā ce“ti / [192/11-192/12]
SA01vakobhau:12748: te ete dve karmaṇī trīṇi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12773: yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye / [192/21]
SA01vakobhau:12777: te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /
SA01vakobhau:12784: cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12798: sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate / [193/04]
SA01vakobhau:12818: so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt / [193/09-193/10]
SA01vakobhau:12824: na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate / [193/10-193/11]
SA01vakobhau:12830: na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate / [193/13]
SA01vakobhau:12836: kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante / [193/15-193/16]
SA01vakobhau:12851: kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate / [193/20-193/21]
SA01vakobhau:12858: na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā / [193/22-193/24]
SA01vakobhau:12860: yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt / [193/24-193/25]
SA01vakobhau:12862: antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam / [193/25]
SA01vakobhau:12866: na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ / [193/27]
SA01vakobhau:12868: sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena / [194/01-194/02]
SA01vakobhau:12870: yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau [194/03]
SA01vakobhau:12877: ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā / [194/06-194/07]
SA01vakobhau:12879: na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti / [194/07-194/08]
SA01vakobhau:12885: yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti / [194/10-194/11]
SA01vakobhau:12887: tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti / [194/11-194/12]
SA01vakobhau:12891: tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ / [194/14]
SA01vakobhau:12899: ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate / [194/16-194/17]
SA01vakobhau:12909: tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti / [194/19-194/20]
SA01vakobhau:12917: cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / [194/23]
SA01vakobhau:12921: yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām / [194/24]
SA01vakobhau:12925: sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam / [194/25-194/26]
SA01vakobhau:12927: yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti / [194/26-195/01]
SA01vakobhau:12929: yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt / [195/01-195/02]
SA01vakobhau:12945: yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate / [195/07]
SA01vakobhau:12949: na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi / [195/08-195/09]
SA01vakobhau:12953: atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti / [195/10]
SA01vakobhau:12959: na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ / [195/12]
SA01vakobhau:12961: yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām / [195/12-195/14]
SA01vakobhau:12963: nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi / [195/14-195/16]
SA01vakobhau:12965: yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti / [195/16]
SA01vakobhau:12972: athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti / [195/19]
SA01vakobhau:12977: tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti / [195/20-195/21]
SA01vakobhau:12979: kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī / [195/21]
SA01vakobhau:12983: yattarhi “cetanā karma cetayitvā ce“tyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti / [195/23]
SA01vakobhau:12987: yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate / [195/24-195/25]
SA01vakobhau:12989: evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante / [195/25-195/26]
SA01vakobhau:12999: sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate / [196/01]
SA01vakobhau:13003: dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim / [196/03]
SA01vakobhau:13034: yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne / [196/13]
SA01vakobhau:13038: na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam / [196/14]
SA01vakobhau:13042_1: kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata
SA01vakobhau:13048: akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau / [196/19]
SA01vakobhau:13059: tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta / [196/23]
SA01vakobhau:13065: yattarhīdamuktaṃ “tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ / [196/26-196/27]
SA01vakobhau:13067: pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā” iti / [196/27-196/28]
SA01vakobhau:13073: na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti / [197/02]
SA01vakobhau:13097: yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ / [197/09]
SA01vakobhau:13108: paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /
SA01vakobhau:13113: yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ / [197/13-197/15]
SA01vakobhau:13115: yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syu“ryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastvi“ti vistaraḥ / [197/15-197/19]
SA01vakobhau:13117_1: yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi
SA01vakobhau:13117_2: dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti
SA01vakobhau:13119: “idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ” bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti / [197/20-197/21]
SA01vakobhau:13121: atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti / [197/21]
SA01vakobhau:13125: kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / [197/23-197/24]
SA01vakobhau:13129: avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt / [197/25-197/26]
SA01vakobhau:13133_0: yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ “yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ
SA01vakobhau:13133_2: puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya” ityatra tadānīṃ
SA01vakobhau:13137: yadapyuktaṃ “kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantī“ti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti / [198/03-198/05]
SA01vakobhau:13139_0: tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate
SA01vakobhau:13139_1: yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi
SA01vakobhau:13139_2: ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ / [198/05-198/06]
SA01vakobhau:13147: upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ / [198/08-198/09]
SA01vakobhau:13149: haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti / [198/09]
SA01vakobhau:13155: svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt / [198/11-198/13]
SA01vakobhau:13157: ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ / [198/13]
SA01vakobhau:13161: kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ / [198/15-198/16]
SA01vakobhau:13163: yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ / [198/16]
SA01vakobhau:13182: kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate / [198/21]
SA01vakobhau:13189: yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate / [198/23-198/24]
SA01vakobhau:13193_0: yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:13193_1: āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate
SA01vakobhau:13195: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti / [199/01]
SA01vakobhau:13204: tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti / [199/04]
SA01vakobhau:13208: prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti / [199/06]
SA01vakobhau:13213: tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam / [199/09-199/10]
SA01vakobhau:13215: yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt / [199/10-199/11]
SA01vakobhau:13219: yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni / [199/13]
SA01vakobhau:13223: na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate / [199/14-199/15]
SA01vakobhau:13225: kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate / [199/15-199/16]
SA01vakobhau:13227: sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya / [199/16]
SA01vakobhau:13246: kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya / [199/26]
SA01vakobhau:13250: asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam / [200/01]
SA01vakobhau:13272: sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt / [200/12]
SA01vakobhau:13283: kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na / [200/16]
SA01vakobhau:13294: anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati / [200/19-200/20]
SA01vakobhau:13296: evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam / [200/20]
SA01vakobhau:13300: anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet / [200/21]
SA01vakobhau:13304: tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam / [200/22-200/23]
SA01vakobhau:13313: evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati / [200/25]
SA01vakobhau:13322: avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt / [201/01]
SA01vakobhau:13351: iha tarhi samāpannasya syādanāsravā vijñaptivat / [201/11] na /
SA01vakobhau:13371: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam / [201/18]
SA01vakobhau:13380: sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt / [201/21-201/22]
SA01vakobhau:13382: tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam / [201/22]
SA01vakobhau:13391: na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet / [201/25]
SA01vakobhau:13396: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti / [202/01]
SA01vakobhau:13402: tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate / [202/03]
SA01vakobhau:13408: kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:13412: caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca / [202/07]
SA01vakobhau:13431: taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat / [202/16]
SA01vakobhau:13435: kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ / [202/19]
SA01vakobhau:13439: prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam / [202/20-202/21]
SA01vakobhau:13456: evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:13459: paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate / [203/03]
SA01vakobhau:13471: yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām / [203/07]
SA01vakobhau:13475: samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam / [203/09-203/10]
SA01vakobhau:13482: kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ “tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta” mityevamādi / [203/12]
SA01vakobhau:13498: tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī / [203/18]
SA01vakobhau:13528: naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:13558: kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati / [204/12]
SA01vakobhau:13577: na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati / [204/20]
SA01vakobhau:13583: kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt / [204/22]
SA01vakobhau:13588: svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita” iti / [204/25-204/26]
SA01vakobhau:13590: anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [204/26-204/27]
SA01vakobhau:13598: vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt / [205/02-205/03]
SA01vakobhau:13610: na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam / [205/06-205/07]
SA01vakobhau:13612: yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti / [205/07]
SA01vakobhau:13614: yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam / [205/07-205/08]
SA01vakobhau:13618: yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam / [205/09]
SA01vakobhau:13652: bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca / [205/21-205/22]
SA01vakobhau:13680: parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ / [206/04-206/05]
SA01vakobhau:13682: śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ / [206/05]
SA01vakobhau:13684: upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti / [206/05-206/06]
SA01vakobhau:13686: na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe / [206/06-206/07]
SA01vakobhau:13688: tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ / [206/08-206/10]
SA01vakobhau:13690_0: ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te
SA01vakobhau:13690_1: saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca
SA01vakobhau:13707_0: yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo
SA01vakobhau:13707_1: nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu
SA01vakobhau:13709: evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt / [206/18]
SA01vakobhau:13721: kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ / [206/23-206/24]
SA01vakobhau:13742: sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate / [207/07]
SA01vakobhau:13761: na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate / [207/13]
SA01vakobhau:13763: sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati / [207/14]
SA01vakobhau:13784: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ / [207/21]
SA01vakobhau:13838: tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt / [208/17-208/18]
SA01vakobhau:13840: ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate // [208/18-208/19]
SA01vakobhau:13850: evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam / [208/22]
SA01vakobhau:13855: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ / iti / [208/25]
SA01vakobhau:13866: pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti / [209/03]
SA01vakobhau:13872: kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti / [209/05]
SA01vakobhau:13880: yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ / [209/10]
SA01vakobhau:13892: asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ / [209/15]
SA01vakobhau:13902: prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate / [209/20]
SA01vakobhau:13909: sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt / [210/01]
SA01vakobhau:13913: tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau / [210/03-210/04]
SA01vakobhau:13921: yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ / [210/07-210/08]
SA01vakobhau:13925: yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ / [210/09]
SA01vakobhau:13934: kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati / [210/13]
SA01vakobhau:13941_1: kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate vadhabandhanatāḍanādikriyāṃ
SA01vakobhau:13943: sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi / [210/19]
SA01vakobhau:13947: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ / [210/21]
SA01vakobhau:13949: sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ / [210/22]
SA01vakobhau:13957: anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ / [211/02]
SA01vakobhau:13963: durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati /
SA01vakobhau:13979: asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karmaṃ tatpathaḥ // VAkK_4.24 // [211/10]
SA01vakobhau:13996: mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ / [211/18]
SA01vakobhau:14000: avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam / [211/20-211/21]
SA01vakobhau:14008: yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt / [211/26]
SA01vakobhau:14016: tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni anāgamyasyānantaraṃ ceti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ / [212/01]
SA01vakobhau:14021: yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param / [212/03]
SA01vakobhau:14029_0: svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā
SA01vakobhau:14029_2: mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu
SA01vakobhau:14029_3: daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti
SA01vakobhau:14031: sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ / [212/11]
SA01vakobhau:14035: saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ / [212/13]
SA01vakobhau:14053: athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau / [212/19-212/20]
SA01vakobhau:14059: kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti / [212/22]
SA01vakobhau:14076: na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti / [213/03]
SA01vakobhau:14080: evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti / [213/04]
SA01vakobhau:14084: yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena / [213/06]
SA01vakobhau:14090: yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so 'vaśyaṃ labheta / [213/08]
SA01vakobhau:14109: yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt / [213/16-213/17]
SA01vakobhau:14111: anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham / [213/17-213/18]
SA01vakobhau:14113: nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra sthāsyāt / [213/18-213/19]
SA01vakobhau:14135: evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate / [213/25]
SA01vakobhau:14143: “poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila poṣadho 'yami“ti / [214/03]
SA01vakobhau:14166: madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet / [214/11-214/12]
SA01vakobhau:14182: evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta / [214/16-214/18]
SA01vakobhau:14184: akālabhojanādvirati muktvā “anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya” iti / [214/18]
SA01vakobhau:14189: yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga upavāso draṣṭavyaḥ / [214/20-214/21]
SA01vakobhau:14191: akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca / [214/21-214/22]
SA01vakobhau:14193: dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [214/22-214/23]
SA01vakobhau:14195: natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti / [214/23-214/24]
SA01vakobhau:14197: pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt / [214/25]
SA01vakobhau:14203: anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā / [215/01]
SA01vakobhau:14207_0: sūtra uktaṃ “yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato
SA01vakobhau:14207_1: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya / [215/04]
SA01vakobhau:14231: yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā saṃvareṇopāsako 'sti / [215/14]
SA01vakobhau:14235: yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ / [215/17]
SA01vakobhau:14239: yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14247: na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ / [215/21]
SA01vakobhau:14253: tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā “avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma / [215/23]
SA01vakobhau:14263: ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate / [216/02]
SA01vakobhau:14267: ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti / [216/03-216/04]
SA01vakobhau:14269: upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate / [216/04-216/05]
SA01vakobhau:14271: “kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati /“ [216/05-216/06]
SA01vakobhau:14273: yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām / [216/06-216/07]
SA01vakobhau:14281: vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ / [216/09-216/10]
SA01vakobhau:14289: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt pṛthagjanasyādhimātraḥ / [216/13-216/14]
SA01vakobhau:14295: yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati / [216/16-216/17]
SA01vakobhau:14298: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam // VAkK_4.32 // [216/18-216/20]
SA01vakobhau:14300: yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati / [216/20]
SA01vakobhau:14312: yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti / [216/23]
SA01vakobhau:14319: yattu sūtra uktaṃ “yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi śaraṇaṃ gacchatami “ti / [216/26]
SA01vakobhau:14323: yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham / [216/27-216/28]
SA01vakobhau:14327: yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati / [216/29-217/01]
SA01vakobhau:14331: śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti / [217/01-217/02]
SA01vakobhau:14338: anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt / [217/04]
SA01vakobhau:14340: yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati / [217/04-217/05]
SA01vakobhau:14342: evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati / [217/05-217/06]
SA01vakobhau:14362: yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:14373: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt / [217/22]
SA01vakobhau:14382: sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran / [217/25-217/26]
SA01vakobhau:14386: janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti / [218/01-218/02]
SA01vakobhau:14390: ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na / [218/03]
SA01vakobhau:14398: yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtateḥ // VAkK_4.33 // [218/06]
SA01vakobhau:14405: na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ / [218/09-218/10]
SA01vakobhau:14407: atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ / [218/10]
SA01vakobhau:14415_0: sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti
SA01vakobhau:14415_1: mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi / [218/15-218/16]
SA01vakobhau:14417: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam / [218/17]
SA01vakobhau:14433: śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet / [218/22-218/23]
SA01vakobhau:14437: na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati / [218/24]
SA01vakobhau:14447: idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami” tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate / [218/28]
SA01vakobhau:14455: utsargavihitasyāpi glāneṣu prajñaptisāvadyasya punarmadyasyāpavādaḥ prasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ madnīyamātrānīyamanāt/ [219/02]
SA01vakobhau:14465: ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt / [219/05]
SA01vakobhau:14476: te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam / [219/08-219/09]
SA01vakobhau:14484: ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau / [219/12]
SA01vakobhau:14491: vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ / [219/15]
SA01vakobhau:14495: ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate / [219/17]
SA01vakobhau:14502_0: maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ
SA01vakobhau:14502_1: kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi / [219/21]
SA01vakobhau:14506: santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ / [219/22-219/23]
SA01vakobhau:14516: natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam / [220/02-220/03]
SA01vakobhau:14520: atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ / [220/05]
SA01vakobhau:14526: sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā / [220/07-220/08]
SA01vakobhau:14544: paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ / [220/12-220/13]
SA01vakobhau:14546: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte / [220/13-220/14]
SA01vakobhau:14548: asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ / [220/14]
SA01vakobhau:14550: yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte / [220/15]
SA01vakobhau:14556: asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ / [220/16-220/17]
SA01vakobhau:14562: yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt / [220/19-220/20]
SA01vakobhau:14582: yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt / [220/25]
SA01vakobhau:14586: evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [220/26]
SA01vakobhau:14590: yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām / [221/01]
SA01vakobhau:14592: na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt / [221/01-221/02]
SA01vakobhau:14594: ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet / [221/02-221/04]
SA01vakobhau:14596: yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ / [221/04]
SA01vakobhau:14600: evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta / [221/06]
SA01vakobhau:14608: asamvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ // VAkK_4.36 // [221/09]
SA01vakobhau:14616: yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā / [221/12-221/13]
SA01vakobhau:14620: tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca / [221/15-221/16]
SA01vakobhau:14622: rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā / [221/16-221/17]
SA01vakobhau:14632: aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate / [221/20]
SA01vakobhau:14636: na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ / [221/21-212/22]
SA01vakobhau:14638: āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt / [221/22-221/23]
SA01vakobhau:14640: yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ / [221/23-222/01]
SA01vakobhau:14642: kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ / [222/01]
SA01vakobhau:14646: kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti / [222/02]
SA01vakobhau:14653: mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti / [222/04-222/05]
SA01vakobhau:14655: yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte / [222/05]
SA01vakobhau:14657: sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [222/05-222/07]
SA01vakobhau:14659: yathā bhyupagamaṃ vikalo 'pi syāt prādeśiko 'pyasaṃvaraḥ saṃvaraścānyatrāṣṭavidhāditi sautrāntikāḥ / [222/07]
SA01vakobhau:14681: athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi / [222/15-222/16]
SA01vakobhau:14683: ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato 'syāvijñaptirutpadyate / [222/16-222/17]
SA01vakobhau:14699: śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca / [222/24]
SA01vakobhau:14726: na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti / [223/09]
SA01vakobhau:14735: āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti / [223/12]
SA01vakobhau:14739: katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti / [223/13-223/14]
SA01vakobhau:14759_0: na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi
SA01vakobhau:14759_2: abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāptu” mityupamāṃ kurvatā / [223/21]
SA01vakobhau:14763: evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti / [223/22-223/24]
SA01vakobhau:14765: sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ / [223/23-224/02]
SA01vakobhau:14767: yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ / [224/03-224/04]
SA01vakobhau:14780: “mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī” astyetaduktam / [224/09-224/10]
SA01vakobhau:14782: sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat / [224/10-224/11]
SA01vakobhau:14784: yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt / [224/11]
SA01vakobhau:14786: na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti / [224/11-224/12]
SA01vakobhau:14790: kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā / [224/13-224/14]
SA01vakobhau:14792: yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate / [224/14-224/15]
SA01vakobhau:14794: tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā / [224/15]
SA01vakobhau:14798: kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya / [224/17]
SA01vakobhau:14808: sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate / [224/21-224/22]
SA01vakobhau:14810: upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit / [224/23]
SA01vakobhau:14812: yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate [224/24]
SA01vakobhau:14816: anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate / [224/25-225/01]
SA01vakobhau:14832: yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate / [225/05]
SA01vakobhau:14848: ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram / [225/10]
SA01vakobhau:14861: yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi cchidyate / [225/16]
SA01vakobhau:14877: yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate / [225/22]
SA01vakobhau:14889: yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā / [226/03]
SA01vakobhau:14891: atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ / [226/04]
SA01vakobhau:14903: saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ / [226/09-226/10]
SA01vakobhau:14909: sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatī“ti / [226/12-226/13]
SA01vakobhau:14925: āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām / [226/18-226/20]
SA01vakobhau:14927_0: api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ
SA01vakobhau:14927_1: yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti / [226/20-226/21]
SA01vakobhau:14929: yattarhi sūtra uktam “aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya bhāvanādabhyudgamyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasatī“ti / [226/22]
SA01vakobhau:14949: ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ / [227/04]
SA01vakobhau:14951: ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate / [227/05]
SA01vakobhau:14961: kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt / [227/08-227/09]
SA01vakobhau:14963: tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ / [227/09-227/10]
SA01vakobhau:14965: tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam / [227/10]
SA01vakobhau:14970: puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam // VAkK_4.45 // [227/12]
SA01vakobhau:14984: nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā / [227/16-227/17]
SA01vakobhau:14996: tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati // VAkK_4.46 // [227/21]
SA01vakobhau:15006: yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate / [227/24-227/25]
SA01vakobhau:15008: rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate / [227/25-228/01]
SA01vakobhau:15014: yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
SA01vakobhau:15024: eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni / [228/07]
SA01vakobhau:15052: itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ / [228/18-228/19]
SA01vakobhau:15056: dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke / [228/19-228/20]
SA01vakobhau:15062: śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ “syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta / [228/21]
SA01vakobhau:15080: evaṃ tarhi “sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā” “diṣṭa-vipākaṃ ca kuśala” mityasya virodhaḥ / [229/03]
SA01vakobhau:15086: sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā / [229/05]
SA01vakobhau:15091: sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate / [229/06]
SA01vakobhau:15110: yathoktaṃ “cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedī“tyevamādi / [229/13]
SA01vakobhau:15119: yathoktaṃ “yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata” iti / [229/16-229/17]
SA01vakobhau:15121: nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate / [229/17]
SA01vakobhau:15129: taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam / [229/20-229/21]
SA01vakobhau:15137: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena / [229/26]
SA01vakobhau:15146: tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate / [230/01-230/02]
SA01vakobhau:15158: asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat / [230/06-230/07]
SA01vakobhau:15160: yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti / [230/08]
SA01vakobhau:15183: syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau / [230/16]
SA01vakobhau:15191: katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau / [230/20]
SA01vakobhau:15195: sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam / [230/22]
SA01vakobhau:15201: narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya / [230/24-230/25]
SA01vakobhau:15207: yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti / [230/28]
SA01vakobhau:15215: āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti / [231/03-231/04]
SA01vakobhau:15217: na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ / [231/05]
SA01vakobhau:15221: parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum / [231/07]
SA01vakobhau:15255: eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ / [231/20]
SA01vakobhau:15264: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat // VAkK_4.54 // [231/25-232/01]
SA01vakobhau:15266: yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam / [232/01]
SA01vakobhau:15272: tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate / [232/03]
SA01vakobhau:15276: tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat / [232/05]
SA01vakobhau:15294: tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate / [232/12]
SA01vakobhau:15300: yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ / [232/14-232/15]
SA01vakobhau:15306: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15327: ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate / [233/01-233/03]
SA01vakobhau:15329: śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati / [233/04]
SA01vakobhau:15334: syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī / [233/05-233/06]
SA01vakobhau:15341: avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre / [233/09-233/10]
SA01vakobhau:15354: tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat / [233/16]
SA01vakobhau:15357: katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena / [233/17]
SA01vakobhau:15369_0: ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:15369_1: vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena
SA01vakobhau:15369_2: vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate / [233/24]
SA01vakobhau:15380: amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti / [234/01]
SA01vakobhau:15391: kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti / [234/03-234/04]
SA01vakobhau:15393: nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ / [234/04-234/05]
SA01vakobhau:15397: karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate / [234/06]
SA01vakobhau:15401: asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ / [234/07]
SA01vakobhau:15405: kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam / [234/08]
SA01vakobhau:15421: te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā / [234/15]
SA01vakobhau:15478: aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt / [235/07]
SA01vakobhau:15486: yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca / [235/09-235/10]
SA01vakobhau:15496: na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt / [235/13-235/14]
SA01vakobhau:15498: nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti / [235/14]
SA01vakobhau:15506: anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate / [235/16-235/17]
SA01vakobhau:15512: uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya “ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā” iti / [235/19]
SA01vakobhau:15522: kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate / [235/23]
SA01vakobhau:15528: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat // VAkK_4.61 // [236/03-236/04]
SA01vakobhau:15530: darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma / [236/05]
SA01vakobhau:15532: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca / [236/06-236/07]
SA01vakobhau:15534: navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya / [236/08]
SA01vakobhau:15538: dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya / [236/10-236/11]
SA01vakobhau:15540: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena / [236/11-236/12]
SA01vakobhau:15547: ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate / [236/14]
SA01vakobhau:15551: anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti / [236/16-236/18]
SA01vakobhau:15553: narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam / [236/19]
SA01vakobhau:15567: sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca / [236/24]
SA01vakobhau:15576: aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti / [237/04]
SA01vakobhau:15583: api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma / [237/05-237/06]
SA01vakobhau:15607: eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham / [237/13]
SA01vakobhau:15618: akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca / [237/18]
SA01vakobhau:15626: kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt / [237/20]
SA01vakobhau:15631: sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [237/21-237/22]
SA01vakobhau:15645: daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ // VAkK_4.66 // [238/05-238/06]
SA01vakobhau:15647: teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ / [238/06-238/07]
SA01vakobhau:15651: akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ / [238/08]
SA01vakobhau:15655: yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham / [238/10]
SA01vakobhau:15657: vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva / [238/10-238/11]
SA01vakobhau:15661: kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā / [238/13]
SA01vakobhau:15679: te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva / [238/23]
SA01vakobhau:15685: kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca / [238/25-238/26]
SA01vakobhau:15701: yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt / [239/09]
SA01vakobhau:15711: yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt / [239/12-239/13]
SA01vakobhau:15715_0: yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati
SA01vakobhau:15715_1: paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti
SA01vakobhau:15715_2: dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ / [239/16-239/17]
SA01vakobhau:15717: yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ / [239/17-239/18]
SA01vakobhau:15719: dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca / [239/18-239/19]
SA01vakobhau:15723: yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti / [239/21]
SA01vakobhau:15727: abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ / [239/23]
SA01vakobhau:15731: kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte / [239/24]
SA01vakobhau:15735: yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti / [239/25-240/01]
SA01vakobhau:15741: yaduktaṃ “yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha” iti tanā vaktavyam / [240/03]
SA01vakobhau:15743: yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ “syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ / [240/03-240/06]
SA01vakobhau:15745: syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha” ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt / [240/06]
SA01vakobhau:15752: vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati / [240/07-240/08]
SA01vakobhau:15759: tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati / [240/10]
SA01vakobhau:15763_0: yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā
SA01vakobhau:15763_1: dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya
SA01vakobhau:15763_2: mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva
SA01vakobhau:15763_3: ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti / [240/14]
SA01vakobhau:15772: sūtra uktaṃ “prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭi“riti / [240/17-240/18]
SA01vakobhau:15774: tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam / [240/18]
SA01vakobhau:15782: tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya / [240/22]
SA01vakobhau:15786: mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām / [240/23-240/24]
SA01vakobhau:15788: duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti / [240/24]
SA01vakobhau:15799: lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā / [241/03]
SA01vakobhau:15805: duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ “sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate / [241/05-241/06]
SA01vakobhau:15807: tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce” ti / [241/07]
SA01vakobhau:15816: mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe / [241/10]
SA01vakobhau:15820: upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrā“miti / [241/11-241/12]
SA01vakobhau:15842: lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ / [241/22-241/23]
SA01vakobhau:15854: tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ / [242/01]
SA01vakobhau:15860: tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca / [242/03]
SA01vakobhau:15864: tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ / [242/04-242/05]
SA01vakobhau:15866: tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham / [242/06]
SA01vakobhau:15868: yaduktaṃ “na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhe“tyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā / [242/07]
SA01vakobhau:15891: eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā [242/18-242/19]
SA01vakobhau:15893: ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ [242/20]
SA01vakobhau:15895: sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // VAkK_4.71 // [242/21]
SA01vakobhau:15904: yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na / [242/25]
SA01vakobhau:15906: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ [242/26-242/27]
SA01vakobhau:15908: ata evocyate “syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate / [242/27]
SA01vakobhau:15912: syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryā“diti kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ / [243/03]
SA01vakobhau:15916: thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ / [243/05]
SA01vakobhau:15918: tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ / [243/05-243/06]
SA01vakobhau:15920: yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati / [243/07]
SA01vakobhau:15924: yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt / [243/08-243/09]
SA01vakobhau:15928: yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti / [243/12-243/13]
SA01vakobhau:15930: kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate / [243/14]
SA01vakobhau:15934: yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā / [243/16]
SA01vakobhau:15938: yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati / [243/17-243/18]
SA01vakobhau:15951: yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā / [243/22]
SA01vakobhau:15962: tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti / [243/26-243/27]
SA01vakobhau:15964: abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ / [243/27-244/01]
SA01vakobhau:15968: nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt / [244/03]
SA01vakobhau:15976: acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti / [244/06]
SA01vakobhau:15984: yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati / [244/09-244/10]
SA01vakobhau:15992: asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ / [244/13]
SA01vakobhau:15998: agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā / [244/15-244/16]
SA01vakobhau:16000: anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā / [244/16]
SA01vakobhau:16002: adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā / [244/17]
SA01vakobhau:16007: garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā / [244/18]
SA01vakobhau:16012: yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ / [244/19-244/20]
SA01vakobhau:16023: tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā / [244/23]
SA01vakobhau:16025: kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ / [244/24]
SA01vakobhau:16029: yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ / [245/01]
SA01vakobhau:16037: kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ / [245/03]
SA01vakobhau:16044: ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe / [245/05]
SA01vakobhau:16048: yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ / [245/06-245/07]
SA01vakobhau:16060: “adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ / [245/11-245/12]
SA01vakobhau:16062: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ / [245/12-245/13]
SA01vakobhau:16083: sūtraṃ tāvat “tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti / [245/21-245/22]
SA01vakobhau:16085: api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā / [245/22]
SA01vakobhau:16089: ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta / [245/24-245/25]
SA01vakobhau:16091: atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityu“ktam / [245/25-245/26]
SA01vakobhau:16095: ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ / [245/27]
SA01vakobhau:16099: na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma / [245/28]
SA01vakobhau:16103: atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate / [246/01]
SA01vakobhau:16116: ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante / [246/05]
SA01vakobhau:16139: syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta / [246/11-246/12]
SA01vakobhau:16141: syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta / [246/13]
SA01vakobhau:16145: yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati / [246/15]
SA01vakobhau:16152: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam / [246/17-246/18]
SA01vakobhau:16162: yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam / [246/23]
SA01vakobhau:16175: ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare / [247/03]
SA01vakobhau:16181: tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti / [247/06]
SA01vakobhau:16185: evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ / [247/07-247/08]
SA01vakobhau:16187: kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ / [247/08-247/09]
SA01vakobhau:16189: naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni / [247/09-247/10]
SA01vakobhau:16195: aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ / [247/13-247/14]
SA01vakobhau:16199: tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre “so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye” tyevamādi / [247/15-247/16]
SA01vakobhau:16201: yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare / [247/16-247/17
SA01vakobhau:16213: śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / [247/22-247/24]
SA01vakobhau:16215: tadyathā “nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta” iti / [247/24-247/25]
SA01vakobhau:16224: trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca // VAkK_4.78 // [248/03]
SA01vakobhau:16226: abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ / [248/03-248/04]
SA01vakobhau:16228: tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati / [248/04]
SA01vakobhau:16232: sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti / [248/06]
SA01vakobhau:16240: prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ / [248/09-248/09-]
SA01vakobhau:16246: ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ / [248/11]
SA01vakobhau:16250: api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ / [248/12-248/13]
SA01vakobhau:16254: ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ / [248/15]
SA01vakobhau:16262: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatī“ti / [248/18-248/20]
SA01vakobhau:16264: akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate / [248/21]
SA01vakobhau:16290: yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti / [249/06-249/07]
SA01vakobhau:16294: sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā / [249/08]
SA01vakobhau:16318: yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī“ti / [249/18]
SA01vakobhau:16329: eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi / [249/21-249/22]
SA01vakobhau:16335: pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke / [249/23]
SA01vakobhau:16385: yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate / [250/11-250/12]
SA01vakobhau:16398: navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat / [250/17-250/18]
SA01vakobhau:16406: tameva saṃdhāyoktam “abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati” iti / [250/22-250/24]
SA01vakobhau:16408: upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ / [250/24-250/25]
SA01vakobhau:16414: ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti / [250/26]
SA01vakobhau:16418: evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti / [251/01]
SA01vakobhau:16431: ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake / [251/05]
SA01vakobhau:16435: tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti / [251/07]
SA01vakobhau:16447: vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā / [251/12]
SA01vakobhau:16470: ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane / [251/19]
SA01vakobhau:16476: kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti [251/22]
SA01vakobhau:16480: ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate /
SA01vakobhau:16493: saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne / [252/05]

SA01vakobhau:16549: gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti / [253/04]

SA01vakobhau:16571: pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante / [253/13]
SA01vakobhau:16575: kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva / [253/14-253/16]
SA01vakobhau:16581: yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati / [253/18]

SA01vakobhau:16603_0: sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena
SA01vakobhau:16603_3: abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ / [254/05]
SA01vakobhau:16621_2: viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā / [254/12]
SA01vakobhau:16640: prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya [254/19]
SA01vakobhau:16652: evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate / [254/24-254/25]
SA01vakobhau:16654: sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam / [254/25-254/26]

SA01vakobhau:16749: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ // VAkK_4.89 // [256/15]

SA01vakobhau:16817: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ / [257/18]

SA01vakobhau:16857: yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi / [258/08]

SA01vakobhau:16880: yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ “so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta” iti / [258/17]

SA01vakobhau:17174: ata evocyate “syāt puruṣaṃ jīvitādvacyaparopayenna pitaraṃ nārhantam / [263/02-263/03]

SA01vakobhau:17200: ekena prahāreṇa mātaramanyāṃ ca mārayato dve avijñaptī bhavataḥ / [263/12]
SA01vakobhau:17211: idamavadānaṃ kathaṃ nīyate “gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhi dve ānantarye bhavatā kṛte / [263/16-263/17]

SA01vakobhau:17243: yaḥ saṃghabhedanimittaṃ mṛṣāvādo dharmādharmajñasya viparyayadyotanāt sa sarveṣāṃ duścaritānāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ / [264/06]
SA01vakobhau:17249_2: vimanaskaṃ vartate yāvat punarna pratisaṃdhito bhavatiyasmāccāvicau kalpaṃ vipākaḥ / [264/10-264/11]
SA01vakobhau:17251: śeṣāṇāmānantaryāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pañcamatṛtīyaprathamāni gurutarāṇi sarvalaghuḥ pitṛvadhaḥ / [264/11-264/13]
SA01vakobhau:17253: yattarhi bhagavatā trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ manodaṇḍo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ punarmithyādṛṣṭiḥ paramavadyānāmityuktam ānantaryāṇi niyamasya saṃghabhedo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ / [264/13-264/14]

SA01vakobhau:17286: yadi mātaramarhantīṃ dūṣayatyabrahmacaryakaraṇāt niyatipatītaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mārayati śaikṣaṃ mārayati saṃghasya sukhāyadvārikaṃ harati stūpabhedaṃ karoti / [265/04-265/05]

SA01vakobhau:17312: yataḥ prabhṛti lakṣaṇavipākāni karmāṇyārabhate kartuṃ sa hi tadānīṃ niyatipatito bhavati / [265/16]

SA01vakobhau:17343: cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat // VAkK_4.109 // [266/03]
SA01vakobhau:17352: saṃmukhībhūta eva śāstari buddhālambanayaiva cetanayā cintāmayaṃ tatkarma na śrutamayaṃ na bhāvanāmayam / [266/05-266/06]

SA01vakobhau:17356: bhagavatā tu śākyamuninottaptavīryatayā nava kalpā apāvartitā ekanavatyā kalpairākṣiptam / [266/07-266/09]
SA01vakobhau:17358: ata eva cokta “mito 'haṃ grāmaṇīrekanavataṃ kalpamupādāya na samanusmarāmi nābhijānāmi yadekakulamapi pakṣabhikṣāpradānahetoḥ kṣataṃ vā syādupahataṃ ve“ti / [266/09-266/11]
SA01vakobhau:17360: tataḥ prabhṛti prakṛtijātismaratvāt prathamakalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryāta eva bodhisattva etāṃścaturo doṣān vyāvartayati dvau ca guṇo pratilabhata iti pūrvācāryāḥ / [266/11]
SA01vakobhau:17370: yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena trisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko 'bhinivartata ityapare / [266/15]
