SA01vakobhau:18267: so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti / [283/02-283/03]
SA01vakobhau:18271: yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ / [283/04]
SA01vakobhau:18302: ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt / [283/13]
SA01vakobhau:18322: anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ / [283/21-283/22]
SA01vakobhau:18324: yattarhi sūtre ukta “manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa” iti / [283/22]
SA01vakobhau:18336: loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti / [284/04-284/05]
SA01vakobhau:18338: ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti / [284/05]
SA01vakobhau:18349: duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ / [284/08-284/09]
SA01vakobhau:18351: itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti / [284/09]
SA01vakobhau:18359: na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti / [284/12-284/13]
SA01vakobhau:18361: sūtre 'pi coktaṃ “yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / [284/13-284/14]
SA01vakobhau:18363: yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata” iti vistaraḥ / [284/14-284/16]
SA01vakobhau:18365: tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat / [284/16]
SA01vakobhau:18372: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare / [284/19-284/20]
SA01vakobhau:18378: atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:18410: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ / [285/07]
SA01vakobhau:18412: nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna” iti / [285/07-285/08]
SA01vakobhau:18429: nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam / [285/14]
SA01vakobhau:18431: asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate / [285/15]
SA01vakobhau:18435: prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā / [285/18]
SA01vakobhau:18443: etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati / [285/21]
SA01vakobhau:18449: yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt / [285/25]
SA01vakobhau:18495: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā // VAkK_5.12 // [286/20-286/21]
SA01vakobhau:18497: duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā / [286/20-287/01]
SA01vakobhau:18501: sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt / [287/02]
SA01vakobhau:18506: atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ / [287/04]
SA01vakobhau:18512: evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti / [287/06-287/07]
SA01vakobhau:18534: kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā” iti vacanāt / [287/15-287/17]
SA01vakobhau:18536: yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ / [287/17-287/18]
SA01vakobhau:18544: kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ / [287/21]
SA01vakobhau:18551: sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam / [287/23-288/01]
SA01vakobhau:18555: ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate / [288/02]
SA01vakobhau:18568: nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā '; 'veṇikī ca / [288/08]
SA01vakobhau:18580: nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva / [288/13-288/14]
SA01vakobhau:18582: mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam / [288/14-288/15]
SA01vakobhau:18588: yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti / [288/17-288/18]
SA01vakobhau:18602: varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat / [289/03]
SA01vakobhau:18609: na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ // VAkK_5.16 // [289/06]
SA01vakobhau:18625: ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate / [289/13]
SA01vakobhau:18627: asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam / [289/14]
SA01vakobhau:18646: yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante / [289/21]
SA01vakobhau:18655: kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām / [290/01]
SA01vakobhau:18668: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ // VAkK_5.18 // [290/05]
SA01vakobhau:18678: te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ / [290/09]
SA01vakobhau:18700: ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati / [290/17]
SA01vakobhau:18704: ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā “etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatī“ti / [290/19]
SA01vakobhau:18740: setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ / [291/15]
SA01vakobhau:18749: vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti / [292/01]
SA01vakobhau:18768: yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:18784: kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti / [292/16-292/17]
SA01vakobhau:18786: kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam / [292/17]
SA01vakobhau:18807: yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt / [292/24-293/01]
SA01vakobhau:18809: manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam / [293/01-293/02]
SA01vakobhau:18811: tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate / [293/02-293/03]
SA01vakobhau:18823_0: “tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ
SA01vakobhau:18825: vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti / [293/09]
SA01vakobhau:18828: sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti / [293/10]
SA01vakobhau:18831: sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca / [293/11]
SA01vakobhau:18849: na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti / [293/16-293/17]
SA01vakobhau:18851: yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam / [293/18]
SA01vakobhau:18853: yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati / [293/18-293/19]
SA01vakobhau:18855: paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati / [293/19-293/20]
SA01vakobhau:18857: sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam / [293/20-293/21]
SA01vakobhau:18870: sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ / [293/24]
SA01vakobhau:18874: saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ / [293/25-293/26]
SA01vakobhau:18878: saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti / [293/27-293/28]
SA01vakobhau:18880: sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi / [293/28-293/29]
SA01vakobhau:18882: evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ / [293/29]
SA01vakobhau:18898: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna” iti / [294/04-294/05]
SA01vakobhau:18900: yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ / [294/05-294/06]
SA01vakobhau:18902: idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti / [294/07]
SA01vakobhau:18913: atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ / [294/12]
SA01vakobhau:18955: kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā / [295/04-295/05]
SA01vakobhau:18957: na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt / [295/05-295/06]
SA01vakobhau:18967: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā '“tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat / [295/11-295/12]
SA01vakobhau:18971: anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat / [295/13-295/14]
SA01vakobhau:18980: cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti / [295/17]
SA01vakobhau:18982: asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt / [295/18]
SA01vakobhau:18990: yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt / [295/21]
SA01vakobhau:18996: yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt / [295/23-296/01]
SA01vakobhau:19007: ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ / [296/04-296/06]
SA01vakobhau:19009: ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ / [296/06-296/07]
SA01vakobhau:19023: yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam / [296/12-296/13]
SA01vakobhau:19025: yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam / [296/13-296/14]
SA01vakobhau:19029: evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti / [296/16]
SA01vakobhau:19040: tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti / [296/20]
SA01vakobhau:19045: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ / [296/21-296/23]
SA01vakobhau:19047: yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti / [297/01]
SA01vakobhau:19052: dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ / [297/02-297/03]
SA01vakobhau:19054: yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti / [297/03]
SA01vakobhau:19058: eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ / [297/04-297/05]
SA01vakobhau:19064: puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam / [297/06-297/07]
SA01vakobhau:19068: atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti / [297/08]
SA01vakobhau:19080: yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:19093: yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram / [297/16]
SA01vakobhau:19097: atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ / [297/18]
SA01vakobhau:19115: atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca / [298/02]
SA01vakobhau:19119: ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti / [298/04]
SA01vakobhau:19131: yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati / [298/09]
SA01vakobhau:19136: yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ / [298/11]
SA01vakobhau:19141: yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti / [298/12]
SA01vakobhau:19149: tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti / [298/16]
SA01vakobhau:19153: kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate / [298/17]
SA01vakobhau:19157: yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti / [298/18-298/19]
SA01vakobhau:19163: nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ / [298/20]
SA01vakobhau:19177: evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ / [299/03]
SA01vakobhau:19189: tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā “astyatītamastyanāgatami“ti / [299/07]
SA01vakobhau:19193: yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti / [299/09]
SA01vakobhau:19199: yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā “yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastī“ti / [299/11-299/12]
SA01vakobhau:19201: kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma / [299/12-299/13]
SA01vakobhau:19203: tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam / [299/13]
SA01vakobhau:19205: anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet / [299/13-299/15]
SA01vakobhau:19207: itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā “cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati / [299/15-299/16]
SA01vakobhau:19209: iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatī“ti [299/16-299/17]
SA01vakobhau:19211: yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti / [299/17]
SA01vakobhau:19220: yadapyuktaṃ “dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam / [299/20-299/21]
SA01vakobhau:19222: yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti / [299/21-299/22]
SA01vakobhau:19224: yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati / [299/23]
SA01vakobhau:19234: yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti / [299/25-299/26]
SA01vakobhau:19236: na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati / [299/26]
SA01vakobhau:19241: yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate / [299/27-299/28]
SA01vakobhau:19243: yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate / [299/28]
SA01vakobhau:19254: yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam / [300/01-300/02]
SA01vakobhau:19260: na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati / [300/04-300/05]
SA01vakobhau:19262: sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati “cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatī“ti vistaraḥ / [300/05]
SA01vakobhau:19268: yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti / [300/06-300/07]
SA01vakobhau:19279: evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta / [300/09-300/10]
SA01vakobhau:19285: evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt / [300/11]
SA01vakobhau:19299: yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam “yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata” iti / [300/15-300/16]
SA01vakobhau:19305: itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ / [300/18]
SA01vakobhau:19309: yadanyatra bhagavatoktam “etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati / [300/19-300/20]
SA01vakobhau:19313: sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata” iti / [300/21]
SA01vakobhau:19320: naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti / [300/23]
SA01vakobhau:19325: yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam / [300/25]
SA01vakobhau:19364: yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati / [301/10-301/11]
SA01vakobhau:19366: tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati / [301/11]
SA01vakobhau:19393: yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti / [301/20-301/21]
SA01vakobhau:19397: syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā [301/22-301/23]
SA01vakobhau:19400: prāk prahīṇe prakāre ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ // VAkK_5.28 // [301/24-302/01]
SA01vakobhau:19402: duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati / [302/01]
SA01vakobhau:19404: tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ / [302/02-302/03]
SA01vakobhau:19406: bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ / [302/04-302/05]
SA01vakobhau:19408: kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate / [302/05]
SA01vakobhau:19412: kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti / [302/06-302/07]
SA01vakobhau:19414: samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca / [302/07]
SA01vakobhau:19418: tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam / [302/09]
SA01vakobhau:19431: kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam / [302/14-302/15]
SA01vakobhau:19433: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti / [302/16]
SA01vakobhau:19437: rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam / [302/17-302/18]
SA01vakobhau:19449: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam / [302/21-302/22]
SA01vakobhau:19465: kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam / [303/03-303/04]
SA01vakobhau:19475: nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti / [303/07-303/08]
SA01vakobhau:19491: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam / [303/17]
SA01vakobhau:19495: sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam / [303/19-303/20]
SA01vakobhau:19497: sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti / [303/20-303/21]
SA01vakobhau:19507: tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam / [303/25-303/26]
SA01vakobhau:19511: tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam / [304/01-304/02]
SA01vakobhau:19513: tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya / [304/02-304/05]
SA01vakobhau:19515_0: idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau
SA01vakobhau:19515_1: vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā
SA01vakobhau:19589: apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt / [305/14]
SA01vakobhau:19600: tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate / [305/20-305/21]
SA01vakobhau:19604: evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ [305/22]
SA01vakobhau:19613: eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti / [306/03-306/04]
SA01vakobhau:19627: avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi / [306/09-306/10]
SA01vakobhau:19640: nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca / [306/15]
SA01vakobhau:19652: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ / [306/19]
SA01vakobhau:19658: te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ / [306/22-306/23]
SA01vakobhau:19660: yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham / [306/23]
SA01vakobhau:19676: evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ / [307/05]
SA01vakobhau:19684: na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt / [307/08]
SA01vakobhau:19688: miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi / [307/09-307/10]
SA01vakobhau:19720: gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi / [307/21-307/22]
SA01vakobhau:19726: avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā // VAkK_5.38 // [308/01]
SA01vakobhau:19728: asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā / [308/01-308/02]
SA01vakobhau:19732_0: vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema
SA01vakobhau:19732_1: kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ kāmādhyavasānaṃ
SA01vakobhau:19738: cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti / [308/07]
SA01vakobhau:19759: āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ / [308/17]
SA01vakobhau:19794: ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta / [309/06-309/07]
SA01vakobhau:19796: āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu / [309/08]
SA01vakobhau:19806: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak / [309/14]
SA01vakobhau:19813: ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte / [309/16-309/17]
SA01vakobhau:19815: ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt / [309/18-309/19]
SA01vakobhau:19817: atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam / [309/20-309/21]
SA01vakobhau:19834: tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti / [310/03]
SA01vakobhau:19839: avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni / [310/04]
SA01vakobhau:19851: tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum / [310/09-310/10]
SA01vakobhau:19855: yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca / [310/12]
SA01vakobhau:19889: eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān / [311/06]
SA01vakobhau:19906: tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca / [311/13]
SA01vakobhau:19914: rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ / [311/15]
SA01vakobhau:19932: tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te / [312/04-312/05]
SA01vakobhau:19939: ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ / [312/09-312/10]
SA01vakobhau:19969: kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ / [312/20]
SA01vakobhau:19992: pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ / [313/09]
SA01vakobhau:20004: cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate / [313/14]
SA01vakobhau:20008: sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti / [313/15]
SA01vakobhau:20012: viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate / [313/16-313/17]
SA01vakobhau:20031: ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt / [314/06-314/07]
SA01vakobhau:20067: etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne /
SA01vakobhau:20072: sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ / [315/06]
SA01vakobhau:20091: darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi / [315/15]
SA01vakobhau:20097: ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ / [315/19]
SA01vakobhau:20110: yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ / [316/05]
SA01vakobhau:20131: tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam / [316/15]
SA01vakobhau:20202: na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ / [318/05]
SA01vakobhau:20206: āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante / [318/07]
SA01vakobhau:20210: yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca / [318/09-318/10]
SA01vakobhau:20222: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam / [318/15]
SA01vakobhau:20242: ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ / [319/01]
SA01vakobhau:20249: jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti / [319/04]
SA01vakobhau:20265: styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni / [319/10-319/11]
SA01vakobhau:20267: etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti / [319/11]
SA01vakobhau:20277: cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ / [319/15-319/17]
SA01vakobhau:20279: tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ / [319/17]
SA01vakobhau:20287: visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante / [319/20-319/21]
SA01vakobhau:20289: yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam / [319/21-319/22]
SA01vakobhau:20320: yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate / [320/05-320/06]
SA01vakobhau:20341: vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati / [320/13-320/14]
SA01vakobhau:20356: na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate / [320/19-320/20]
SA01vakobhau:20418: kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:20443: sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate / [322/06-322/07]
SA01vakobhau:20445: dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca / [322/07]
SA01vakobhau:20472: yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ [322/18]
SA01vakobhau:20476: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti / [322/19-322/21]
SA01vakobhau:20478_1: mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti / [323/01]
SA01vakobhau:20489: kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām / [323/05-323/06]
SA01vakobhau:20515: vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ / [323/16]
SA01vakobhau:20519: sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti / [323/18]
SA01vakobhau:20553: dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām / [324/12-324/13]
SA01vakobhau:20567: yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate / [324/18-325/01]
SA01vakobhau:20569: pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate / [325/01]
SA01vakobhau:20573: tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu bhavāgravikalīkṛṭam / [325/02-325/03]
SA01vakobhau:20594: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti / [325/10-325/11]
SA01vakobhau:20596: sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ / [325/12]
SA01vakobhau:20612: bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā // VAkK_5.69 // [325/19-325/20]
SA01vakobhau:20614: bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ / [325/20-325/21]
SA01vakobhau:20616: parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā / [325/21-325/22]
SA01vakobhau:20626: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ / [325/25-325/01]
SA01vakobhau:20632: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca / [326/03]
SA01vakobhau:20638: atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā / [326/06]
SA01vakobhau:20640: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na // VAkK_5.70 // [326/07]
SA01vakobhau:20642: ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ / [326/07-326/08]
SA01vakobhau:20644: dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ / [326/08-326/09]
SA01vakobhau:20704: “anāsravā mārgasatyami“ti svaśabdena “pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga” iti nirodhasatyaṃ “duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka” ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye / [327/15]
SA01vakobhau:20723: itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ / [328/02]
SA01vakobhau:20731: na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati / [328/04-328/05]
SA01vakobhau:20739: yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate / [328/07-328/08]
SA01vakobhau:20741: paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam / [328/08-328/09]
SA01vakobhau:20750: yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ / [328/11-328/12]
SA01vakobhau:20768: ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ / [328/16]
SA01vakobhau:20783: ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt / [328/21-328/22]
SA01vakobhau:20789: dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare / [328/23-328/24]
SA01vakobhau:20796: manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ // VAkK_6.3 // [329/01]
SA01vakobhau:20798: tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca / [329/01-329/02]
SA01vakobhau:20809: tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante / [329/05-329/06]
SA01vakobhau:20813: sūtra uktaṃ “sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkh“ti / [329/07]
SA01vakobhau:20835: “ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
SA01vakobhau:20836: akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:20840: na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti / [329/18]
SA01vakobhau:20845: pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham / [329/19-329/20]
SA01vakobhau:20847: na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt / [329/20-329/21]
SA01vakobhau:20849: yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya / [329/21-329/22]
SA01vakobhau:20855: ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet / [329/24]
SA01vakobhau:20860: duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti” iti // [330/01]
SA01vakobhau:20862: sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /
SA01vakobhau:20879: na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti / [330/07]
SA01vakobhau:20881: saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet / [330/07-330/08]
SA01vakobhau:20891: anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati / [330/10-330/11]
SA01vakobhau:20893: nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā / [330/11]
SA01vakobhau:20909: ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante / [330/15-330/17]
SA01vakobhau:20911: na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya / [330/17]
SA01vakobhau:20913: ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti / [330/17-330/18]
SA01vakobhau:20919: na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa / [330/20-330/21]
SA01vakobhau:20921: tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ / [330/22]
SA01vakobhau:20948: yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati / [330/27-331/02]
SA01vakobhau:20950: tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati / [331/02]
SA01vakobhau:20954: yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ / [331/04]
SA01vakobhau:20958_1: “saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasye“ti / [331/07-331/08]
SA01vakobhau:20960: ato na duḥkha-dukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati / [331/08-331/09]
SA01vakobhau:20962: yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat / [331/09]
SA01vakobhau:20964: tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca / [331/10]
SA01vakobhau:20968: kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti / [331/11-331/12]
SA01vakobhau:20970: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti / [331/12]
SA01vakobhau:20974: idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti / [331/13]
SA01vakobhau:20979: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati / [331/15]
SA01vakobhau:20984: sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt / [331/16-331/17]
SA01vakobhau:20986: sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt / [331/17-331/18]
SA01vakobhau:20992: yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ / [331/19]
SA01vakobhau:21003: lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca / [331/23-331/24]
SA01vakobhau:21005: tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ / [331/24]
SA01vakobhau:21011: yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat / [331/26-332/01]
SA01vakobhau:21017_0: “yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye” ti vistareṇoktvā
SA01vakobhau:21017_1: “yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni
SA01vakobhau:21019: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet / [332/05]
SA01vakobhau:21024: sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt / [332/06-332/08]
SA01vakobhau:21026: yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati / [332/08-332/09]
SA01vakobhau:21028: anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt / [332/09]
SA01vakobhau:21033: kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti / [332/11]
SA01vakobhau:21035: triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt / [332/11-332/12]
SA01vakobhau:21037: ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam / [332/12-332/14]
SA01vakobhau:21039: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatami“tyevamādi / [332/14]
SA01vakobhau:21048: āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /
SA01vakobhau:21051: sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ / [332/18-332/20]
SA01vakobhau:21053: tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ / [332/20-332/21]
SA01vakobhau:21055: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ / [332/21-332/22]
SA01vakobhau:21057: yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ / [332/22-332/23]
SA01vakobhau:21059: yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt / [332/23-332/24]
SA01vakobhau:21061: dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi / [332/24-332/25]
SA01vakobhau:21091: “karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya” iti / [333/06]
SA01vakobhau:21101: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā / [333/10-333/11]
SA01vakobhau:21113: tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ / [333/14-333/15]
SA01vakobhau:21125: satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti / [333/18]
SA01vakobhau:21132: yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ / [333/19-333/20]
SA01vakobhau:21136: na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā / [333/21]
SA01vakobhau:21140: na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ / [333/23]
SA01vakobhau:21144: dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca / [333/24]
SA01vakobhau:21148: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
SA01vakobhau:21151: yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat /
SA01vakobhau:21154: tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati / [334/04-334/05]
SA01vakobhau:21156: tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam / [334/05]
SA01vakobhau:21162: teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam / [334/07-334/08]
SA01vakobhau:21172: tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva / [334/10]
SA01vakobhau:21178: yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam / [334/12-334/13]
SA01vakobhau:21190: satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati / [334/16-334/17]
SA01vakobhau:21194: śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate / [334/18]
SA01vakobhau:21196: samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate / [334/18-334/19]
SA01vakobhau:21217: suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [335/02-335/03]
SA01vakobhau:21219: asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare / [335/03-335/04]
SA01vakobhau:21221: yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti / [335/04-335/05]
SA01vakobhau:21233: tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha / [335/09]
SA01vakobhau:21254: nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad / [335/17]
SA01vakobhau:21302: dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca / [336/16]
SA01vakobhau:21306: anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti / [336/17-336/18]
SA01vakobhau:21336: tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati / [337/08]
SA01vakobhau:21346: adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ / [337/11-337/12]
SA01vakobhau:21362: tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca / [337/16-337/17]
SA01vakobhau:21366: dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām / [337/19]
SA01vakobhau:21372: asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu / [338/02-338/03]
SA01vakobhau:21374: sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate / [338/03]
SA01vakobhau:21383: svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ / [338/06-338/07]
SA01vakobhau:21385: sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati / [338/07-338/09]
SA01vakobhau:21387: tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham / [338/09-338/10]
SA01vakobhau:21397: sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti / [338/14-338/15]
SA01vakobhau:21399: evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ / [338/16]
SA01vakobhau:21403: so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati / [338/17-338/18]
SA01vakobhau:21407: astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam / [338/19-338/20]
SA01vakobhau:21411: atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate / [338/22]
SA01vakobhau:21417: alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne / [338/25-338/26]
SA01vakobhau:21451: pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt / [339/10-339/11]
SA01vakobhau:21457: ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā / [339/13]
SA01vakobhau:21479: gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca / [339/20-339/22]
SA01vakobhau:21481: tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa / [339/22]
SA01vakobhau:21499: kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti / [340/04]
SA01vakobhau:21503: niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare / [340/06]
SA01vakobhau:21507: sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati / [340/07]
SA01vakobhau:21511: kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti / [340/08]
SA01vakobhau:21513: upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva / [340/08-340/10]
SA01vakobhau:21515: catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati / [340/10-340/11]
SA01vakobhau:21517: vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu / [340/11]
SA01vakobhau:21538: yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante / [340/20-340/21]
SA01vakobhau:21540: jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti / [340/21-340/22]
SA01vakobhau:21559: nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau // VAkK_6.13 // [341/06]
SA01vakobhau:21579: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām / [341/13]
SA01vakobhau:21586: sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati / [341/16]
SA01vakobhau:21635: tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena “tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata” iti vistaraḥ / [342/13-342/14]
SA01vakobhau:21637: bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ “tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍhe“ti / [342/14-342/15]
SA01vakobhau:21639: yatra tūktaṃ “kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca / [342/15-342/17]
SA01vakobhau:21645: yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam / [342/19]
SA01vakobhau:21654: yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / [342/24]
SA01vakobhau:21658: śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā / [343/03]
SA01vakobhau:21662: atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam / [343/04-343/05]
SA01vakobhau:21669: saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati / [343/09]
SA01vakobhau:21690: nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca / [343/18-343/19]
SA01vakobhau:21729: yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt / [344/12-344/13]
SA01vakobhau:21746_1: dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti / [345/01]
SA01vakobhau:21756: te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ / [345/05]
SA01vakobhau:21762: ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante / [345/08]
SA01vakobhau:21774: tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante / [345/14]
SA01vakobhau:21785: mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve / [345/17-345/18]
SA01vakobhau:21799: ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca / [346/02-346/03]
SA01vakobhau:21801: eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram / [346/03]
SA01vakobhau:21806: niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti / [346/05]
SA01vakobhau:21820: anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt / [346/11]
SA01vakobhau:21837: bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ / [346/17]
SA01vakobhau:21861: yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt / [347/06]
SA01vakobhau:21876: yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati / [347/13]
SA01vakobhau:21882: yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni / [347/16]
SA01vakobhau:21925: ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ / [348/13]
SA01vakobhau:21940: trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ / [348/18-348/19]
SA01vakobhau:21956: kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet / [349/03-349/04]
SA01vakobhau:22047: tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate / [350/14]
SA01vakobhau:22052: yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate [350/16]
SA01vakobhau:22101: duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ / [351/15-351/16]
SA01vakobhau:22110: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:22113: “ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya” iti / [351/21]
SA01vakobhau:22119: athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va4itvalābhādekābhisamayaṃ brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt / [352/01-352/02]
SA01vakobhau:22121: antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt / [352/02-352/03]
SA01vakobhau:22123: atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati / [352/03-352/04]
SA01vakobhau:22127: evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt / [352/04-352/05]
SA01vakobhau:22129: darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate / [352/05-352/07]
SA01vakobhau:22131: “nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya” iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi / [352/07-352/08]
SA01vakobhau:22133: “yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa” iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet / [352/08] na /
SA01vakobhau:22146: kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:22161: yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt / [352/18]
SA01vakobhau:22165: kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet / [352/19]
SA01vakobhau:22178: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ / [353/02]
SA01vakobhau:22199: ata eva darśanamārga iti cet / na /
SA01vakobhau:22207: na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ / [353/10-353/11]
SA01vakobhau:22213: ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau [353/14]
SA01vakobhau:22234: phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt / [353/20-353/22]
SA01vakobhau:22236: tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete / [353/23]
SA01vakobhau:22240: yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti / [353/25]
SA01vakobhau:22248: yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti / [354/03]
SA01vakobhau:22257: yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete / [354/07]
SA01vakobhau:22263: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ / [354/10]
SA01vakobhau:22265: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete / [354/10-354/11]
SA01vakobhau:22272: yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati / [354/12]
SA01vakobhau:22274: srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā / [354/13]
SA01vakobhau:22283: tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate / [354/17]
SA01vakobhau:22289: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ / [354/20]
SA01vakobhau:22296: phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ / [354/23-354/24]
SA01vakobhau:22298: ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate / [354/24-354/25]
SA01vakobhau:22302: yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti / [355/01-355/02]
SA01vakobhau:22304: anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt / [355/02-355/03]
SA01vakobhau:22311: yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ [355/06]
SA01vakobhau:22320: tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva / [355/09-355/10]
SA01vakobhau:22328: teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante / [355/13-355/15]
SA01vakobhau:22330: tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti / [355/15-355/16]
SA01vakobhau:22336: ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ / [355/18-355/19]
SA01vakobhau:22338: audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ / [355/19]
SA01vakobhau:22340: śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ / [355/19-355/21]
SA01vakobhau:22350: yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ / [356/01-356/02]
SA01vakobhau:22364: tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ / [356/05]
SA01vakobhau:22374: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ / [356/08-356/09]
SA01vakobhau:22387: yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ “asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati / [356/13]
SA01vakobhau:22392: yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti / [356/15-356/16]
SA01vakobhau:22398: iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti / [356/17]
SA01vakobhau:22408: yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti / [356/20]
SA01vakobhau:22455: yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ / [357/08]
SA01vakobhau:22457: anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate / [357/08-357/09]
SA01vakobhau:22459: evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati / [357/10]
SA01vakobhau:22471: śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt / [357/14-357/15]
SA01vakobhau:22480: tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ / [357/17]
SA01vakobhau:22486: devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye / [357/19-357/20]
SA01vakobhau:22488: manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti / [357/20]
SA01vakobhau:22494: yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ / [357/24]
SA01vakobhau:22522: avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta” ityuktaṃ prāk / [358/09-358/10]
SA01vakobhau:22524: yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti / [358/10]
SA01vakobhau:22528: vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ / [358/12-358/13]
SA01vakobhau:22532: pūrvaprahīṇaprakārastu phalaprāptau na tāvatkulaṅkulo bhavatyekavīciko vā yāvatphalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na samukhīkṛtaḥ / [358/15]
SA01vakobhau:22542: avaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni bhavanti / [358/19]
SA01vakobhau:22556: upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt / [359/02]
SA01vakobhau:22583: ūrdhvasrotā yasyordhvaṃ gatirna tatriva parinirvāṇaṃ yatropapannaḥ / [359/10]
SA01vakobhau:22592: phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti / [359/15]
SA01vakobhau:22599_0: tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya
SA01vakobhau:22599_1: brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto
SA01vakobhau:22603: ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati / [359/20-359/21]
SA01vakobhau:22607: sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati / [359/22]
SA01vakobhau:22627: sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti / [360/04]
SA01vakobhau:22635: akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti / [360/06-360/07]
SA01vakobhau:22677: teṣāmapi navānāṃ prtyekamata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣaḥ / [361/02]
SA01vakobhau:22685: kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ / [361/05]
SA01vakobhau:22693: kasmāt punaretā eva satpuruṣagatayo nānyāḥ śaikṣagatayaḥ / [361/07-361/08]
SA01vakobhau:22695: etā hi gatayo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ satyeva karmāṇi vṛttiḥ kuśale asatyavṛttirakuśale / [361/08-361/09]
SA01vakobhau:22721: kāmadhātau parāvṛttajanmāntara āryo na dhātvantaraṃ gacchati / [361/17-361/18]
SA01vakobhau:22723: anāgāmi phalaṃ prāpya tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇāt / [361/18-361/19]
SA01vakobhau:22729: yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ “ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ / [361/20]
SA01vakobhau:22739: sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate / [362/03-362/04]
SA01vakobhau:22741: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante / [362/04]
SA01vakobhau:22748: atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati / [362/06-362/08]
SA01vakobhau:22750: mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [362/08]
SA01vakobhau:22768: arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate / [362/15]
SA01vakobhau:22770: tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam / [362/15-362/17]
SA01vakobhau:22772: evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ / [362/18]
SA01vakobhau:22776: yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam / [362/20-362/21]
SA01vakobhau:22778: evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [362/21-362/22]
SA01vakobhau:22780: dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti / [362/22]
SA01vakobhau:22782: evaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tadvalelnānyānyapi vyavakīryante / [362/22-362/23]
SA01vakobhau:22790: ata icchātaḥ pravāhatrayasamāpattito niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ / [362/26]
SA01vakobhau:22833: yo hi kaścidanāgāmī nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa kāyasākṣītyucyate / [363/16-363/17]
SA01vakobhau:22842: sa hi tasmādvyutthāyāpratilabdhapūrvā savijñānakāṃ kāyaśāntiṃ pratilabhate / [363/19-363/20]
SA01vakobhau:22844: yato 'syaivaṃ bhavati śāntā vata nirodhasamāpattirnirvāṇasadṛśī vata nirodhasamāpattiriti / [363/20]
SA01vakobhau:22846: evamanena tasyāḥ śāntatvaṃ kāyena sākṣatkṛtaṃ bhavati / [363/21]
SA01vakobhau:22850: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā” ityatra sūtre ki kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ / [363/22]
SA01vakobhau:22880: gotre gotre nava pudgalāḥ sakalabandhano yāvadaṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmātsthānāt ṣaṇṇṇavakāni catuṣpañcāśat ṣoḍaśa catuṣpañcāśatkāni catuḥṣaṣṭānyaṣṭau śatāni / [364/06-364/07]
SA01vakobhau:22882: indriyabhedāt punastriguṇā ityevaṃ kṛtvā yo 'dharadhyāne navaprakāravītarāgaḥ sa uttare sakalabandhana uktaḥ / [364/07-364/08]
SA01vakobhau:22886: yathāntarāparinirvāyiṇa evaṃ yavadūrdhvasrotasa ityabhisamasya sarve catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāpyanāgāmināṃ bhavanti / [364/10]
SA01vakobhau:22892: sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti / [364/13]
SA01vakobhau:22896: navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva / [364/16]
SA01vakobhau:22934: yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānamapyekaikabhūmipratipakṣālambanamiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatimadhikān prakṣīpyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītirvajropamā bhavanti / [365/07-365/08]
SA01vakobhau:22942: yastvasau bhāvāgriko navamaḥ prakāra ukto yasya vajropamena prahāṇaṃ [365/11]
SA01vakobhau:22946: tasya punarnavamasya prakārasya saha kṣayaprāptyā kṣayajñānamutpadyate / [365/12-365/13]
SA01vakobhau:22954: utpanne ca punaḥ kṣayajñāne so 'rhattvapratipannakaḥ aśaikṣo bhavatyarhaścārhattvaphalaprāptaḥ / [365/17]
SA01vakobhau:22958: ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti / [365/19]
SA01vakobhau:22970: ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre “śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata” iti / [365/23-365/24]
SA01vakobhau:22972: yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta / [365/24]
SA01vakobhau:22996: tadyathā srota āpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ srota āpannaḥ / [366/03]
SA01vakobhau:23008: bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ darśanamārge sakudāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau na ca srota āpanna sakṛdāgāmināviti / [366/08]
SA01vakobhau:23010: dvividho hi bhāvanāmārga ukto laukiko lokottaraśceti / [366/08-366/09]
SA01vakobhau:23019: tata ūrdhva laukikābhāvāt svabhūmikasya vā pratipakṣatvāt / [366/12]
SA01vakobhau:23025: yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti / [366/15]
SA01vakobhau:23034: laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca / [366/20]
SA01vakobhau:23043_0: yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ
SA01vakobhau:23043_1: sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt / [367/04]
SA01vakobhau:23045: tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi / [367/05]
SA01vakobhau:23049: asatyāmapi tu tasyāṃ laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau na taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt / [367/07-367/09]
SA01vakobhau:23051: tadyathā bhavāgrādardha prakāravimuktasyāsatyāmapi tu laukikyāṃ tadvisaṃyogaprāptau tyaktāyāmapi cendriyasaṃcāreṇa lokottarāyāṃ na punastaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavati / [367/09-367/10]
SA01vakobhau:23053: yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat / [367/11]
SA01vakobhau:23061: atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti / [367/14]
SA01vakobhau:23073: tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt / [367/19]
SA01vakobhau:23079: triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum / [368/01]
SA01vakobhau:23092: tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham / [368/08]
SA01vakobhau:23104: vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ / [368/14]
SA01vakobhau:23129: na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ / [369/03]
SA01vakobhau:23150: “śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata” iti sūtre vacanāt / [369/13-369/14]
SA01vakobhau:23167: darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca / [369/22-370/01]
SA01vakobhau:23184: yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam / [370/06]
SA01vakobhau:23200: imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti / [370/13-370/14]
SA01vakobhau:23202: yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate / [370/15]
SA01vakobhau:23204: laukikāoptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalalm // VAkK_6.53 // [370/16-370/17]
SA01vakobhau:23206: na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā / [370/17]
SA01vakobhau:23214: ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ “sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat / [370/19-370/20]
SA01vakobhau:23216: yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti / [370/20]
SA01vakobhau:23238: “eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapī“ti sūtrāt / [371/03]
SA01vakobhau:23255: samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti / [371/10-371/11]
SA01vakobhau:23257: kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau “pravarttitaṃ dharmacakrami“ti vacanāt / [371/11-371/12]
SA01vakobhau:23263: tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ / [371/13-371/14]
SA01vakobhau:23265: ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ / [371/14]
SA01vakobhau:23273: ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / [371/16-371/17]
SA01vakobhau:23275: yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate / [371/17-371/18]
SA01vakobhau:23277: tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate / [371/18]
SA01vakobhau:23305: antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ / [372/05-372/06]
SA01vakobhau:23315: na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam / [372/09]
SA01vakobhau:23317: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti / [372/10]
SA01vakobhau:23322: asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt // VAkK_6.55 // [372/12]
SA01vakobhau:23324: rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante / [372/12-372/13]
SA01vakobhau:23326: na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum / [372/13]
SA01vakobhau:23330: āgamo 'pyayaṃ “pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa” iti / [372/15]
SA01vakobhau:23342: sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti / [372/21]
SA01vakobhau:23350: eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā / [373/03-373/04]
SA01vakobhau:23372: kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ / [373/13]
SA01vakobhau:23378: kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt / [373/16]
SA01vakobhau:23388: tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā / [373/20]
SA01vakobhau:23393: sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena / [374/01]
SA01vakobhau:23408: nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati / [374/05-374/06]
SA01vakobhau:23414: yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca / [374/08]
SA01vakobhau:23425: na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate / [374/12-374/13]
SA01vakobhau:23433: yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate /
SA01vakobhau:23436: śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt / [374/16-374/17]
SA01vakobhau:23440: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate / [374/18]
SA01vakobhau:23446: evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti / [374/19-374/20]
SA01vakobhau:23455: evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ / [374/22-374/23]
SA01vakobhau:23457: yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin / [374/23-374/24]
SA01vakobhau:23459: anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ / [374/25]
SA01vakobhau:23461: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:23478: bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante / [375/06-375/07]
SA01vakobhau:23480: asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi / [375/07-375/08]
SA01vakobhau:23482: tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam / [375/08-375/09]
SA01vakobhau:23486: api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā / [375/10-375/12]
SA01vakobhau:23488: na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ / [375/12]
SA01vakobhau:23508: tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmī“ti coktam / [375/19]
SA01vakobhau:23516: maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate / [375/21]
SA01vakobhau:23525: yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat / [375/24-375/25]
SA01vakobhau:23544: tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete / [376/03-376/04]
SA01vakobhau:23546: sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati / [376/04]
SA01vakobhau:23548: utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate / [376/05-376/07]
SA01vakobhau:23550_1: parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca / [376/07]
SA01vakobhau:23560: yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt / [376/10-376/11]
SA01vakobhau:23586: kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra” iti / [376/18]
SA01vakobhau:23594: yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate / [376/21]
SA01vakobhau:23599: atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ / [376/22-376/23]
SA01vakobhau:23603: yatredamuktaṃ “tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā” iti / [376/25]
SA01vakobhau:23613: yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ / [377/05]
SA01vakobhau:23619: kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti / [377/08]
SA01vakobhau:23636_0: yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ “ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato
SA01vakobhau:23636_1: 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ
SA01vakobhau:23636_2: kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmī“ti / [377/16-377/17]
SA01vakobhau:23650: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā // VAkK_6.59 // [378/01]
SA01vakobhau:23671: naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti / [378/07-378/09]
SA01vakobhau:23673: “dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt / [378/09]
SA01vakobhau:23688: akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti / [378/16]
SA01vakobhau:23695: tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate / [378/18-378/19]
SA01vakobhau:23716: kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati / [379/08]
