SA01vakobhau:25117: tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam / [404/16]
SA01vakobhau:25144: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti / [405/03]
SA01vakobhau:25152: tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam / [405/05-405/06]
SA01vakobhau:25178: ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā / [405/14-405/15]
SA01vakobhau:25182: samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati / [405/16-405/17]
SA01vakobhau:25192: darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ / [406/02-406/03]
SA01vakobhau:25198: tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu / [406/06]
SA01vakobhau:25212: kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate / [406/12-406/13]
SA01vakobhau:25214: samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam / [406/13]
SA01vakobhau:25220: mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ / [406/15]
SA01vakobhau:25234: alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate / [406/20]
SA01vakobhau:25242: evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ / [406/22]
SA01vakobhau:25246: lokottaramārga-sāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti / [406/24-407/01]
SA01vakobhau:25248: eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yat-tat-saṃmukhībhāva-samarthāśrayalābhaḥ / [407/01]
SA01vakobhau:25250: gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:25258: yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate / [407/05]
SA01vakobhau:25263: evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate / [407/07]
SA01vakobhau:25269: nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam / [407/09-407/10]
SA01vakobhau:25271: ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti / [407/10-407/11]
SA01vakobhau:25293: avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne / [407/20]
SA01vakobhau:25306: ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante / [408/05-408/06]
SA01vakobhau:25321_0: tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe
SA01vakobhau:25321_1: ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu
SA01vakobhau:25333: saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante / [408/17-408/18]
SA01vakobhau:25344: śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya / [408/23]
SA01vakobhau:25353: vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat / [409/03]
SA01vakobhau:25376: yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā / [409/12-409/13]
SA01vakobhau:25382: yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā / [409/16]
SA01vakobhau:25388: kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ / [409/19]
SA01vakobhau:25395: aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā / [409/21-409/23]
SA01vakobhau:25408: saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate / [410/04-410/05]
SA01vakobhau:25410: anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ / [410/05]
SA01vakobhau:25416: yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti / [410/10]
SA01vakobhau:25420: kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a4ubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānāpramāṇavimokṣādayaḥ rajjucchedāducchvasantīva peḍāsādharmyeṇa / [410/13-410/14]
SA01vakobhau:25432: kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:25455: “ṣaḍigānīndriyāṇi sudāntāni yāvatsubhāvitāni tathā santyasminkāye kleśā” iti vistaraḥ / [411/06-411/07]
SA01vakobhau:25463: ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:25466: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca / [411/11-411/12]
SA01vakobhau:25512: atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni / [412/10]
SA01vakobhau:25540: yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam / [412/19-412/20]
SA01vakobhau:25546: sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam / [413/02-413/03]
SA01vakobhau:25574: prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare / [413/15-413/16]
SA01vakobhau:25580: taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva / [413/19]
SA01vakobhau:25594: yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam / [414/04]
SA01vakobhau:25596: yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam / [414/05-414/06]
SA01vakobhau:25598: yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam / [414/06-414/07]
SA01vakobhau:25600: yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam / [414/07-414/08]
SA01vakobhau:25618: yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā / [414/14]
SA01vakobhau:25623: athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti / [414/17]
SA01vakobhau:25632: anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā / [414/20]
SA01vakobhau:25669: kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:25683: etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca / [415/19]
SA01vakobhau:25702: sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat / [416/02-416/04]
SA01vakobhau:25713: tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ / [416/08]
SA01vakobhau:25717: atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam / [416/10-416/11]
SA01vakobhau:25719: paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam / [416/11-416/13]
SA01vakobhau:25721: te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante / [416/13]
SA01vakobhau:25745_0: tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ
SA01vakobhau:25745_1: pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ
SA01vakobhau:25747: na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā / [417/05]
SA01vakobhau:25764: anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti / [417/13]
SA01vakobhau:25772: anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt / [417/17-417/18]
SA01vakobhau:25774: avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt / [417/18]
SA01vakobhau:25780: tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca [418/02]
SA01vakobhau:25793: praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate / [418/06]
SA01vakobhau:25799: dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ // VAkK_7.37 // [418/09]
SA01vakobhau:25831: sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt / [419/04]
SA01vakobhau:25847: anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt / [419/12]
SA01vakobhau:25861: “padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida” ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ / [419/19]
SA01vakobhau:25869: āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam / [419/21-420/01]
SA01vakobhau:25875: yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti / [420/03]
SA01vakobhau:25895: niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā / [420/12]
SA01vakobhau:25910: pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam / [420/18-420/19]
SA01vakobhau:25990: kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati / [422/07]
SA01vakobhau:25994: pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti / [422/09-422/10]
SA01vakobhau:26019: yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati / [422/16-422/17]
SA01vakobhau:26023: evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam / [422/18]
SA01vakobhau:26031: ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt / [422/21]
SA01vakobhau:26038: janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ / [422/23-422/24]
SA01vakobhau:26059: kathaṃ tarhi “cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ” ityevamādi / [423/07-423/08]
SA01vakobhau:26112: iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ // VAkK_7.46 // [424/07]
SA01vakobhau:26139: asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti / [424/19-425/01]
SA01vakobhau:26141: na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt / [425/01-425/03]
SA01vakobhau:26143: pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate / [425/04]
SA01vakobhau:26159: śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ / [425/11]
SA01vakobhau:26163: manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya / [425/12-425/13]
SA01vakobhau:26167: ata e“vācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya” ityuktaṃ bhagavatā / [425/14]
SA01vakobhau:26198: kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātau-ityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam / [426/06-426/07]
SA01vakobhau:26200: kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati / [426/07]
SA01vakobhau:26222: evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni / [426/15]
SA01vakobhau:26247: nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat / [427/04-427/05]
SA01vakobhau:26249: na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti / [427/05-427/06]
SA01vakobhau:26261: kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate / [427/11]
SA01vakobhau:26273: yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante / [427/16]
SA01vakobhau:26277: ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta” iti gāthā / [427/18]
SA01vakobhau:26279: buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante / [427/18-427/19]
SA01vakobhau:26281: yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti / [427/20]
SA01vakobhau:26311: jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati / [428/12-428/13]
SA01vakobhau:26321: upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām / [428/18-428/19]
SA01vakobhau:26331: ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā // VAkK_7.53 // [429/02]
SA01vakobhau:26341: kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye / [429/05]
SA01vakobhau:26357: nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt / [429/14]
SA01vakobhau:26377: sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati / [430/03]
SA01vakobhau:26406: yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam / [430/16]
SA01vakobhau:26438: asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt / [432/05]
SA01vakobhau:26474: evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti / [433/01]
SA01vakobhau:26477: yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ / [433/01-433/02]
SA01vakobhau:26481: nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet / [433/03]
SA01vakobhau:26485: yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate / [433/04-433/05]
SA01vakobhau:26492: tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare / [433/08]
SA01vakobhau:26512: sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi / [433/12]
SA01vakobhau:26524: kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham / [433/15-433/16]
SA01vakobhau:26544: vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti / [433/23-433/24]
SA01vakobhau:26582: na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ / [434/13-434/14]
SA01vakobhau:26584: yaduktaṃ “catuskandhā” iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti / [434/14]
SA01vakobhau:26592: yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ / [434/16]
SA01vakobhau:26628: yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti / [435/01-435/02]
SA01vakobhau:26630: yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti / [435/03]
SA01vakobhau:26634: kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti / [435/04]
SA01vakobhau:26640: bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti / [435/05-435/06]
SA01vakobhau:26646: “atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāni“ti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet / [435/08-435/09]
SA01vakobhau:26654: “arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramādi“ti vacanāt / [435/11]
SA01vakobhau:26656: sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti / [435/11-435/12]
SA01vakobhau:26671: bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca / [435/16-435/17]
SA01vakobhau:26673: dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā “yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti / [435/17-435/18]
SA01vakobhau:26675: ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ “yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ ve“ti / [435/18-435/19]
SA01vakobhau:26677: satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat / [435/19]
SA01vakobhau:26713: anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam / [436/06]
SA01vakobhau:26721: na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti / [436/09-436/10]
SA01vakobhau:26723: “yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti / [436/11]
SA01vakobhau:26725: kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:26730: ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti / [436/14]
SA01vakobhau:26772: eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ / [437/14]
SA01vakobhau:26782: vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca / [437/19]
SA01vakobhau:26786: yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam / [438/01]
SA01vakobhau:26794: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ / [438/05]
SA01vakobhau:26828: ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam / [438/16-438/917]
SA01vakobhau:26849: iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat / [438/23]
SA01vakobhau:26862: na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi / [439/01]
SA01vakobhau:26866: nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu / [439/02]
SA01vakobhau:26872: yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyami“ti / [439/04]
SA01vakobhau:26878: “sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata” iti svaśabdena vacanācca / [439/06]
SA01vakobhau:26894: “yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatī“tyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham / [439/11]
SA01vakobhau:26906: kāyavijñā nakāle vyutthitaḥ syāditi cet / [439/15] na /
SA01vakobhau:26926: cakṣuryāvadeva spraṣṭavyami“tyasya sūtrasya virodhāditi cet / [439/20] na /
SA01vakobhau:26931: na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet / [439/21-439/22]
SA01vakobhau:26933: ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet / [439/22-439/23]
SA01vakobhau:26941: tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam / [439/25-440/01]
SA01vakobhau:26943: ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam / [440/01]
SA01vakobhau:26956: naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam / [440/04]
SA01vakobhau:26964: sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti / [440/07-440/08]
SA01vakobhau:26966: na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti / [440/08]
SA01vakobhau:26993: yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti / [440/15-440/16]
SA01vakobhau:26995: na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate / [440/17]
SA01vakobhau:26999: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā “atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti / [440/19-440/20]
SA01vakobhau:27001: caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata” ityuktam / [440/20-440/21]
SA01vakobhau:27003: punaścoktaṃ “sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādi“tyato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti / [440/22]
SA01vakobhau:27007: kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti / [441/02]
SA01vakobhau:27009: na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate / [441/03]
SA01vakobhau:27037: trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā / [441/12]
SA01vakobhau:27045: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam // VAkK_8.11 // [441/16]
SA01vakobhau:27056: taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu / [441/21]
SA01vakobhau:27079: yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti / [442/08-442/09]
SA01vakobhau:27090: prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti / [442/13-442/14]
SA01vakobhau:27096: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti / [442/17]
SA01vakobhau:27115: śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam / [442/24-443/01]
SA01vakobhau:27117: ata evocyate “syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt / [443/01]
SA01vakobhau:27139: nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate / [443/09]
SA01vakobhau:27169: svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti / [443/19]
SA01vakobhau:27179: śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete / [444/02]
SA01vakobhau:27183: vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante / [444/03-444/04]
SA01vakobhau:27191: tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam // VAkK_8.15 // [444/07]
SA01vakobhau:27204: kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate / [444/12-444/13]
SA01vakobhau:27211: pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti / [444/15]
SA01vakobhau:27221: śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti / [444/19]
SA01vakobhau:27239: hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam / [445/06]
SA01vakobhau:27247: kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam / [445/10]
SA01vakobhau:27253: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram / [445/13]
SA01vakobhau:27279: sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta / [446/03-446/04]
SA01vakobhau:27285: evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate / [446/06]
SA01vakobhau:27289: yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam / [446/08]
SA01vakobhau:27296: tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati / [446/10]
SA01vakobhau:27300: dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ / [446/11-446/12]
SA01vakobhau:27302: samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti / [446/13]
SA01vakobhau:27312: bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau / [446/17-446/18]
SA01vakobhau:27322: nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate / [445/21-446/21]
SA01vakobhau:27354: maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt / [447/10]
SA01vakobhau:27384: kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā / [447/21]
SA01vakobhau:27390: śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni / [448/03]
SA01vakobhau:27394: ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati / [448/05]
SA01vakobhau:27411: ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi / [448/11]
SA01vakobhau:27433: tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati / [448/19-448/20]
SA01vakobhau:27435: punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre / [448/20]
SA01vakobhau:27442: tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam / [449/02]
SA01vakobhau:27483: paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ / [449/17-449/18]
SA01vakobhau:27485: anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ / [450/01]
SA01vakobhau:27524: na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt / [450/17]
SA01vakobhau:27561: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate” iti vistaraḥ / [451/09]
SA01vakobhau:27565: samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi // VAkK_8.27 // [451/11]
SA01vakobhau:27567: kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā / [451/11-451/12]
SA01vakobhau:27579: prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā / [451/18]
SA01vakobhau:27583: yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā / [452/01-452/02]
SA01vakobhau:27591: idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante [452/05]
SA01vakobhau:27639: sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate / [453/03-453/05]
SA01vakobhau:27641: duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate / [453/05]
SA01vakobhau:27644: atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati / [453/06]
SA01vakobhau:27706: yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti / [454/07-454/08]
SA01vakobhau:27708: na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate / [454/08-454/09]
SA01vakobhau:27712: teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe / [454/09-454/10]
SA01vakobhau:27714: tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate / [454/10]
SA01vakobhau:27718: tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate / [454/11-454/12]
SA01vakobhau:27720: tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati / [454/12-454/13]
SA01vakobhau:27724: śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt / [454/14-454/16]
SA01vakobhau:27726: evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate / [454/16-454/17]
SA01vakobhau:27735: kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:27750: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ / [455/03]
SA01vakobhau:27786: kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave / [455/17]
SA01vakobhau:27808: bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:27813: bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa / [456/08-456/09]
SA01vakobhau:27815: tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti / [456/09]
SA01vakobhau:27826: ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ / [456/15]
SA01vakobhau:27836: aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā / [456/18]
SA01vakobhau:27840: evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti / [456/20]
SA01vakobhau:27856: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam / [457/04]
SA01vakobhau:27868: yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye / [457/08]
SA01vakobhau:27872: yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe / [457/10]
SA01vakobhau:27918: sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam / [458/11]
SA01vakobhau:27932: ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva / [458/18]
SA01vakobhau:27948: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca // VAkK_8.38 // [459/05-459/06]
SA01vakobhau:27950: rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle / [459/06]
SA01vakobhau:27962: tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ / [459/11]
SA01vakobhau:27964: dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca // VAkK_8.39 // [459/12]
SA01vakobhau:27969: ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam / [459/13]
SA01vakobhau:27976: yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ / [459/16-459/19]
SA01vakobhau:27979: yaddurgṛhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau manayaḥ pramāṇam // VAkK_8.40 // [460/01-460/02]
SA01vakobhau:27981: prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ / [460/02]
SA01vakobhau:27985: saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca / [460/04-460/07]
SA01vakobhau:27987: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
SA01vakobhau:27990: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:27991: jagatyanāthe gunaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate // VAkK_8.42 // [460/12-460/13]
SA01vakobhau:28016: kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti / [461/06]
SA01vakobhau:28020: ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye / [461/07]
SA01vakobhau:28028: sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya / [461/09-461/11]
SA01vakobhau:28030: satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca / [461/11-461/12]
SA01vakobhau:28043: kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ / [461/16]
SA01vakobhau:28070: yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti / [461/23]
SA01vakobhau:28085: na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ / [462/02]
SA01vakobhau:28091: evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate / [462/03-462/04]
SA01vakobhau:28093: na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt / [462/04]
SA01vakobhau:28103: etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti / [462/07-462/08]
SA01vakobhau:28105: loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca / [462/08]
SA01vakobhau:28109: yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca / [462/09]
SA01vakobhau:28115: yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam / [462/11]
SA01vakobhau:28120: yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti / [462/12-462/14]
SA01vakobhau:28122: atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante / [462/14]
SA01vakobhau:28129: na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28134: skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate / [462/18-462/19]
SA01vakobhau:28152: atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate / [462/25]
SA01vakobhau:28155: skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti / [462/26]
SA01vakobhau:28159: yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti / [463/01-463/02]
SA01vakobhau:28161: yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ “pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyami“ti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti / [463/02-463/03]
SA01vakobhau:28163: naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam / [463/03-463/04]
SA01vakobhau:28165: yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam / [463/04-463/05]
SA01vakobhau:28173: pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti / [463/06-463/07]
SA01vakobhau:28175: atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti / [463/07-463/08]
SA01vakobhau:28177: tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā / [463/08-463/09]
SA01vakobhau:28188: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā / [463/13-463/14]
SA01vakobhau:28190: evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā / [463/14-463/15]
SA01vakobhau:28194: cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā / [463/17]
SA01vakobhau:28196: evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā / [463/18]
SA01vakobhau:28200: ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham / [463/20]
SA01vakobhau:28202: yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti / [463/21]
SA01vakobhau:28206: kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti / [463/22-463/23]
SA01vakobhau:28208: yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ / [463/23-463/24]
SA01vakobhau:28220: rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ / [463/27]
SA01vakobhau:28222: idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate /
SA01vakobhau:28241: yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā / [464/06-464/07]
SA01vakobhau:28247: kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā / [464/09]
SA01vakobhau:28253: yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ / [464/11-464/12]
SA01vakobhau:28259: sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti / [464/13]
SA01vakobhau:28265: yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti / [464/15]
SA01vakobhau:28269: “ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā” iti sūtre vacanāt / [464/16-464/17]
SA01vakobhau:28271: atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ / [464/18]
SA01vakobhau:28282: “yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti / [464/22]
SA01vakobhau:28286: tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam / [464/23-464/24]
SA01vakobhau:28288: mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇami“ti / [464/24]
SA01vakobhau:28296: ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame / [464/27]
SA01vakobhau:28304: yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ / [465/03-465/06]
SA01vakobhau:28306_0: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmī“tyuktvā
SA01vakobhau:28306_2: veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam / [465/06-465/07]
SA01vakobhau:28310: ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ / [465/07-465/08]
SA01vakobhau:28316: cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti / [465/10]
SA01vakobhau:28321_0: “cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā
SA01vakobhau:28321_1: vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate / [465/13-465/14]
SA01vakobhau:28323: atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti / [465/14-465/15]
SA01vakobhau:28325: atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti / [465/15-465/16]
SA01vakobhau:28327: atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti / [465/16-465/17]
SA01vakobhau:28331: sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti / [465/18]
SA01vakobhau:28339: yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham / [465/20-465/21]
SA01vakobhau:28343: teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato “yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce“ti / [465/22-465/25]
SA01vakobhau:28345: bimbisārasūtre coktam “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate” iti vistaraḥ / [465/25]
SA01vakobhau:28349: “manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
SA01vakobhau:28352: evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate” // iti / [466/05]
SA01vakobhau:28357: yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati // [466/08-466/09]
SA01vakobhau:28360: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ // [466/10-466/11]
SA01vakobhau:28366: na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmi“ti / [466/14]
SA01vakobhau:28374: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate / [466/16-466/17]
SA01vakobhau:28378: na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:28385: yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā / [466/19-466/20]
SA01vakobhau:28399: yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram / [466/24]
SA01vakobhau:28401: kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti “sarvadharmā anātāna” iti / [467/01]
SA01vakobhau:28404: naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi / [467/01-467/02]
SA01vakobhau:28410: iha caivaṃ vikalpyate “anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa” iti / [467/04]
SA01vakobhau:28412: anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ / [467/04-467/05]
SA01vakobhau:28414: “nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ” yattāvaduktaṃ prāk “no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no ve“ti tattāvadaśocam / [467/05-467/07]
SA01vakobhau:28416: uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare “ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni“ti / [467/08]
SA01vakobhau:28420: tathoktaṃ “ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāni“ti / [467/10-467/11]
SA01vakobhau:28426: yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt / [467/12]
SA01vakobhau:28432: yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti / [467/14-467/15]
SA01vakobhau:28434: na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt / [467/15]
SA01vakobhau:28439: evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati / [467/16-467/17]
SA01vakobhau:28441: naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe / [467/17]
SA01vakobhau:28446: yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam / [467/19]
SA01vakobhau:28456: “ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:28457: yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana” iti / [468/01]
SA01vakobhau:28459: skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ / [468/01-468/02]
SA01vakobhau:28463: “bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ce“ti / [468/03]
SA01vakobhau:28467: na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ / [468/04]
SA01vakobhau:28479: “yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ” sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta / [468/07-468/08]
SA01vakobhau:28481: mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti / [468/08-468/09]
SA01vakobhau:28483: skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ / [468/09]
SA01vakobhau:28487: asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ “nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ” / [468/11]
SA01vakobhau:28489: kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti / [468/11-468/12]
SA01vakobhau:28491: sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre / [468/12-468/13]
SA01vakobhau:28493: tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti / [468/14]
SA01vakobhau:28497: athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet / [468/15]
SA01vakobhau:28502: “ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate” iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet / [468/17] na /
SA01vakobhau:28507: saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt / [468/18-468/19]
SA01vakobhau:28509: na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt / [468/19]
SA01vakobhau:28514: yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt / [468/20-468/21]
SA01vakobhau:28520: na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām / [468/22-468/23]
SA01vakobhau:28524: ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi / [468/24-468/25]
SA01vakobhau:28526: phalgusūtre coktam “upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti / [468/25-468/26]
SA01vakobhau:28530: kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate / [469/01]
SA01vakobhau:28549: yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati / [469/06]
SA01vakobhau:28551: pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate / [469/07]
SA01vakobhau:28553: kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam /
SA01vakobhau:28559: tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati / [469/09-469/10]
SA01vakobhau:28561: yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam / [469/10]
SA01vakobhau:28567: sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām / [469/12]
SA01vakobhau:28577: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
SA01vakobhau:28585: nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti / [469/17-469/18]
SA01vakobhau:28591: ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti / [469/19]
SA01vakobhau:28593: yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti / [469/19-469/20]
SA01vakobhau:28597: yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti / [469/21]
SA01vakobhau:28601: nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti / [469/22]
SA01vakobhau:28605: sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti / [469/23-469/24]
SA01vakobhau:28607: evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti / [469/25]
SA01vakobhau:28612: sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt / [469/27]
SA01vakobhau:28620: yat bhagavatoktam “astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti / [470/03-470/05]
SA01vakobhau:28622_0: nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ
SA01vakobhau:28622_1: parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti / [470/05-470/06]
SA01vakobhau:28640: jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt // [470/15-470/16]
SA01vakobhau:28643: abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ // [470/17-470/18]
SA01vakobhau:28645: tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /
SA01vakobhau:28646: āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim // [470/19]
SA01vakobhau:28650: yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam / [470/20-471/01]
SA01vakobhau:28654: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:28655: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / [471/02]
SA01vakobhau:28659: ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na / [471/03]
SA01vakobhau:28663: ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha4rāvakacaṭakavat / [471/05]
SA01vakobhau:28668: tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasye“ti / [471/07-471/09]
SA01vakobhau:28670: sthavira ānanda āha “yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇe“ti sarvam / [471/09-471/10]
SA01vakobhau:28672: bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ / [471/10]
SA01vakobhau:28674: sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān / [471/11-471/12]
SA01vakobhau:28676: paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti / [471/12]
SA01vakobhau:28680: idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha” iti / [471/14-471/15]
SA01vakobhau:28686: yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam / [471/17-471/18]
SA01vakobhau:28690: arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti / [471/18-471/19]
SA01vakobhau:28692: evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti / [471/19-471/20]
SA01vakobhau:28694: astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam / [471/20-471/21]
SA01vakobhau:28704: “astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitī“ti vātsyasūtre vacanāt / [471/24]
SA01vakobhau:28706: yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati / [471/24-471/25]
SA01vakobhau:28710: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā “avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmi“ti / [472/01]
SA01vakobhau:28718: yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate / [472/03-472/05]
SA01vakobhau:28720: yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān “grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvami“ti / [472/05]
SA01vakobhau:28734: yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ / [472/08]
SA01vakobhau:28738: “ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatī“ti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta / [472/09-472/10]
SA01vakobhau:28746: atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti / [472/12-472/13]
SA01vakobhau:28748: tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate / [472/13-472/14]
SA01vakobhau:28750: tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ / [472/14-472/15]
SA01vakobhau:28752: ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ / [472/16-472/17]
SA01vakobhau:28754: yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā / [472/17-472/18]
SA01vakobhau:28762: tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum / [472/21-472/22]
SA01vakobhau:28764: labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt / [472/22]
SA01vakobhau:28768: evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret / [472/23]
SA01vakobhau:28772: na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ / [472/24-472/25]
SA01vakobhau:28778: saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ / [472/26]
SA01vakobhau:28793: tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti / [473/02-473/03]
SA01vakobhau:28805: kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate / [473/05]
SA01vakobhau:28820: hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam / [473/09]
SA01vakobhau:28822: yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti / [473/09-473/10]
SA01vakobhau:28826_0: yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate
SA01vakobhau:28826_1: sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro
SA01vakobhau:28830: evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam / [473/14]
SA01vakobhau:28834: yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate / [473/15-473/16]
SA01vakobhau:28836: yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate / [473/16]
SA01vakobhau:28847: so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ / [473/19-473/20]
SA01vakobhau:28849: tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti / [473/20]
SA01vakobhau:28853: kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti / [473/22]
SA01vakobhau:28859: ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti / [473/24]
SA01vakobhau:28863: yattarhi “vijñānaṃ vijānātī“ti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti / [473/25-473/26]
SA01vakobhau:28878: ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam / [474/02-474/03]
SA01vakobhau:28880: athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt / [474/04]
SA01vakobhau:28884: api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti / [474/05]
SA01vakobhau:28896: yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt / [474/09-474/10]
SA01vakobhau:28898: yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat / [474/10]
SA01vakobhau:28902: eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati / [474/11-474/13]
SA01vakobhau:28904: anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam / [474/13]
SA01vakobhau:28914_0: yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ
SA01vakobhau:28914_1: vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane
SA01vakobhau:28920: atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate / [474/19]
SA01vakobhau:28926: saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati / [474/21-474/22]
SA01vakobhau:28941: ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi / [475/03]
SA01vakobhau:28947: saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ / [475/05-475/06]
SA01vakobhau:28955: astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ / [475/08]
SA01vakobhau:28959: sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti / [475/09]
SA01vakobhau:28965: nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām / [475/11]
SA01vakobhau:28973: na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ / [475/13-475/14]
SA01vakobhau:28986: ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati / [475/16-475/17]
SA01vakobhau:28990: te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti / [475/18]
SA01vakobhau:28998: sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
SA01vakobhau:29005: smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet / [476/01] na /
SA01vakobhau:29021: ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ / [476/05]
SA01vakobhau:29030: gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate / [476/08]
SA01vakobhau:29035: ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ / [476/10-476/11]
SA01vakobhau:29041: yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra / [476/12-476/13]
SA01vakobhau:29058: asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā / [476/16-476/17]
SA01vakobhau:29069: asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati / [476/19-476/20]
SA01vakobhau:29079: asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam / [476/22]
SA01vakobhau:29090: tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ / [476/25-476/26]
SA01vakobhau:29092: cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam / [476/26]
SA01vakobhau:29100: yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate / [477/01]
SA01vakobhau:29102: na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate / [477/01-477/02]
SA01vakobhau:29106: smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute / [477/03-477/04]
SA01vakobhau:29108: phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate / [477/04]
SA01vakobhau:29115: vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam / [477/07]
SA01vakobhau:29119: ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ / [477/08]
SA01vakobhau:29127: naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ / [477/10]
SA01vakobhau:29142: tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate / [477/14]
SA01vakobhau:29146: yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat / [477/15-477/16]
SA01vakobhau:29155: kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ / [477/18-477/19]
SA01vakobhau:29157: yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ / [477/19-477/20]
SA01vakobhau:29163: trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya / [477/22]
SA01vakobhau:29167: “yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhau:29170: tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate / [477/25-477/26]
SA01vakobhau:29178: na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati / [478/02]
SA01vakobhau:29180: tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate / [478/02-478/03]
SA01vakobhau:29186: yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ / [478/04-478/05]
SA01vakobhau:29188: bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate / [478/05-478/07]
SA01vakobhau:29190: evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat / [478/07]
SA01vakobhau:29194: yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti / [478/09-478/10]
SA01vakobhau:29198: nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ / [478/11]
SA01vakobhau:29221: ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
